substance.name: Maintenance Cost
substance.subtitle: Reward Item
substance.description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

substance.name: Sentinel Alert Level
substance.subtitle: Reward Item
substance.description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

substance.name: Sentinel Alert Level
substance.subtitle: Reward Item
substance.description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

substance.name: Debt
substance.subtitle: Reward Item
substance.description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

substance.name: Debt
substance.subtitle: Reward Item
substance.description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

substance.name: Liquid Sun
substance.subtitle: Transmuted Metal
substance.description:
Conventional planetary metal, superheated and then held in a stabilised plasmatic form.
Extracted from metallic terrain deposits using a Solar Ray. Enormously energetic.

substance.name: Fragmented Qualia
substance.subtitle: Soul Fragment
substance.description:
A pattern, no more than a mere waveform, etched into the surface of a tiny metallic shard. This fragment of data represents a recording of the electrical impulses running across a neural network. Many fragments would be required to recreate any sensible experience.
Generated by the interaction of the Animus Beam with a living target.

substance.name: Shattered Qualia
substance.subtitle: Soul Fragment
substance.description:
A pattern, no more than a mere waveform, etched into an ethereal shard of glass. This fragment of data represents a trace of the electrical impulses running across a neural network. Many fragments would be required to recreate any sensible experience.
Released upon the destruction of a boundary horror.

substance.name: Cursed Dust
substance.subtitle: Ashes of Despair
substance.description:
A powdery desert soil, slick with the gland expressions of a colossal sandworm. Historically, some have regarded this dust as the divine parent of such worms. It smells curiously sweet.
Cursed Dust gathers in the terrain deposits of planets blighted by titan worm activity.

substance.name: Somnal Dust
substance.subtitle: Decayed Spacetime Remnant
substance.description:
Grey, dead, sparkling with life and colour, singing as it shimmers. This impossibly fine dust is the accumulated decay of time and memories.
Collected from the fine layers it forms around hotspots in the loop. Of great value to Specialist Polo as they research the loop.

substance.name: Ancestral Memories
substance.subtitle: Recessive Creature Genes
substance.description:
The echo of a genetic possibility, forgotten by evolution. It twitches with a wild energy.
Extracted from a creature caught within a repeating circuit of time. Of great value to Specialist Polo as they research the loop.

product.name: Metal Plating
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
A lightweight metal product, heavily used in the manufacture of starship parts and deployable technology. A mainstay of the construction industries of all known primary species.
Crafted from Ferrite Dust.

product.name: Carbon Nanotubes
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
Metres and metres of high capacity carbon nanotubes.
Their high tensile strength and mild conductivity make these a key component in many advanced technologies.

product.name: Hermetic Seal
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
A high-performance carbon seal, able to withstand both the harsh interstellar environment and the rigours of intensive, high-energy industrial use.
User is advised to regularly check seal integrity after installation.

product.name: Microprocessor
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
A compact, low-heat microchip. Assembled from processed Chromatic Metal, created from one of several specialised terrain metals.
Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

product.name: Hydraulic Wiring
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
Specialist wiring and control threads, this flexible material allows the transmission of power and signals, as well as offering direct manipulation of remote components.
Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

product.name: Quantum Computer
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
An extremely fast advanced processing unit. Allows real-time solving of otherwise impossible calculations. However, protection against decoherence is not guaranteed.
Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

product.name: Magnetic Resonator
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
An electromagnetic frequency oscillator, able to function in a wide-range of conditions thanks to both ferrous and non-ferrous magnetic properties.
Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

product.name: Solar Mirror
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
A specialist optical component. Employing an impossibly polished surface, this mirror is able to selectively filter different wavelengths of light, changing its reflective pattern based on nearby magnetic fields.
Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

product.name: Amino Chamber
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
A specialist biological catalysation device.
This unit takes advantage of naturally occurring enzymes in order to facilitate increased energy yields and faster processing in a wide range of advanced technologies.

product.name: Wiring Loom
product.subtitle: Universal Technology Platform
product.description:
A prefabricated circuit board, designed for flexible use in a large range of technology components.
The module features an integrated nanite processor, allowing it to be quickly configured for a wide variety of uses.

product.name: Repair Kit
product.subtitle: Automatic Patching Unit
product.description:
A highly useful piece of survival technology, the Repair Kit allows damaged equipment to be quickly and efficiently restored to working order.
While repairing a piece of techology, the Repair Kit can be applied to any damaged subcomponent in place of the usual requirements.

product.name: Life Support Gel
product.subtitle: Portable Life Support Power
product.description:
Emergency life support fuel.
Synthesised from rocket fuel crystals and carbon, this gel offers a temporary boost to life support systems. Long-term impact on user's lungs is currently unknown.

product.name: Ion Battery
product.subtitle: Portable Energy Storage
product.description:
Convenient and optimised power storage unit. Used in a wide variety of defensive and hazard protection systems.
Constructed by fusing Ferrite Dust with underground Cobalt. Frequently found ready-made in cylindrical metal containers.

product.name: Starshield Battery
product.subtitle: Portable Energy Storage
product.description:
A power storage unit optimised for use in starship defensive systems.
Tritium-fuelled capacitors provide quick-release charge for the Deflector Shield, but would overload smaller-scale equipment.

product.name: Di-hydrogen Jelly
product.subtitle: Portable Life Support Power
product.description:
A faintly-glowing jelly. Its gentle light and soft wobble belie the fact that this sticky gel is both highly toxic and highly flammable. Skin contact is to be avoided at all costs.
Synthesised from Di-hydrogen.

product.name: Starship Launch Fuel
product.subtitle: Stabilised Di-hydrogen Fuel
product.description:
Highly reactive solid-state fuel, required to fuel Starship Launch Thrusters.
Created from crystallised Di-hydrogen, found in blue deposits on all worlds.

product.name: Hydrothermal Fuel Cell
product.subtitle: Submarine Reactor Fuel
product.description:
A high thermal energy fuel, contained within a standardised fuel cell. Used to fuel the Humboldt Drive that powers the Nautilon submarine.
Created with a mix of organic compounds (Carbon and cyto-phosphates) and localised mineral salts.

product.name: Unstable Plasma
product.subtitle: Plasma Launcher Recharge
product.description:
Densely-packed fuel capsule for use in the Plasma Launcher.
Contained highly-pressurised electro-thermal energy for use in land disruption grenade technology.

product.name: Projectile Ammunition
product.subtitle: Universal Ammo Module
product.description:
Advanced munition fragments, constructed to fit Universal Multi-Tool Standard 07/FF1.
Easily inserted into the Boltcaster, Pulse Spitter and Scatter Blaster via the Multi-Tool clip reloading system.

product.name: Antimatter Housing
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
Secure antimatter containment device, required before Antimatter can be safely secured as Warp Cells.
Rebound Oxygen forms a protective gas pocket, preventing the antimatter from reacting with the surrounding casing.

product.name: Antimatter
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
Contained negative matter and baryogenesis antiparticles.
The vast energy potential of antimatter makes it highly valuable. 95% of existing antimatter consumption is in the powering of starship hyperdrives.
WARNING: uncontained usage is not recommended.

product.name: Warp Cell
product.subtitle: Hyperdrive Charging Unit
product.description:
This antimatter-based fuel is one of the few power sources capable of meeting the incredible energy requirements of a starship hyperdrive.
Secured within a robust housing, the cell is guaranteed paradox-free during FTL travel.

product.name: Warp Hypercore
product.subtitle: Hyperdrive Charging Unit
product.description:
A high-capacity antimatter-based fuel, this cell harnesses an internal black hole generator to power starship hyperdrives across multiple warp jumps.
Cell walls are specially designed to reflect any reality paradoxes back towards the heart of the unit, where they generate additional power.

product.name: Salvaged Glass
product.subtitle: Recovered Sentinel Components
product.description:
A sinister shard of purple glass, salvaged from the destroyed remains of Sentinel machinery. Its walls are thin, and it may be broken down to access valuable Sentinel components.
Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and shatter with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Quad Servo
product.subtitle: Anomalous Material
product.description: A highly sprung motor arm salvaged from inside of a Sentinel patrol unit. It occasionally twitches, as if experiencing the echo of combat.

product.name: Crystallised Heart
product.subtitle: Corrupted Aeronic Core
product.description:
The functional core of a Sentinel quadruped unit, but warped beyond all recognition. The entire machine is infested with a crystalline material that pulses wildy upon inspection.
A close analysis reveals the machinery itself appears to have been reconfigured, stretching and warping into a whole new form, writhing in the presence of these radiant shards of glass.

product.name: Hardframe Engine
product.subtitle: Anomalous Material
product.description:
This complex mechanical unit was once the central combustion chamber at the heart of a Sentinel Hardframe unit.
Though now cool to the touch, it still glows with a sinister red heat...

product.name: Walker Brain
product.subtitle: Anomalous Material
product.description:
Shifting nanite clusters sewn together with a pugneum filament, this circuit is painfully hot to the touch.
A sinister purple light leaks from deep within its wiring, changing in intensity as it watches its holder.

product.name: Vile Cortex
product.subtitle: Glorious Trophy
product.description:
The brain stem of a brood mother, pulled from its malignant corpse.
This is a valuable trophy, signifying victory in the quest to purge the infestations of the vile brood. Turn it over to an envoy of the Mercenaries Guild to mark your triumph.

product.name: Pirate Transponder
product.subtitle: Salvaged Identification Device
product.description:
A unique ID transponder, ripped from the internal signal array of an outlaw starship.
Possesion of such a device implies the destruction of the vessel in question. Turn it over to an envoy of the Mercenaries Guild to collect any associated bounties.

product.name: Sea Glass
product.subtitle: Precious Material
product.description:
A etheral shard, this translucent plane is both mineral and alive, both of the water and of another realm.
Of high value to collectors across the universe.

product.name: Hyaline Brain
product.subtitle: Sentience Vessel
product.description:
The central processing unit of a Sentinel interceptor ship. The circuitry writhes microscopically, constantly rearranging itself as it scans for anomalies.
A vital component for any entity wishing to construct their own Pilot Interface for a Sentinel Interceptor.
Status: VOLATILE

product.name: Carrier AI Fragment
product.subtitle: Battleship Core Remnant
product.description:
A single splinter of the colossal mainframe at the heart of a Sentinel capital ship. It blinks, its solitary living eye trained upon the one piece of data it retains - the last known location of one of its fleet of Interceptors.
Select the AI Fragment and use Search Archive (FE_ALT1) to translate information about Interceptor's crash site to your starship's navigation systems.

product.name: Inverted Mirror
product.subtitle: Burning Glassy Remnant
product.description:
A pane of watchful g l a s s, retrieved from the smoking remains of the corrupted swarm's Dissonance Resonators. It emits more light than it reflects, casting a faint purple hue on its surroundings.
Highly sought after for salvage operations, as it can be used to bypass the security systems of key Sentinel ship technologies.

product.name: Radiant Shard
product.subtitle: Glassy Reality Intrusion
product.description:
A fragment of glassy lifeforce, chipped from a larger formation. Dynamic intermolecular binding gives the shard a strangely flexible, sinewy quality. It writhes gently, almost as if it were seeking something...
Highly sought after for salvage operations, as it can be used to bypass the security systems of key Sentinel ship technologies.

product.name: Geode
product.subtitle: Valuable Mineral Deposit
product.description:
An unusually vibrant and potentially valuable lump of rock.
Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and crack open with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Geode
product.subtitle: Valuable Mineral Deposit
product.description:
An unusually vibrant and potentially valuable lump of rock.
Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and crack open with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Crystal Fragment
product.subtitle: Concentrated Element Shard
product.description:
A crystalline shard with an unusually dense structure. Potentially highly valuable.
Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and crack open with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Tritium Hypercluster
product.subtitle: Energetic Fragment
product.description:
A shard of pure crystalised Tritium.
Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and crack open with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Gold Nugget
product.subtitle: Valuable Ore
product.description:
A highly valuable ore chunk, ready to be processed into Gold.
Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and crack open with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Glowing Mineral
product.subtitle: Valuable Rock Sample
product.description:
Though its surface is dirtied and dull, polishing this rock reveals a deep inner glow, a glitter beneath a subtly iridescent surface.
Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and crack open with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Suspicious Packet (Goods)
product.subtitle: Contraband
product.description:
A suspicious looking parcel, acquired via an unusual transaction. The seller indicated it contained some sort of technology.
Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and use FE_ALT1 to examine the contents. No refunds.

product.name: Suspicious Packet (Tech)
product.subtitle: Contraband
product.description:
A suspicious looking parcel, acquired via an unusual transaction. The seller indicated it contained some sort of high-value or interesting item.
Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and use FE_ALT1 to examine the contents. No refunds.

product.name: Suspicious Packet (Arms)
product.subtitle: Contraband
product.description:
A suspicious looking parcel, acquired via an unusual transaction. The seller indicated it contained some sort of weapon-based technology.
Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and use FE_ALT1 to examine the contents. No refunds.

product.name: Anomaly Detector
product.subtitle: Anomalous Homing Device
product.description:
A single-use geometric beacon that probes the surrounding area for near-space anomalies. Such objects are highly unpredictable.
Select the Detector and use Begin Scan (FE_ALT1) to begin the location process.

product.name: Emergency Signal Scanner
product.subtitle: Coordinate Data
product.description:
A single-use receiver that scans for distress signals on freighter frequencies. Derelict or abandoned freighters often contain high-value salvage.
Select the Receiver and use Tune Signal (FE_ALT1) to begin the location process.

product.name: Emergency Signal Scanner (Active)
product.subtitle: Coordinate Data
product.description:
A single-use receiver that scans for distress signals on freighter frequencies. Derelict or abandoned freighters often contain high-value salvage.
Select the Receiver and use Tune Signal (FE_ALT1) to begin the location process.

product.name: Vigilant Stone
product.subtitle: Unblinking Eye
product.description:
An eye of living stone: waiting, watching. A relic left by a slumbering guardian, keeping sentry over ancient creature burial grounds.
Warning: Disturbing the eye may disturb the slumber of living stone guardians. Ensure re-animated guardians are defeated before storing this relic in the home.

product.name: Sac Venom
product.subtitle: Trade commodity
product.description:
A stabilised poison gland extracted from a terrestrial urchin. The host-urchin is actually a colony of smaller proto-creatures, a formation built on years of slow growth and cooperation.
Of use both medicinally and as a delicacy in some riskier cuisines.
Can be sold at a Galactic Trade Terminal.

product.name: Gravitino Ball
product.subtitle: Trade commodity
product.description:
A supersymmetric particle cluster created by divergent super-gravitational forces. A micro-rift is created as they form, and extraction of the orb prompts a localised reality weakening. Sentinel forces will respond to stablise any such anomaly.
Can be sold at a Galactic Trade Terminal.

product.name: Albumen Pearl
product.subtitle: Trade commodity
product.description:
Gemstone formed over the course of centuries within the egg of a super-incubatory species. Highly ornamental, these gems are themselves living seeds, lucent grains of potential life.
Can be sold at a Galactic Trade Terminal.

product.name: Vortex Cube
product.subtitle: Trade commodity
product.description:
An ancient object, unearthed from the depths of a planetary cave system. Its surface is cold to the touch, and is curiously polished despite its age.
A fusion of metal and rock, these cubes have proved resistant to industrial processing. As such, they are of value only to collectors.
Can be sold at a Galactic Trade Terminal.

product.name: Larval Core
product.subtitle: Monstrosity
product.description: A pulsating jellied orb, this gooey sphere is warm to the touch. Its stench triggers a primal fear in mortal beings, a deep-seated gnawing that begs you to drop it and flee.

product.name: Storm Crystal
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: A rare and highly valuable cluster of storm crystals. These crystalline structures thrive in stormy conditions, and naturally attract lightning strikes, becoming spectacularly luminescent when ionised. Exclusively found on extreme weather planets.

product.name: Living Pearl
product.subtitle: Semi-Conscious Gemstone
product.description:
Born in the hearts of enormous glowing molluscs found deep underwater.
Unlike most pearls, this sample is no unliving calcite. Some trace of the mother-clam's consciousness remains within the gem, giving it a lingering, haunting beauty.

product.name: Crystal Sulphide
product.subtitle: Compressed Mineral
product.description:
Formed in the incredible, high-pressure furnace of planetary cores, these rich mineral deposits have an almost glass-like quality.
Has a wide variety of industrial uses, taking advantage of both its mineral content and its extreme strength under pressure.

product.name: Hadal Core
product.subtitle: Horrific Sample
product.description:
A highly-pressurised fleshy orb.
One can feel it push back when touched, a flash of bioluminescence stirring in the inky black core of this mysterious object.

product.name: Hypnotic Eye
product.subtitle: Horrific Sample
product.description:
The eye is cold, almost frozen, to the touch. Nonetheless, it is impossible to escape the feeling it is somehow still alive.
Extended exposure is not recommended. Do not stare back into the eye. Do not stare back. Do not stare back.

product.name: Aronium
product.subtitle: Alloy Metal
product.description:
A lightweight and highly malleable alloy. Crafted from Paraffinium and Ionised Cobalt.
In high demand on the Galactic Trade Network due to its utility in the construction of planetside outposts and facilities.

product.name: Dirty Bronze
product.subtitle: Alloy Metal
product.description:
A popular metal alloy with a wide variety of uses. 'Dirty Bronze' has shed its scientific name in favour of the popular term for its colour.
Crafted from Pure Ferrite and Pyrite.

product.name: Herox
product.subtitle: Alloy Metal
product.description:
Combined neutral alloy with uses that range from pharmacology all the way to heavy industry. Crafted from Ionised Cobalt and Ammonia.
Forms the backbone of galactic alloy trading.

product.name: Lemmium
product.subtitle: Alloy Metal
product.description:
Pure Ferrite alloy. Crafted from Pure Ferrite and Uranium.
Used extensively in starship freighter construction due to its sheer strength. A hardcore material popular on the Galactic Trade Network.

product.name: Magno-Gold
product.subtitle: Alloy Metal
product.description:
Highly prized and lustrous alloy. Popular with traders of all known primary galactic races. Crafted from Ionised Cobalt and Phosphorus.
Easily recognisable by its bright red glow and strong magnetic field.

product.name: Grantine
product.subtitle: Alloy Metal
product.description:
Soft workable alloy favoured by artisans throughout the known galaxy. Crafted from Ionised Cobalt and Dioxite.
A popular trading good, with many galactic shipping paths devoted to its sale and transport.

product.name: Geodesite
product.subtitle: Enriched Alloy Metal
product.description:
Advanced and durable alloy primarily used in starship hull construction and deep-space exploration drone technology.
Crafted from Herox, Dirty Bronze and Lemmium.

product.name: Iridesite
product.subtitle: Enriched Alloy Metal
product.description:
Advanced light metal alloy traded throughout the galactic Outer Edge. Often used in the interiors of trading shuttles to reduce weight as they ascend from planets with high gravitational fields.
Crafted from Aronium, Magno-Gold and Grantine.

product.name: Planetary Chart
product.subtitle: Secret Cartographic Data
product.description:
A map of a nearby planet. A secure site of interest has been marked. Such sites often hold blueprints for new products.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.
New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

product.name: Planetary Chart
product.subtitle: Emergency Cartographic Data
product.description:
A map of a nearby planet. The coordinates of a distress signal have been marked.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.
New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

product.name: Planetary Chart
product.subtitle: Commercial Cartographic Data
product.description:
A map of a nearby planet. An inhabited outpost of some kind has been marked.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.
New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

product.name: Planetary Chart
product.subtitle: Alien Cartographic Data
product.description:
A map of a nearby planet. A a relic of an ancient civilisation has been marked.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.
New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

product.name: Planetary Chart (Empty)
product.subtitle: Cartographic Data
product.description:
A map of a nearby planet.
The chart is barren, devoid of any lifesigns or indications of settled territory.

product.name: Planetary Chart
product.subtitle: Cartographic Data
product.description:
A map of a nearby planet. A a relic of an ancient civilisation has been marked.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.
New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

product.name: Planetary Chart
product.subtitle: Cartographic Data
product.description:
A map of a nearby planet. The coordinates of a distress signal have been marked.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.
New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

product.name: Artifact Chart
product.subtitle: Dig Site Cartographic Data
product.description:
A map of a nearby planet. An ancient ruined site has been marked. Excavating this site is likely to yield valuable treasures.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.
New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

product.name: Sentinel Boundary Map
product.subtitle: Anomalous Planetary Location Data
product.description:
A strange, shifting map. Though hard to focus upon, this chart appears to show the location of a nearby Sentinel Pillar. Such Sentinel strongholds house many secrets...
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

product.name: Echo Locator
product.subtitle: Harmonic Location Tracker
product.description:
A curious mesh of old and new technology, a hybrid between two entirely separate methods of creation. Nonetheless, this location tracing device appears fully functional.
Select this device and use Resonate (FE_ALT1) to trace its harmonic origin.

product.name: Settlement Chart
product.subtitle: Specialist Planetary Chart
product.description:
A map showing the location of a nearby planetary settlement, acquired from the Space Station Cartographer.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

product.name: Autophage Settlement Chart
product.subtitle: Harmonic Planetary Chart
product.description:
A map showing the location of a nearby Autophage planetary settlement, acquired from an Autophage Synthesis Terminal.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

product.name: Ancient Key
product.subtitle: Timeless Artifact
product.description: A key of some weight, this aged piece of wrought iron must belong in a nearby lock...

product.name: Trident Key
product.subtitle: Aquatic Relic
product.description:
A strange forked key, glowing with an ultraviolet light.
Despite its primitive appearance, Exosuit scanning systems reveal traces of nanite foam upon its teeth.

product.name: Vy'keen Tablet
product.subtitle: Communion of Hirk
product.description:
A stone tablet bearing line after line of intricate runes. The words are unintelligible, an ancient dialect forgotten by all but the oldest of the Vy'keen elders.
The hand that carved this stone must have been extraordinary. The stonework is precise, delicate - and yet perfectly conveys the unyielding aggression its writer clearly possessed.

product.name: Divergence Cube
product.subtitle: Anomalous Data Unit
product.description:
A glitching, pulsing data unit. It does not seem to belong in this reality.
The cube gives the impression of a silent scream, the frozen cries of hundreds of lost minds trapped within.

product.name: Station Override
product.subtitle: AI Master Key
product.description:
A portable data drive containing the AI override codes for a Space Station Core.
The importance of the station AI core ensures that such keys are both highly regulated and extremely profitable on the black market.

product.name: Forged Passport
product.subtitle: Overwritten Digital Record
product.description:
A counterfeit starship registration document. This digital signature is guaranteed free of previous crimes or misdemeanors.
Can be used to reset any negative faction standing records at a Space Station Core.

product.name: Navigation Data
product.subtitle: Encrypted Navigation Data
product.description:
Encoded navigation data. This highly portable data unit contains all relevant cartographical information for a planetary region.
May be traded with a Cartographer aboard a Space Station in exchange for usable star charts.

product.name: Exosuit Upgrade Chart
product.subtitle: Encrypted Navigation Data
product.description:
Encoded navigation data which, when properly decrypted, will reveal the location of a Drop Pod containing an Exosuit Inventory Upgrade.
Select the coordinates in the inventory and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

product.name: Log Encryption Key
product.subtitle: Incomplete Data Sequence
product.description:
A fragment of the encryption override sequence for a freighter's emergency log.
Several parts of the sequence may be required to gain full access to recorded data.

product.name: AtlasPass v1
product.subtitle: Access Card
product.description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.
Provides access to low level restricted areas and outpost systems.

product.name: AtlasPass v2
product.subtitle: Access Card
product.description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.
Provides access to mid-tier restricted areas and outpost systems.

product.name: AtlasPass v3
product.subtitle: Access Card
product.description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.
Provides access to high level restricted areas and outpost systems.

product.name: Defence Chit
product.subtitle: System Authority Payment Substitute
product.description: A token, entitling the bearer to support from the system authorities in dealing with pirate attacks.

product.name: Mind Ark
product.subtitle: Advanced Crafted Product
product.description: A strange piece of technology, a gift from beyond the stars. It shimmers in a way that suggests it is not fully in this world.

product.name: Soul Engine
product.subtitle: Advanced Crafted Product
product.description:
A powerful organic computing unit.
A glitching beat drives this miracle circuit, performing cycle after cycle in an endless, furious loop of calculation.

product.name: Salvaged Data
product.subtitle: Salvaged Technology
product.description:
The salvageable heart of some ancient technology. Unreadable in its current form.
These databanks can be spent at a Construction Research Unit and used to research new Construction Blueprints.

product.name: Factory Override Unit
product.subtitle: Advanced Research Module
product.description:
A portable data unit, compatible with most planetary fabricator facilities.
Once access has been gained to a central control terminal, the Override Unit can divert the facilities resources towards researching new product recipes.

product.name: Salvaged Frigate Module
product.subtitle: Capital Ship Wiring Platform
product.description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of a large interstellar starship. May be collected from freighter crashsites or salvaged during frigate expeditions.
Useless in its current form, a Research Station aboard your freighter may be able to convert it into useable technology.

product.name: Storage Augmentation
product.subtitle: Starship Expansion Module
product.description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of a salvaged starship. May also be collected from freighter crash sites or salvaged during frigate expeditions.
Can be used to expand starship storage capacity at the Space Station's Starship Outfitter.

product.name: Cargo Bulkhead
product.subtitle: Auto-Expanding Freighter Module
product.description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of an abandoned freighter found floating in space. May also be salvaged during frigate expeditions.
Pre-packed nano-expanders fill out this portable unit and graft it to an existing freighter, increasing its inventory capacity. Apply at your freighter's Upgrade Terminal.

product.name: Multi-Tool Expansion Slot
product.subtitle: Upgrade Unit
product.description:
A flexible upgrade circuit, compatible with all person Multi-Tools.
This module can be wired into a Multi-Tool at a Space Station Multi-Tool Upgrade Rack, granting the user more space in the Multi-Tool's internal layout to add further upgrades or technology specialisations.

product.name: Exosuit Expansion Unit
product.subtitle: Upgrade Unit
product.description:
An advanced survival technology module that allows expansion of a user's Exosuit Storage.
Pre-packed nano-expanders create stablised sub-warp voids within the Exosuit, increasing its inventory capacity. Apply this augmentation at the Exosuit upgrade terminal on board a Space Station.

product.name: Spawning Sac
product.subtitle: Sentient Vessel Storage Sac
product.description:
An additional storage nodule for Sentient starships. Upon hatching, the parasite inside this sac is grafted upon the vessel, exchanging the use of its cavernous innards for vital nutrients from the host.
Use FE_ALT1 to trigger growth and begin the hatching process.

product.name: Psychonic Egg
product.subtitle: Pulsating Yolk Sac
product.description:
A writhing sac of genetic fluid, designed to foster the creation of new bio-infused technology for a sentient starship.
The embryo will grow into bio-technology upgrade. Begin biogenesis with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Memory Fragment
product.subtitle: Technology Echo
product.description:
The shattered remnants of an expired traveller. It whispers, an unknowable name deep within its fibres.
The memory will manifest as an important technology upgrade to aid you on your travels. Absorb this memory with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Memory Fragment (Inventory)
product.subtitle: Rogue Technology Echo
product.description:
The shattered remnants of an expired traveller. It whispers, an unknowable name deep within its fibres.
The memory will manifest as an inventory expansion to aid you on your travels. Absorb this memory with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Frigate Fuel (50 Tonnes)
product.subtitle: Stabilised Di-hydrogen Fuel
product.description:
A small barrel of frigate fuel.
This viscous gel is highly toxic to the touch. A refined fuel, it powers the interstellar engines of large trading ships.

product.name: Frigate Fuel (100 Tonnes)
product.subtitle: Stabilised Di-hydrogen Fuel
product.description:
A large barrel of frigate fuel.
This viscous gel is highly toxic to the touch. A refined fuel, it powers the interstellar engines of large trading ships.

product.name: Frigate Fuel (200 Tonnes)
product.subtitle: Stabilised Di-hydrogen Fuel
product.description:
A huge barrel of frigate fuel.
This viscous gel is highly toxic to the touch. A refined fuel, it powers the interstellar engines of large trading ships.

product.name: Mind Control Device
product.subtitle: Consumable Frigate Upgrade
product.description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.
The mind control device plugs into the ship's trading and communications systems, allowing the Fleet Commander to gain the upper hand in any negotiation.

product.name: Holographic Analyser
product.subtitle: Consumable Frigate Upgrade
product.description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.
This powerful analytic computer overclocks the existing fleet systems, allowing for faster-than-light calculations. Heat is a problem, and the chips do not last long.

product.name: Mineral Compressor
product.subtitle: Consumable Frigate Upgrade
product.description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.
The mineral compressor allows fleet mining crews to liquidise the substances they extract, for both faster processing and easier transportation.

product.name: Explosive Drones
product.subtitle: Consumable Frigate Upgrade
product.description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.
This pack of autonomous explosives have been programmed to launch from the fleet and pilot themselves directly towards hostile vessels. Extremely dangerous.

product.name: Fuel Oxidiser
product.subtitle: Consumable Frigate Upgrade
product.description:
A temporary frigate upgrade that lasts for one expedition.
This powerful fuel upgrade overloads frigate engines, allowing for faster-than-usual travel.

product.name: Gek Relic
product.subtitle: Medium value curiosity
product.description:
A metal statuette of a creature with a coin placed in its beak.
Popular with many traders who see it as an emblem of fair commerce and peace.

product.name: GekNip
product.subtitle: Trade commodity
product.description:
Edible product much beloved by the Gek.
Allows beaked traders to release delightfully scented packets of gas for a prolonged period of time.
GekNip gas packets are considered an art form, and the truest representation of the Gek soul.

product.name: NipNip Buds
product.subtitle: Medicinal Substance
product.description: A pungent bud harvested from the NipNip plant, often used to produce Gek Nip.

product.name: Vy'keen Effigy
product.subtitle: Medium value curiosity
product.description:
A small wooden icon carved into the shape of a Sentinel drone.
Used by warriors to enter a temporary trance-like state that eliminates their kind's need for sleep.

product.name: Vy'keen Dagger
product.subtitle: Trade commodity
product.description: Largely ceremonial weapon. A vital part of Vy'keen tradition and culture.

product.name: Korvax Casing
product.subtitle: High value curiosity
product.description:
The metallic shell of a disconnected electronic lifeform that was too distant from its kind to be refreshed with a new entity.
Highly prized by all species, not least its own.

product.name: Convergence Cube
product.subtitle: Trade commodity
product.description: Device used by the Korvax for the storage of historical and cultural information.

product.name: Acid
product.subtitle: Advanced Agricultural Product
product.description:
Dilute acid for high current generation in diverse power cells.
Crafted from Mordite and Fungal Mould.

product.name: Lubricant
product.subtitle: Advanced Agricultural Product
product.description:
A synthetic lubricant that reduces wear and prolongs the lifespan of technologies with moving parts.
Crafted from Faecium and Gamma Root.

product.name: Glass
product.subtitle: Advanced Agricultural Product
product.description:
Shatter-proof, scratch-resistant glass with a self-cleaning, UV-cured coating, for general construction use.
Refined from Silicate powder. Extract silicate from the earth with a Terrain Manipulator.
Can be crafted from Frost Crystals extracted from plants on frozen worlds.

product.name: Heat Capacitor
product.subtitle: Advanced Agricultural Product
product.description:
A thermal regulator produced from refined organic material. It is unique in its ability to produce, dissipate and distribute heat as required.
Crafted from Solanium and Frost Crystals.

product.name: Poly Fibre
product.subtitle: Advanced Agricultural Product
product.description:
A connective fibre for electronics, made from an advanced synthetic polymer and capable of serving as a conduit for power and data.
Crafted from Cactus Flesh and Star Bulbs.

product.name: Unstable Gel
product.subtitle: Advanced Agricultural Product
product.description:
A highly reactive gel, this substance is both energy-rich and dangerous to touch.
Crafted from Cactus Flesh.

product.name: Liquid Explosive
product.subtitle: Advanced Agricultural Product
product.description:
A general purpose high explosive, offered in liquid form for convenience of transport and deployment. Do not drink.
Crafted from Acid and Unstable Gel.

product.name: Living Glass
product.subtitle: Advanced Agricultural Product
product.description:
An advanced building material, this glass has been imbued with organic compounds that allow it to react to the environment. Microbes within the glass filter harmful light of all wavelengths and balance the atmosphere as required.
Crafted from Lubricant and Glass.

product.name: Circuit Board
product.subtitle: Advanced Agricultural Product
product.description:
Stackable, semi-flexible circuit board made from a highly durable synthetic polymer.
Crafted from Heat Capacitors and Poly Fibre.

product.name: Thermic Condensate
product.subtitle: Enhanced Gas Product
product.description:
A refined product, holding the energy potential of heated atmospheric gas in a stable state until required.
Crafted from Sulphurine and Condensed Carbon.

product.name: Enriched Carbon
product.subtitle: Enhanced Gas Product
product.description:
A refined product, taking ordinary carbon and boosting it with radioactive energy.
Crafted from Radon and Condensed Carbon.

product.name: Nitrogen Salt
product.subtitle: Enhanced Gas Product
product.description:
A refined product, this is a powerful organic fertiliser in an easily distributed form.
Crafted from Nitrogen and Condensed Carbon.

product.name: Organic Catalyst
product.subtitle: Manufactured Gas Product
product.description:
A catalytic material used in the creation of many organic fertilisers.
Crafted from Thermic Condensate and Enriched Carbon.

product.name: Semiconductor
product.subtitle: Manufactured Gas Product
product.description:
An advanced material useful in many electronic devices, with its own in-built temperature regulator.
Crafted from Thermic Condensate and Nitrogen Salt.

product.name: Hot Ice
product.subtitle: Manufactured Gas Product
product.description:
A paradoxical material, made less mysterious by its relative ease of manufacture.
Crafted from Enriched Carbon and Nitrogen Salt.

product.name: Fusion Accelerant
product.subtitle: Manufactured Gas Product
product.description:
An advanced fuel source, made from a perfect blend of high potential energy organic materials.
Crafted from Organic Catalyst and Nitrogen Salt.

product.name: Superconductor
product.subtitle: Manufactured Gas Product
product.description:
An advanced conductive material, the superconductor further enriches the field-warping power of the Semiconductor.
Crafted from Enriched Carbon and Semiconductors.

product.name: Cryo-Pump
product.subtitle: Manufactured Gas Product
product.description:
An advanced, self-regulating hybrid material, the Cryo-Pump distributes heat across itself with near perfect efficiency, making it vital in the creation of thermal regulators.
Crafted from Hot Ice and Thermic Condensate

product.name: Portable Reactor
product.subtitle: Advanced Crafted Product
product.description:
A miniature self-controlled nuclear reactor. Generates sub-stellar levels of energy in a hassle-free, widely compatible fuel module.
Crafted from Liquid Explosives and Fusion Accelerant.

product.name: Quantum Processor
product.subtitle: Advanced Crafted Product
product.description:
A highly advanced computational device, essential for the complex calculations involved in warp travel.
Crafted from Circuit Boards and Superconductors.

product.name: Cryogenic Chamber
product.subtitle: Advanced Crafted Product
product.description:
A low temperature chamber, designed to prevent the natural decay of organic matter.
Crafted from Living Glass and a Cryo-Pump.

product.name: Fusion Ignitor
product.subtitle: Highly Refined Technology
product.description:
A highly advanced piece of technology for use in the next generation of power plants. Producing a fusion core requires both intricate scientific skills and complex industrial processes.
Crafted from Portable Reactor, Quantum Processors and Geodesite.

product.name: Stasis Device
product.subtitle: Highly Refined Technology
product.description:
A device specifically crafted to keep lifeforms alive for thousands of years longer than their natural lifespan. Such a device requires great skill to manufacture, as not only is it technically complex, but the consequences for a user in the event of malfunction would be disastrous.
Crafted from Quantum Processors, Cryogenic Chambers, and Iridesite.

product.name: Nanotube Crate
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Construction)
product.description:
A packed crate of carbon nanotubes.
These tiny but incredibly strong tubes are required in the construction of tiny but incredibly strong scientific components.

product.name: Self-Repairing Heridium
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Construction)
product.description:
A hopper of self-repairing Heridium. It looks fresh.
Used in the creation of scientific components. Self-repairing heridium is particularly useful for deployment in remote facilities, where maintenance opportunities may be limited or deadly.

product.name: Optical Solvent
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Construction)
product.description:
Several bottles of optical solvent.
The liquid in these bottles is used to wash away surplus light that may otherwise cause decay in scientific components.

product.name: 5D Torus
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Construction)
product.description:
A specially manufactured container of five-dimensional tori.
Highly specific materials are required to construct shapes in extra dimensions. These tori are used to contain the strong fields generated in the manufacture of scientific components.

product.name: Superconducting Fibre
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Construction)
product.description:
A densely layered package of superconducting fibres.
Powerful, flexible, and water-resistant; the controlled magnetic weave of these fibres is vital in the creation of many scientific components.

product.name: Decrypted User Data
product.subtitle: Trade Goods
product.description:
A crate packed with hard drives, each of which contain vast amounts of decrypted user data.
Individually of low value, taken together these repositories can be processed and scanned for valuable data. This processing occurs in systems with advanced material economies.

product.name: Star Silk
product.subtitle: Trade Goods
product.description:
Several spools of star silk.
Star silk is woven on enormous solar looms in orbit around trading planets. Cosmic ray impact triggers the pattern of the weave, which can then be used in advanced material processing.

product.name: Comet Droplets
product.subtitle: Trade Goods
product.description:
Several canisters of comet droplets.
An elaborate trading name for chunks of meteorite, these rocks are nonetheless extremely valuable to the advanced material economies that can process them.

product.name: Ion Sphere
product.subtitle: Trade Goods
product.description:
A packed crate of ion spheres.
These delicate glass spheres house a small-scale replica of the upper atmosphere. Sparkly and hypnotic to look at, these baubles are also of importance in the manufacture of advanced material alloys.

product.name: Teleport Coordinators
product.subtitle: Trade Goods
product.description:
A bundle of precisely calibrated teleport coordinators.
These pin-prick sized circuits are vital to the delicate process of inserting reinforcing material into advanced alloys. They can also aid long-distance sales efforts.

product.name: Enormous Metal Cog
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Industrial)
product.description:
Several huge cogs.
Sturdy, well-made metal gears. While not advanced technology themselves, they're a vital component in countless pieces of high-tech machinery all over the galaxy.

product.name: Non-Stick Piston
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Industrial)
product.description:
Wrapped and greased pistons, ready for shipping.
High-tech components frequently require rapidly moving parts, or high-endurance motors. Without specially coated pistons, the failure rate of such parts would be significantly higher.

product.name: Mesh Decouplers
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Industrial)
product.description:
A crate of mesh decouplers.
The creation of high-tech components often involves accidental mesh-coupling. These decouplers are particularly powerful, being able to deploy six prongs simultaneously.

product.name: Holographic Crankshaft
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Industrial)
product.description:
Packed and separated data containers for holographic crankshafts.
Real crankshafts are frequently too large, noisy or hard-to-maintain for use in delicate machines. When faced with such a situation, high-tech manufacturers turn to these holographic substitutes.

product.name: Vector Compressors
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Industrial)
product.description:
A large crate of high-capacity vector compressors.
The creation of interstellar drives often requires dimensions to be condensed and then re-rendered. Such high-tech component manufacture would not be possible without industrial-grade compressors such as these.

product.name: Spark Canister
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Energy Source)
product.description:
A crate packed with spark canisters.
Many industrial and mining processes have considerable power demands. A counterpart to the slow release of a battery, spark canisters are able to meet these demands instantaneously.

product.name: Industrial-Grade Battery
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Energy Source)
product.description:
A packet of well-isolated industrial batteries.
Heavy-duty batteries are required to power deep level miningoperations. These highly durable sources can last for weeks, even in the extremes of heat and pressure found kilometres underground.

product.name: Ohmic Gel
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Energy Source)
product.description:
Several packets of ohmic gel.
Power-hungry mining operations are fraught with danger. Ohmic gel helps keep rapidly moving parts both insulated and lubricated.

product.name: Experimental Power Fluid
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Energy Source)
product.description:
Corrosion-resistant barrels of an experimental power fluid.
One barrel of this highly volatile concoction is enough to power a space station for weeks on end. Particularly valued by mining economies.

product.name: Fusion Core
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Energy Source)
product.description:
A slightly glowing bundle of fusion cores.
Power source, engine, high-capacity heater. A fusion core is the ultimate in deep-space power generation. Highly valued by mining economies looking to make their asteroid colonies more self-sufficient.

product.name: De-Scented Bottles
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Scientific)
product.description:
A loose collection of recycled pheromone bottles.
Vast quantities of pheromones are produced and distributed every day. This has spawned a lucrative trading opportunity for those willing to deal with the waste products. These glass jars have been thoroughly scrubbed and should pose no threat to the carrier.

product.name: Neutron Microscope
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Scientific)
product.description:
A parcel of neutron microscopes.
Scientific economies produce and consume large numbers of microscopes. However, some have slight defects that render them unsuitable for precision work. These are still a trading opportunity, in that they can be sold to those unable to tell the difference.

product.name: Instability Injector
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Scientific)
product.description:
A jumbled box of instability injectors.
Grand experiments often require a large number of variables to be changed in a very short period of time. An instability injector provides such a service. They can also be used to create chaos in market systems; such unethical behaviour represents an excellent trading opportunity.

product.name: Organic Piping
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Scientific)
product.description:
A vat of preserved organic piping. Still warm.
To avoid difficult ethical problems, many labs grow their test subjects on a component level. The leftovers can be profitable in trading economies with relaxed medical regulations.

product.name: Neural Duct
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Scientific)
product.description:
A box of fresh neural ducts.
Neural ducts are temporary inserts designed for a brief boost of concentration and productivity. Useful everywhere, these are highly valued in trading economies where competition between workers is fierce.

product.name: Dirt
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Minerals)
product.description:
Several tonnes of dirt.
Leftover dirt from mining operations. Residual metals can be extracted by specialists in manufacturing economies with the time and equipment to sift through it.

product.name: Unrefined Pyrite Grease
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Minerals)
product.description:
Large jars full of pyrite grease.
A fat solution with a high mineral content. This grease is highly valued by manufacturing economies, where it's used to keep large machinery oiled and glistening.

product.name: Bromide Salt
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Minerals)
product.description:
A crate of bromide salt.
The result of an extensive distillation and evaporation process, the bromide salt vats feed hungry factories in manufacturing systems.

product.name: Polychromatic Zirconium
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Minerals)
product.description:
A sack full of polychromatic zirconium crystals.
These crystals produce lenses of dazzling colour and near-indestructible hardness. Highly valuable in manufacturing economies.

product.name: Re-latticed Arc Crystal
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Minerals)
product.description:
A neatly wrapped parcel of re-latticed arc crystals.
Extremely rare mineral formations, arc crystals are in high demand in manufacturing economies, where their hardness and conductivity is vital to several industrial processes. They also make alluring (if dangerous) jewellery.

product.name: Decommissioned Circuits
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Technology)
product.description:
A collection of salvaged circuitry.
Power generation economies go through vast numbers of high-tech components. As such, the demand is present even for highly damaged circuits, to be scavenged for parts or just plugged wholesale into low-quality power cores.

product.name: Welding Soap
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Technology)
product.description:
Several large bars of welding soap.
Used in power generation systems to heat-clean metal diodes before they're fused into batteries.

product.name: Ion Capacitor
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Technology)
product.description:
A reinforced crate of ion capacitors.
These supercapacitors have an incredibly high energy density. In great demand in power generation economies.

product.name: Autonomous Positioning Unit
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Technology)
product.description:
A container of positioning units and associated wiring.
These APS units can be used to turn virtually any technology into a self-navigating system. Highly valuable in power generation economies, where they're used to remove conductive organic hands from the manufacturing process.

product.name: Quantum Accelerator
product.subtitle: Trade Goods (Technology)
product.description:
Several large quantum accelerator units.
Capable of propelling matter at unmeasurable speeds, these units are particularly important in power generation economies, where they're used to compress the energy stored in high-grade batteries.

product.name: Blood Salt
product.subtitle: Smuggled Goods
product.description:
Jars of murky, foul-smelling crystals. Produced in viscous evaporation traps, these organic salts are used in the manufacture of illegal pheromones.
Purchase is illegal at nearly all galactic trade terminals. Regular supply is only available within outlaw systems.
Selling banned goods into commercially-regulated space may be highly profitable.

product.name: Stolen DNA Samples
product.subtitle: Smuggled Goods
product.description:
Sealed vials of unregistered DNA samples, free of the standard biosecurity mechanisms that prevent unlawful genetic tampering.
Purchase is illegal at nearly all galactic trade terminals. Regular supply is only available within outlaw systems.
Selling banned goods into commercially-regulated space may be highly profitable.

product.name: Moon Ether
product.subtitle: Smuggled Goods
product.description:
A vat of highly volatile liquid. Its fumes are extremely flammable and a function as a powerful sedative.
Purchase is illegal at nearly all galactic trade terminals. Regular supply is only available within outlaw systems.
Selling banned goods into commercially-regulated space may be highly profitable.

product.name: Prismatic Feathers
product.subtitle: Smuggled Goods
product.description:
A vacuum-sealed bundle of dazzlingly beautiful feathers. The animal that gave its life for this impossible, kaleidoscopic, charm is long since extinct.
Purchase is illegal at nearly all galactic trade terminals. Regular supply is only available within outlaw systems.
Selling banned goods into commercially-regulated space may be highly profitable.

product.name: GrahGrah
product.subtitle: Smuggled Goods
product.description:
A canister of the now-banned Vy'keen battle gas, traditionally inhaled on the eve of battle.
Purchase is illegal at nearly all galactic trade terminals. Regular supply is only available within outlaw systems.
Selling banned goods into commercially-regulated space may be highly profitable.

product.name: Counterfeit Circuits
product.subtitle: Smuggled Goods
product.description:
Reversed-engineered from a captured space station core, these unlicensed circuits are used in a wide range of black- and grey-market technologies.
Purchase is illegal at nearly all galactic trade terminals. Regular supply is only available within outlaw systems.
Selling banned goods into commercially-regulated space may be highly profitable.

product.name: Banned Weapons
product.subtitle: Smuggled Goods
product.description:
Hacked together from the salvaged remains of Sentinel forces, these potent weapons are a favourite of outlaws across the galaxy.
Purchase is illegal at nearly all galactic trade terminals. Regular supply is only available within outlaw systems.
Selling banned goods into commercially-regulated space may be highly profitable.

product.name: First Spawn Relics
product.subtitle: Smuggled Goods
product.description:
Relics of the fallen Gek empire, condemned and banned by all the galaxy's major civilisations.
Purchase is illegal at nearly all galactic trade terminals. Regular supply is only available within outlaw systems.
Selling banned goods into commercially-regulated space may be highly profitable.

product.name: Atlas Stone
product.subtitle: Very high value curiosity
product.description:
A spherical gem that seems to pulsate with red light from its centre.
An extremely rare item often associated with ancient monolithic sites.

product.name: Captured Nanode
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: Atlas Seed containing zonally-shifted quasi-stellar substrate. Warning: do not allow matrix to commune with this dimensional space.

product.name: Englobed Shade
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: This Atlas Shell holds the remains of a parasitic space-borne lifeform, most likely of extra-dimensional origins.

product.name: Noospheric Orb
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: An Atlas Seed capable of resonating on humanoid telepathic frequencies; may attempt to subsume any subordinate intellect in close proximity.

product.name: Dark Matter
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: An Atlas Seed shell encompassing a void element harvested from the collapse state of the last universe. Toxic if ingested.

product.name: Dawn's End
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: Sculpted tau neutrino-boson matrix fixed within an irreplaceable Atlas Seed shell. May be semi-sentient.

product.name: Photic Jade
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: This irreplaceable Atlas Seed is a form of matter-adapted photons coalesced into physical solidity by unknown means.

product.name: State Phasure
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: For unknown reasons, this unique Atlas Seed has been phased out of alignment with this quantum reality. Contents cannot be determined.

product.name: Novae Reclaiment
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: Atlas Seed contains neutronium elements from a catastrophic supernova event that obliterated a sentient civilization in an earlier era.

product.name: Modified Quanta
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: This one-of-a-kind Atlas Seed holds an aesthetically pleasing mathematical construct salvaged from the simulation of an alternate reality.

product.name: Heart of the Sun
product.subtitle: Unique valuable curiosity
product.description: An Atlas Seed containing a time-locked quantum cilia suspended in a photonic shell. No others are known to exist.

product.name: Hex Core
product.subtitle: Contained Reality Glitch
product.description: This strange energy orb constantly vibrates, emitting a low-frequency drone. Slight variations in the pattern repeat over and over, almost as if it is attempting to relay a message.

product.name: Mealworms
product.subtitle: Fishing Bait
product.description:
A piece of specialist bait, designed to improve the size and rarity of your catch.
Locate your Fishing Rig and begin bait application with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Spicy Chum
product.subtitle: Fishing Bait
product.description:
A piece of specialist bait, designed to greatly improve the size and rarity of your catch.
Locate your Fishing Rig and begin bait application with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Bionic Lure
product.subtitle: Fishing Bait
product.description:
A specialist lure, designed to vastly improve the size and rarity of your catch. Of particular interest to anglers seeking legendary fish.
Locate your Fishing Rig and begin bait application with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Dangling Orb
product.subtitle: Fishing Bait
product.description:
A specialist lure, designed to attract diurnal fish.
Locate your Fishing Rig and begin bait application with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Shadow Lure
product.subtitle: Fishing Bait
product.description:
A specialist lure, designed to attract nocturnal fish.
Locate your Fishing Rig and begin bait application with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Magpulse Lure
product.subtitle: Fishing Bait
product.description:
A specialist lure, designed to attract fish that are only active during storms.
Locate your Fishing Rig and begin bait application with FE_ALT1.

product.name: Writhing Manuscript
product.subtitle: Cultist Document
product.description:
A translucent sheet of worm-vellum, inscribed with a fanatical text. It writhes when touched.
'The children were the first to notice. A thump thump thump, thundering deep below the sand. The first worm split the sky like black lightning as it leapt overhead. Worm by worm, they rose from the desert. Migrating. Every storm season, we each hope to be chosen. We arrange ourselves in lines across the desert, arms lifted to the sky. Anyone may enter the maw. We are all equal under the great worms.'

product.name: Wormskin Folio: 1
product.subtitle: Fleshy Scroll
product.description:
Ancient words are carved into this living document. They read:
'The worm lord towers above the dusty earth; its flesh becomes the sky. Our pathetic shells cannot follow, cannot reach its height, cannot reach its depths. We offer ourselves to the ground. We beg our sacrifice accepted.'

product.name: Wormskin Folio: 2
product.subtitle: Fleshy Scroll
product.description:
Ancient words are carved into this living document. They read:
'The dust was choking. Our eyes reddened and watered. But the truth was inescapable. The veins of the Atlas had surfaced.'

product.name: Wormskin Folio: 3
product.subtitle: Fleshy Scroll
product.description:
Ancient words are carved into this living document. They read:
'Now with every storm we beg to be chosen; Arms to the sky, faces to the dirt, calling out with all we have! When heavy raindrops hit the earth, the veins of Atlas answer. The rapture of our consumption is beyond words.'

product.name: Wormskin Folio: 4
product.subtitle: Fleshy Scroll
product.description:
Ancient words are carved into this living document. They read:
'We tumble as it swallows, but grip the slick walls as best we can - Oh! - to reach the gizzard still awake. Breathe it deeply! How our lungs gurgle! The slime clogs our noses and stings our eyes, though in this warm darkness, we are already blind.'

product.name: Wormskin Folio: 5
product.subtitle: Fleshy Scroll
product.description:
Ancient words are carved into this living document. They read:
'Curse the agony of regurgitation, Curse this this feeble flesh that still confines me! My brethren were reborn, rising from the blessed dust as fresh tendrils. Glistening capillaries to the great veins, slithering away into the sand. I will be patient. Until the next storm.'

product.name: Flesh Rope
product.subtitle: Intestinal Fragment
product.description:
The coiled remains of a Hungering Tendril's digestive tract. Though its meaty walls still convulse, there is surely no way for a fresh tendril to regrow from these meagre scraps...
Such specialist offal is rarely traded on the Galactic Exchange and is thus highly valuable.

product.name: Vile Spawn
product.subtitle: Hungering Embryo
product.description:
The fragile embryo of a Hungering Tendril, still dripping with mucal butter. It wails and recoils when touched.
May be extracted from embryotic sacs with the aid of a Visceral Synthesiser.

product.name: Pirate Map Fragment 1 of 3
product.subtitle: Scrambled Geographic Data
product.description:
Partial coordinate data, acquired from a troubled freighter captain. The chart is signed with a snippet of pirate manifesto:
"We Blight this new galaxy, as we did the last, as we will the next!"
The data is of value to pirate faction The Blight, who attempted to retrieve it by violent means.

product.name: Pirate Map Fragment 2 of 3
product.subtitle: Scrambled Geographic Data
product.description:
Partial coordinate data, acquired from a freighter shot down by pirate faction The Blight. The chart is signed with a snippet of pirate manifesto:
"The galactic tunnels belong to the Blight!"
The navigational information is corrupted, but appears to be linked to the data acquired from the freighter captain.

product.name: Pirate Map Fragment 3 of 3
product.subtitle: Scrambled Geographic Data
product.description:
Partial coordinate data, acquired from a starship crashed on an ocean bed. The chart is signed with a snippet of pirate manifesto:
"Annihilate every Traveller! All galaxies will fall to Blight!"
The navigational information is unreadable in its current state, but appears to be linked to the data acquired from the freighter captain.

product.name: Pirate Map
product.subtitle: Illicit Geographic Data
product.description: Reassembled treasure coordinate data, retrieved from the victims of pirate faction The Blight.

product.name: Rendezvous Beacon
product.subtitle: Navigational Data Recorder
product.description:
An unmarked navigation beacon, acquired from the wreck of a downed starship.
Use Activate Beacon (FE_ALT1) to deploy the beacon and retrace the final steps of the crashed ship.

product.name: Ticket to Freedom
product.subtitle: Secure System Pass
product.description:
"Glorious survivor! The promised star will be yours!"
A Secure system pass bearing the mark of the 'Voice of Freedom'. Select the pass and use Accept Invitation (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your navigation systems.

product.name: Dream Aerial
product.subtitle: Subconscious Access Device
product.description:
A signal receiver and amplifier, tuned to the wavelength of the unconscious mind. It is every colour all at once, splitting the surrounding light into a shimmering rainbow.
Warning: Carrying this antenna into deep space may attract the attention of cosmic megafauna.

product.name: Homeworld Repeater
product.subtitle: A Last Link Home
product.description:
A makeshift device, cobbled from salvaged electronic components kept in deep storage for many years. This jumble of wires will attempt to make contact with the last-known remnants of the freighter's homeworld.
Select the device and select Broadcast (FE_ALT1) to begin the location process.

product.name: Once-Useful Springs
product.subtitle: Multi-Tool Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of recycled Multi-Tool technology, created by a Multi-Tool Decommissioning Terminal aboard the Space Anomaly.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Handful of Cogs
product.subtitle: Multi-Tool Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of recycled Multi-Tool technology, created by a Multi-Tool Decommissioning Terminal aboard the Space Anomaly.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Reinforced Piping
product.subtitle: Multi-Tool Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of recycled Multi-Tool technology, created by a Multi-Tool Decommissioning Terminal aboard the Space Anomaly.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Thermal Panels
product.subtitle: Multi-Tool Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of recycled Multi-Tool technology, created by a Multi-Tool Decommissioning Terminal aboard the Space Anomaly.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Alloy Scraps
product.subtitle: Multi-Tool Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of recycled Multi-Tool technology, created by a Multi-Tool Decommissioning Terminal aboard the Space Anomaly.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Once-Useful Springs
product.subtitle: Starship Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Handful of Cogs
product.subtitle: Starship Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Reinforced Piping
product.subtitle: Starship Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Thermal Panels
product.subtitle: Starship Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Tank of Coolant
product.subtitle: Starship Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Spool of Nano-Cables
product.subtitle: Starship Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Recycled Circuitry
product.subtitle: Starship Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Subatomic Regulators
product.subtitle: Starship Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Compressed Indium Scraps
product.subtitle: Starship Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Starship AI Valves
product.subtitle: Starship Subcomponent
product.description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.
Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

product.name: Fragile Neural Stem
product.subtitle: Fragment of Life
product.description:
A delicate web of living tissue, this is the spark that will ignite a new lifeform into existence.
It requires careful attendance while it matures.

product.name: Fragile Heart
product.subtitle: Fragment of Life
product.description:
Though nothing more than a cluster of cells, it is already possible to detect the soft beating of this proto-heart.
It requires careful attendance while it matures.

product.name: Fragile Shell
product.subtitle: Fragment of Life
product.description:
Translucent and impossibly thin, this shell is no more than the merest breath of glass. And yet the potential is clear, a relentless multiplicative hardening adding constantly to its strength.
It requires careful attendance while it matures.

product.name: Growing Singularity
product.subtitle: Fragile Breath
product.description:
A slow knitting together of flesh, neurons and antimatter. The way this mind experiences the universe is beyond any imagining.
It requires careful attendance while it matures.

product.name: Mature Neural Stem
product.subtitle: Living Starship Organ
product.description:
This web of living tissue has grown its own metallic filaments, a mesh of silver and flesh. It crackles with its own electric charge, a network in need of its nodes.
It awaits its host.

product.name: Mature Heart Node
product.subtitle: Living Starship Organ
product.description:
Powerful and muscular, this bionic pump sits within a network of synthetic tubes. It twitches when touched, its rhythms sensitive to the presence of other thinking entities.
It awaits its host.

product.name: Hardened Shell
product.subtitle: Living Starship Organ
product.description:
Translucent, reflective, iridescent, impossibly strong. This shell swiftly reconfigures itself upon damage, knitting itself back together stronger than ever before. The newly formed bonds create a memory in glass, reflecting back the light absorbed at the moment of damage.
It awaits its host.

product.name: Singularity Core
product.subtitle: Living Starship Organ
product.description:
A sensitive arrangement of neurons in a stable orbit around a miniature black hole. The mind at the heart of this bionic miracle is free from the constraints of linear time, its experience an impossible web of myriad collected lifeforms.
It awaits its host.

product.name: Active Void Egg
product.subtitle: Agitated Curiosity
product.description:
An anomalous egg. Since the encounter with the bizarre deep-space 'creature', its strange music has grown more active, more agitated.
When touched, conjures a powerful vision of a world beset by powerful anomalies and strange colours.

product.name: Stirring Void Egg
product.subtitle: Agitated Curiosity
product.description:
An anomalous egg. Since the encounter with the bizarre deep-space 'creature', its strange music has grown more active, more agitated.
When touched, conjures a powerful vision of a dust-covered world of extreme storms.

product.name: Awakened Void Egg
product.subtitle: Agitated Curiosity
product.description:
An anomalous egg. Since the encounter with the bizarre deep-space 'creature', its strange music has grown more active, more agitated.
When touched, conjures a powerful vision of a water world covered in lush and verdant plantlife.

product.name: Cracking Void Egg
product.subtitle: Agitated Curiosity
product.description:
An anomalous egg. Since the encounter with the bizarre deep-space 'creature', its strange music has grown more active, more agitated.
When touched, conjures a powerful visions of a planet of strange anomalies, one minute a world of grass, the next a world of bizarre fungal growths...

product.name: Cracking Void Egg
product.subtitle: Agitated Curiosity
product.description:
An anomalous egg. Since the encounter with the bizarre deep-space 'creature', its strange music has grown more active, more agitated.
When touched, conjures a powerful visions of pink and blue, colours seared into the mind of the holder.
The Hunter SLASH The Reflection SLASH The Hunter SLASH The Spiral of Reality SLASH The Star Over WaterSLASH The Ascending Orb SLASH The Obscured Companion SLASH The Hunter SLASH The Lowly Insect SLASH The Anomaly SLASH The Sailor SLASH The Ocean King SLASH EUCLID EUCLID EUCLID

product.name: Consciousness Bridge
product.subtitle: Reactivated Neural Ladder
product.description:
A biomechanical construct, created to the design of an anonymous host.
This device appears to offer an interface between an individual entity and a greater shared consciousness. It appears derived from, but not attuned to, Korvax technology.

product.name: Pulsating Core
product.subtitle: Superheated Life Fragment
product.description:
A biomechanical construct, created to the design of an anonymous host.
Organic, but aglow with heat and possessing a highly-pressurised inner vessel. This 'device' is part pump, and part accelerated evolutionary chamber.

product.name: Impossible Membrane
product.subtitle: Auto-Regenerating Lifeform
product.description:
A biomechanical construct, created to the design of an anonymous host.
A fine mesh of tightly woven fibre. Micro-organisms embedded within the weave allow it to regenerate endlessly, a perfect and infinite bionic skin.

product.name: Seeds of Glass
product.subtitle: Frozen Archive
product.description:
A biomechanical construct, created to the design of an anonymous host.
Capsules of genetic material, encased in a film of living glass. Shared memories swim in the their reflective surfaces, waiting for their chance to shape the life within.

product.name: Archived Soul
product.subtitle: Bionic Ark
product.description:
A biomechanical construct, created to the design of an anonymous host.
A fusion of complex circuitry and the ineffable glitch of the Traveller. Such a calculus might bind realities together, or tear them into mere simulated fragments.

product.name: Soul Chamber (0%)
product.subtitle: Bionic Ark
product.description:
A biomechanical construct, created to the design of an anonymous host.
A fusion of complex circuitry and the ineffable glitch of the Traveller. Such a calculus might bind realities together, or tear them into mere simulated fragments.

product.description:
