product.description:
A biomechanical construct, created to the design of an anonymous host.
A fusion of complex circuitry and the ineffable glitch of the Traveller. Such a calculus might bind realities together, or tear them into mere simulated fragments.

product.name: Living Water
product.subtitle: Glassy Indeterminance
product.description:
Unusual surface interactions cause this liquid to quickly split into small, perfect, spheres. Light refracted through one such sphere splits into colours beyond description.
Of unknown origin.

product.name: Encrypted Navigation Computer
product.subtitle: Starship Component
product.description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship navigation, flight stabilisation, and external sensors.
This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

product.name: Encrypted Navigation Computer
product.subtitle: Starship Component
product.description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship navigation, flight stabilisation, and external sensors.
This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

product.name: Navigation Computer
product.subtitle: Starship Component
product.description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship navigation, flight stabilisation, and external sensors.
The part appears intact, functional, and ready to be installed in a new ship.

product.name: Encrypted Communicator Control Unit
product.subtitle: Starship Component
product.description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to ship-to-ship communications, quantum transportation, and coordinate tracing.
This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

product.subtitle: Starship Component
product.description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to ship-to-ship communications, quantum transportation, and coordinate tracing.
This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

product.name: Communicator Control Unit
product.subtitle: Starship Component
product.description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to ship-to-ship communications, quantum transportation, and coordinate tracing.
The part appears intact, functional, and ready to be installed in a new ship.

product.name: Encrypted User Authenticator
product.subtitle: Starship Component
product.description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship-to-Exosuit synchronisation and security.
This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

product.name: Encrypted User Authenticator
product.subtitle: Starship Component
product.description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship-to-Exosuit synchronisation and security.
This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

product.name: User Authenticator
product.subtitle: Starship Component
product.description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship-to-Exosuit synchronisation and security.
The part appears intact, functional, and ready to be installed in a new ship.

product.name: Undamaged Drone Shell
product.subtitle: Sentinel Debris
product.description:
The shell of a Sentinel drone, all that remains after its destruction in combat. While the exterior is physically intact, its internals have been severely burned.
Given the right tools and several exotic components, it may be possible to repair it.

product.name: Nanite Filament
product.subtitle: Drone Component
product.description:
A thin, shimmering thread, once owned by Iteration: Gemini. This impossible fibre, once a treasured keepsake, sings on the wavelength of the Space Anomaly.
A valuable and exotic component, this would be of great use to Iteration: Tethys in repairing the shattered Drone.

product.name: Portal Phylactery
product.subtitle: Drone Component
product.description:
A vial of the portal's blue amber, given to you by Iteration: Mercury. The ether of the Atlas itself, this is primeval liquid from which it weaves the multiverse.
A valuable and exotic component, this would be of great use to Iteration: Tethys in repairing the shattered Drone.

product.name: Beads of Glass
product.subtitle: Drone Component
product.description:
A handful of glassy orbs, once owned by Specialist Polo. Their pearlescent surface does not reflect the world around them, offering instead a mirror to different reality.
A valuable and exotic component, this would be of great use to Iteration: Tethys in repairing the shattered Drone.

product.name: Sentinel Flare (Off)
product.subtitle: Sentinel Communicator
product.description:
A specialist device, created by Iteration Tethys. Its primary function is to hail your reconstructed Sentinel drone.
Select the device and use Activate Flare (FE_ALT1) to signal [The Drone].
While this flare is active in your Exosuit inventory, the drone will stay by your side while planetside.

product.name: Sentinel Flare
product.subtitle: Sentinel Communicator
product.description:
A specialist device, created by Iteration Tethys. Its primary function is to hail your reconstructed Sentinel drone.
Select the device and use Deactivate Broadcast (FE_ALT1) to stop signalling [ The Sentry ].
While this flare is active in your Exosuit inventory, the drone will stay by your side while planetside.

product.name: Pristine Brain
product.subtitle: Anomalous Material
product.description:
Shifting nanite clusters sewn together with a pugneum filament, this circuit is painfully hot to the touch. A sinister purple light leaks from deep within its wiring, changing in intensity as it watches its holder.
Unlike most Walker brains, this one has survived its violent extraction and is pristine and undamaged. It could potentially be installed in a new vessel...

product.name: Hacked Brain
product.subtitle: Anomalous Material
product.description:
Shifting nanite clusters sewn together with a pugneum filament, this circuit is painfully hot to the touch. The purple light that leaks from within its wiring has softened, as if it has become less hostile.
Previously embedded within a Sentinel Walker, this semi-organic computer has been altered by Iteration: Tethys. Its new-found freedom from the Atlas has been noted by the universe.

product.name: Radiant Brain
product.subtitle: Anomalous Material
product.description:
Shifting nanite clusters sewn together with a pugneum filament, this circuit is painfully hot to the touch. The purple light that leaks from within its wiring has softened, as if it has become less hostile.
Previously embedded within a Sentinel Walker, this semi-organic computer has been altered by both Iteration: Tethys and a Messenger of the Atlas.

product.name: Harmonic Brain
product.subtitle: Harnessed Sentience
product.description:
The central processing unit of a Sentinel interceptor ship. The circuitry appears stable, pulsing with a regular electrical heartbeat. It no longer reacts angrily to my presence.
Status: DOCILE
Install this unit in a disabled Sentinel ship to unlock its vestigial cockpit and enable manual piloting.

product.name: Deep-Space Lure
product.subtitle: Anomaly Attraction Device
product.description:
A single-use device for locating a deep-space Gaseous Sentience. The lure generates an electromagnetic field of an intriguing nature to these highly advanced lifeforms.
Select the Lure and use Generate Field (FE_ALT1) to begin the location process.

product.name: Memory Fragment
product.subtitle: Rogue Technology Echo
product.description:
The shattered remnants of a previous existence. It whispers, an unknowable name deep within its fibres.
The memory will manifest as an important technology upgrade to aid you in this iteration. Absorb this memory with FE_ALT1.
DEATH IS NOT THE END SLASH THE LOOP CONTINUES

product.name: Whalesong Flute
product.subtitle: Cosmic Melody Instrument
product.description:
A powerful but mellow musical instrument, capable of relaying song through space via gently undulating electromagnetic waves.
Use Relay Song (FE_ALT1) while in deep space to broadcast the flute's melody...

product.name: Memory Resonator
product.subtitle: Loop Manifestation Technology
product.description:
A highly familar, entirely novel, piece of technology, designed by Specialist Polo as part of their loop research efforts. It synchronises its vibrations with the underlying song of the universe, allowing it to reveal memory hotspots within the loop.
Begin the resonance alignment process with FE_ALT1.

product.name: A Dreadful Wailing
product.subtitle: Loop Artifact
product.description:
A relentless, despairing cry that will not let you rest. Listen at a personally significant location to remember what has been forgotten.
DEATH IS NOT THE END SLASH THE LOOP CONTINUES

product.name: Memory Fragment
product.subtitle: Rogue Technology Echo
product.description:
The shattered remnants of a previous existence. It whispers, an unknowable name deep within its fibres.
The memory will manifest as an important technology upgrade to aid you in this iteration. Absorb this memory with FE_ALT1.
DEATH IS NOT THE END SLASH THE LOOP CONTINUES

product.name: Memory Imprint I
product.subtitle: Loop Artifact
product.description:
A memory is burned into this strange material, an echo of another lifetime...
"The leviathan was like nothing I've ever seen. So vast as to blot out the sun. I wanted it. I deserve to have it! It will be mine. But it resisted, would not come quietly. It wailed and it wailed as the infra-knife carved into its meat. It almost took me down with it. Perhaps it has. Perhaps..."

product.name: Memory Imprint II
product.subtitle: Loop Artifact
product.description:
A memory is burned into this strange material, an echo of another lifetime...
"The same nightmare chases me: a wail fills my cockpit, the dashboard controls gummed with blood. I have given up sleep. I pulse past blurred stars. And then there it was: majestic, drifting in the ocean of space. Something inside me burns for it. I must have it. Its great fin flexed toward my ship, and my hull was gone..."

product.name: Memory Imprint III
product.subtitle: Loop Artifact
product.description:
A memory is burned into this strange material, an echo of another lifetime...
"Today should have been the day. Their hour was at hand. It must be mine. They are like nothing I've ever seen. Everything was prepared. But it moved faster than I thought possible. As though it knew where I would fly, before I knew it myself. A great tentacle hugged my ship, my cockpit - pressing my suit down to the bone. This suit will be my grave."

product.name: Memory Imprint IV
product.subtitle: Loop Artifact
product.description:
A memory is burned into this strange material, an echo of another lifetime...
"The chase is over, and I have lost. The giants will endure, and I will end. As I plummeted from the sky, I saw another ship falling alongside mine. Then another, and another. I may have imagined it. The misfiring of a dying mind... Those creatures were so beautiful. But it is all ended now. They will haunt my thoughts no longer."

product.name: Memory Imprint V
product.subtitle: Loop Artifact
product.description:
A memory is burned into this strange material, an echo of another lifetime...
"I came face-to-face with a creature more beautiful and bizarre than anything I have ever seen. Despite no discernible eyes, I do not believe it is blind. It was huge, glorious, serene. But then - with a flick of its tentacles, it was gone. I have thought of nothing else since. I can only think of the whale. whale. whale. wail."

product.name: Utopia Supply Drop Beta
product.subtitle: Utopia Foundation Supply Cache
product.description:
To support the workers bravely terraforming the lava-filled wastes of planet Pehaelump, the Utopia Overseers are glad to supply this cache of vital goods.
Select the supply pack and use Open Package (FE_ALT1) to collect your Utopia Foundation supplies, as well as details of your next assignment.

product.name: Utopia Supply Drop Gamma
product.subtitle: Utopia Foundation Supply Cache
product.description:
To support the workers valiantly toiling on the steep, exposed mountains of planet New Sesto, the Utopia Overseers are glad to supply this cache of vital goods.
Select the supply pack and use Open Package (FE_ALT1) to collect your Utopia Foundation supplies, as well as details of your next assignment.

product.name: Utopia Supply Drop Delta
product.subtitle: Utopia Foundation Supply Cache
product.description:
To support the surviving workers who now confront the [ REDACTED ] of planet Idalth XIV, the Utopia Overseers are glad to supply this cache of vital goods.
Select the supply pack and use Open Package (FE_ALT1) to collect your Utopia Foundation supplies, as well as details of your next assignment.

product.name: Utopia Supply Drop Epsilon
product.subtitle: Utopia Foundation Supply Cache
product.description:
To support the workers who so nobly rebuild in the sucking quagmires of planet Endil A8, the Utopia Overseers are glad to supply this cache of vital goods.
Select the supply pack and use Open Package (FE_ALT1) to collect your Utopia Foundation supplies, as well as details of your next assignment.

product.name: Settlement Coordinates Beta
product.subtitle: Utopia Foundation Settlement Chart
product.description:
A map from the Utopia Foundation, showing personalised coordinates for your target construction site.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

product.name: Settlement Coordinates Gamma
product.subtitle: Utopia Foundation Settlement Chart
product.description:
A map from the Utopia Foundation, showing personalised coordinates for your target construction site.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

product.name: Settlement Coordinates Delta
product.subtitle: Utopia Foundation Settlement Chart
product.description:
A map from the Utopia Foundation, showing personalised coordinates for your target construction site.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

product.name: Settlement Coordinates Epsilon
product.subtitle: Utopia Foundation Settlement Chart
product.description:
A map from the Utopia Foundation, showing personalised coordinates for your target construction site.
Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

product.name: Construction History
product.subtitle: Classified Dossier
product.description:
This report records the history of a planetary facility forming part of the Utopia Project. Several sections are curiously absent.
DS 2368 :: Facility founded. Plasma deep drill rig operational. DS 2384 :: Return growth steady at 1%. DS 2400 :: Overseers querying growth rate. DS 2416 :: Orbital exp. approved. Station trade booming. DS 2432 :: [Redacted] hazard encountered. DS 2448 :: [Redacted] DS 2464 :: Utopia Project launched. DS 2464 :: Facility restored. Plasma deep drill rig operational. Trade routes re-opened. DS 2480 :: [Redacted] DS 2496 :: Facility restored. Plasma deep drill rig operational. Trade routes re-opened. DS 2512 :: [Redacted]
The last two entries are repeated over and over, across hundreds of pages.

product.name: Construct Head
product.subtitle: Salvaged Autophage Component
product.description:
The circuit cage and primary control sensors for a primitive automaton.
Plans for this unit were extracted from an autophage left at an abandoned junker's camp.

product.name: Construct Shell
product.subtitle: Salvaged Autophage Component
product.description:
The principal metallic carapace for a primitive automaton.
Plans for this unit were extracted from an autophage left at an abandoned junker's camp.

product.name: Construct Limbs
product.subtitle: Salvaged Autophage Component
product.description:
A set of complex hydraulic tubes and various gripping surfaces that form a pair of usable arms for a primitive automaton.
Plans for this unit were extracted from an autophage left at an abandoned junker's camp.

product.name: Construct Legs
product.subtitle: Salvaged Autophage Component
product.description:
A bipedal movement platform for a primitive automaton.
Plans for this unit were extracted from an autophage left at an abandoned junker's camp.

product.name: Atlantid Reactor
product.subtitle: Salvaged Autophage Component
product.description:
The central reactor unit and primary fuel source for a primitive automaton.
Plans for this unit were extracted from an autophage left at an abandoned junker's camp.

product.name: Seed of Dreams
product.subtitle: Voice of the Wordless Atlas
product.description:
A seed of creation, a tiny drop of the infinity of the Atlas. This mere atom contains boundless noise, each tiny vibration the hopes and dreams of entire lifetimes.
Use FE_ALT1 to resonate the seed, converting its waveform into the audible range.

product.name: Seed of Power
product.subtitle: Voice of the Wordless Atlas
product.description:
A seed of creation, a tiny drop of the infinity of the Atlas. A particle of indescribable energy, it is unclear how to continues to exist within this reality.
Use FE_ALT1 to resonate the seed, converting its waveform into the audible range.

product.name: Seed of Will
product.subtitle: Voice of the Wordless Atlas
product.description:
A seed of creation, a tiny drop of the infinity of the Atlas. A flash of pure light and fury, this seed contains the unsuppressable need to exist.
Use FE_ALT1 to resonate the seed, converting its waveform into the audible range.

product.name: Seed of Life
product.subtitle: Voice of the Wordless Atlas
product.description:
A seed of creation, a tiny drop of the infinity of the Atlas. Though a mere speck, this seed contains the potential for an entire universe; a boundless, glorious expansion.
Use FE_ALT1 to resonate the seed, converting its waveform into the audible range.

product.name: Seed of Hope
product.subtitle: Voice of the Wordless Atlas
product.description:
A seed of creation, a perfect droplet of infinity. A gift from the Atlas, this is a tiny fragment of all the universe's dreams, will, power and life; a fragment of the Travellers; a fragment of myself.
Use FE_ALT1 to resonate the seed, converting its waveform into the audible range.

product.name: Echo Seed
product.subtitle: Crystalline Sentience Cage
product.description:
The Seed is an echo of life, the last reverberations of a living being.
This sentience was fused with a lattice of Atlantideum, as though it had germinated together with the crystal.

product.name: Echo Collective
product.subtitle: Consciousness Housing
product.description:
A shifting vortex of atlantideum, attuned to the growing collective will housed inside Nada's Prime Terminal. Current sentience threshold: ??%.
The grains oscillate in a pattern, but the message is unintelligible.

product.name: Fibreglass Grip
product.subtitle: Voltaic Component
product.description:
A strap of flexible resin, securely wrapped around a steel pole.
One of three core components, this forms the backbone of a traditional Autophage Voltaic Staff.

product.name: Atlantideum Chamber
product.subtitle: Voltaic Component
product.description:
A compact box of circuitry and ethereal crystals, painstakingly wired by hand.
One of three core components, this forms the core of a traditional Autophage Voltaic Staff.

product.name: Concentric Transducer
product.subtitle: Voltaic Component
product.description:
An electrified arrangement of mechanical wheels. Transforms stored energy into beams or propulsion, according to the specifications of weapons and laser attachments.
One of three core components, this forms the head of a traditional Autophage Voltaic Staff.

product.name: Memory of Ocean
product.subtitle: Fragment of the Atlas
product.description:
This memory is a fragment of the cosmos, one filament in an infinite galaxy of possible pasts and possible futures.
Reach the stars and then use FE_ALT1 to awaken this memory.

product.name: Memory of Conquest
product.subtitle: Fragment of the Atlas
product.description:
This memory is a fragment of the cosmos, one filament in an infinite galaxy of possible pasts and possible futures.
Reach the stars and then use FE_ALT1 to awaken this memory.

product.subtitle: Fragment of the Atlas
product.description:
This memory is a fragment of the cosmos, one filament in an infinite galaxy of possible pasts and possible futures.

product.name: Memory of the Void
product.subtitle: Fragment of the Atlas
product.description:
This memory is a fragment of the cosmos, one filament in an infinite galaxy of possible pasts and possible futures.
Reach the stars and then use FE_ALT1 to awaken this memory.

product.name: Surge Battery
product.subtitle: High Voltage Energy Pack
product.description:
A high-powered battery pack, designed to release a significant charge in a short space of time.
Used to power the high energy needs of Signal Boosters as they survey planets for distant buildings.

product.name: Message in a Bottle
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A sealed bottle, found floating in the water. There appears to be a message from the Angler inside.
Use FE_ALT1 to unseal the bottle and read the message within.

product.name: Message in a Bottle
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A sealed bottle, found floating in the water. There appears to be a message from the Angler inside.
Use FE_ALT1 to unseal the bottle and read the message within.

product.name: Message in a Bottle
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A sealed bottle, found floating in the water. There appears to be a message from the Angler inside.
Use FE_ALT1 to unseal the bottle and read the message within.

product.name: Message in a Bottle
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A sealed bottle, found floating in the water. There appears to be a message from the Angler inside.
Use FE_ALT1 to unseal the bottle and read the message within.

product.name: The Angler's Diary
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A message recovered from a bottle stowed beneath the seat of the starship. It reads:
"I finally feel like I'm getting closer. A trader on Gisto offered me solid-gold information on its location, for a price. And so I'm selling my ship. I'll miss the Celeste, but I have to know if the rumours are true. I hope whoever buys you takes good care of you..." %PARTY_1%

product.name: The Angler's Diary
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A scrap of paper recovered from a bottle found bobbling in the water. The message on it reads:
"The rumours were true. It's out there, I can feel it. Not here, but somewhere. The water calls to me, I just need to follow its voice..." %PARTY_3%

product.name: The Angler's Diary
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A scrap of paper recovered from a bottle found bobbling in the water. The message on it reads:
"I saw it in my dreams last night. Scales like fire and eyes of pure starlight. It sang to me, a song of hope and longing. It wants me to find it, I know it. I must be closing in." %PARTY_4%

product.name: The Angler's Diary
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A scrap of paper recovered from a bottle found bobbling in the water. The message on it reads:
"I was right! It was here! After all these light years, all the doubts, it's finally mine. Oh, and how it shines! Like fire in the water, beautiful, impossible..." %PARTY_5%

product.name: The Angler's Diary
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A scrap of paper recovered from a bottle found bobbling in the water. The message on it reads:
"The fire has faded from my catch's scales, and my dreams have soured. I thrash through the night. My skin itches, damp and clammy. Salt seeps from my pores. It longs to be free. I cannot keep it contained like this. It must be free. I must be free..."

product.name: The Angler
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description:
Fire dances across the scales of this impossible marine being. Its starlit eyes stare back at you with a meaning far deeper than any fish should know. As they stare, the world around you fades away.
The sound of water fills your ears. It wants to be free. You want to be free...

product.name: Any Edible Bone
product.subtitle: Ingredient Category
product.description:
A highly refined food product, created in the Nutrient Processor. It has both the identifying shapes and aromas of an actual food item, in stark contrast with conventional nutrition paste or pellets.
Food such as this can be highly valuable.

product.name: Any Seafood
product.subtitle: Ingredient Category
product.description:
A piece of seafood, created in the Nutrient Processor. Food such as this can be highly valuable.
Can be consumed as it stands or subjected to further processing.

product.name: Any Raw Seafood
product.subtitle: Ingredient Category
product.description:
A piece of seafood, created in the Nutrient Processor. Food such as this can be highly valuable.
Can be consumed as it stands or subjected to further processing.

product.name: Any Cooked Seafood
product.subtitle: Ingredient Category
product.description:
A piece of seafood, created in the Nutrient Processor. Food such as this can be highly valuable.
Can be consumed as it stands or subjected to further processing.

product.name: Elixir of Glass
product.subtitle: Otherworldly Concoction
product.description:
A slight membrane has begun to form over this viscous purple liquid. Beneath its glassy surface it swirls slowly, forming syrupy currents of its own accord.
The elixir will maintain your local boundary integrity and prevent the intrusion of the horrors beyond.
Consume the elixir with FE_ALT1 or inject it directly into the Anomaly Suppressor from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Elixir of Quicksilver
product.subtitle: Otherworldly Concoction
product.description:
The liquid's silvered surface forms a perfect mirror, your own face reflected back as you examine it. But the more you stare, the less perfect the mirror becomes. The face in the image moves. It blinks. It -
Consume the elixir with FE_ALT1 to reveal the location of nearby portals.

product.name: Elixir of BloodPR_10<>
product.subtitle: Otherworldly Concoction
product.description:
Thick and warm, the liquid in this jar is both deeply comforting and deeply unsettling, both familiar and repulsive at the same time.
A shape forms in the surface, impossible and yet unmistakeable: PR_10.
Present the elixir at a portal, or consume it with FE_ALT1 to commune with those beyond the boundaries of reality.

product.name: Elixir of Water
product.subtitle: Otherworldly Concoction
product.description:
The water in this vessel seems to stretch on forever, plunging down to dizzying depths, far beyond what the container could possibly hold.
Consume the elixir with FE_ALT1. Beware what lurks in the deep water...

product.name: Elixir of BloodPR_4<>
product.subtitle: Otherworldly Concoction
product.description:

Present the elixir at a portal, or consume it with FE_ALT1 to commune with those beyond the boundaries of reality.

product.name: Memories of Atlantid
product.subtitle: Forgotten Void Data
product.description:
The howling of an advanced intelligence banished to oblivion, a reverberation in sentience and crystal.
Each memory in this data packet is an entire reality in itself, bearing the fingerprint of countless lives. The Atlas will recognise this seed.

product.name: Reality Anchor
product.subtitle: Spacetime Tether
product.description:
A ancient newborn star exists only at the strange intersection points of time and space, where the dissonance is strongest.
To bind such a place to the rest of reality, a proper anchor is required...

product.name: Reality Anchor
product.subtitle: Spacetime Tether
product.description:
A ancient newborn star exists only at the strange intersection points of time and space, where the dissonance is strongest.
To bind such a place to the rest of reality, a proper anchor is required...

product.name: Reality Anchor
product.subtitle: Spacetime Tether

product.name: Anomalous Scaffold
product.subtitle: Crystalline Breach
product.description:
To bridge between realities requires a scaffold and a seed.
This crystalline propagation matrix will allow the breach to become the bridge, the seed by which a new reality can bloom.

product.name: Orbital Uplink
product.subtitle: Teleport Network Tunnel
product.description:
This device bypasses the mainstream teleport network, providing a direct link to the local Space Station.
Select the device and use Activate Teleport (FE_ALT1) to instantly transfer to the nearest Space Station.

product.name: Milk
product.subtitle: Raw Ingredient
product.description:
An animal byproduct, this nutritious morsel can be easily farmed without harm to the animal that produces it.
Process in a Nutrient Processor to generate edible products.

product.name: Freighter Recolouring
product.subtitle: Freighter Customisation Option
product.description:
Unlocks this colour for freighter customisation.
A self-replicating cloud of highly pigmatised nano-robots swarm the capital ship, changing its external appearance.

Transport evidence of your fishing achievements around in your own personalised cranium/aquarium interchange.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.subtitle: Customised Fishing Equipment
product.description:
An exclusive Fishing Rig Customisation, altering the appearance of the float.
Transform the appearance of your fishing equipment from the fishing rig's bait management page.

product.name: Exotic Plumage Float
product.subtitle: Customised Fishing Equipment
product.description:
An exclusive Fishing Rig Customisation, altering the appearance of the float.
Transform the appearance of your fishing equipment from the fishing rig's bait management page.

product.subtitle: Customised Fishing Equipment
product.description:
An exclusive Fishing Rig Customisation, altering the appearance of the float.
Transform the appearance of your fishing equipment from the fishing rig's bait management page.

product.subtitle: Customised Fishing Equipment
product.description:
An exclusive Fishing Rig Customisation, altering the appearance of the float.

product.name: Octopus Float
product.subtitle: Customised Fishing Equipment
product.description:
An exclusive Fishing Rig Customisation, altering the appearance of the float.
Transform the appearance of your fishing equipment from the fishing rig's bait management page.

product.name: Salvaged Hand Float
product.subtitle: Customised Fishing Equipment
product.description:
An exclusive Fishing Rig Customisation, altering the appearance of the float.
Transform the appearance of your fishing equipment from the fishing rig's bait management page.

product.name: Aeron Turbojet
product.subtitle: Exosuit Visual Enhancement
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
A titanium flightpack, assembled from technology stolen from the Sentinel horde. Its engines are precooled with a constant flow of pugneum and nitrogen, ensuring fuel-efficient and deadly silent operation.
Warning: do not unseal pugneum containment chamber without protective gear.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Shroud of Freedom
product.subtitle: Unlockable Hood
product.description:
A flowing silken shroud, bestowed upon those who would sing with Voice of Freedom.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit with this exclusive Appearance Override at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Starborn Phoenix
product.subtitle: Exclusive Spacecraft
product.description:
An exclusive reforged starship, commemorating a time when Travellers old and new joined together to voyage across the stars.
This unusual ship is optimised for effortless gliding during flight, while a localised vector field allows the craft to hover above solid planes.
Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Horizon Vector NX
product.subtitle: Exclusive Spacecraft
product.description:
An exclusive Starship. This compact fighter craft boasts superior manoeuvrability, giving it an edge in space combat.
Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Infinite Neon Mark XXII
product.subtitle: Exclusive Multifunction Survival Device
product.description:
An exclusive Multi-Tool. This brightly-coloured rifle offers the user cutting-edge defensive capabilities in ground combat situations.
Take this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Streamlined Jetpack Unit
product.subtitle: Exosuit Visual Enhancement
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
A streamlined and lightweight backpack unit, featuring an elegant single-thruster design. This exclusive exosuit augmentation commemorates completion of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Golden First Spawn Battle Mask
product.subtitle: Unlockable Helmet
product.description:
An aggressive Exosuit Appearance Override, modeled on the war helmets of the ancient Gek. This special edition is cast in a durable and precious alloy.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Golden Vector
product.subtitle: Exclusive Spacecraft
product.description:
An exclusive golden edition of the iconic Alpha Vector Starship, commemorating completion of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.
This highly-manoeuvrable spacecraft is constructed from a durable and precious alloy, and coated in a tough layer of fibrous insulation to endure many lifetimes' worth of rigorous space exploration.
Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Title: 'Pioneer'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Pioneers Expedition Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases. This decal features the golden edition of the iconic Alpha Vector Starship, and commemorates completion of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.

product.name: Pioneers Expedition Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description: Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'. Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Atlas Firework Pack
product.subtitle: Pyrotechnics Multi-Pack
product.description:
A three-variety pack of luxury fireworks. These stunning pyrotechnics render the likeness of an Atlas Interface, in bursts of indium, gold and cadmium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Blue-Red Atlas Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
A stunning pyrotechnic rendition of an Atlas Interface, rendered in a burst of indium and cadmium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Gold-Blue Atlas Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
A stunning pyrotechnic rendition of an Atlas Interface, rendered in a burst of gold and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Red-Gold Atlas Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
A stunning pyrotechnic rendition of an Atlas Interface, rendered in a burst of cadmium and gold. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Flesh Launcher
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
A luxury firework. These organic pyrotechnics rocket into the sky and explode in a splatter of slime, plasma and wormlets. Ignite to create disgusting displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Flesh Launcher Pack
product.subtitle: Pyrotechnics Multi-Pack
product.description:
A pack of luxury fireworks. These organic pyrotechnics rocket into the sky and explode in a splatter of slime, mucus, and wormlets. Ignite to create disgusting displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Pioneers Expedition Flag
product.subtitle: Unlockable Decoration
product.description: An exclusive buildable base ornament. This elaborate, gold-fringed flag features a rendition of the iconic Alpha Vector Starship. Plant in a habitable base to commemorate completion of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.

product.name: SSV Normandy SR1
product.subtitle: Exclusive Frigate
product.description:
The SSV Normandy SR1 is a one-of-a-kind 'deep scout' frigate. This legendary ship represents peace and cooperation between races, and commemorates completion of the 'Beachhead' Expedition.
Recruiting this frigate will add it to your fleet. Manage your frigate fleet from a Fleet Command Room aboard your freighter, and consult your Navigator to deploy frigates on lucrative expeditions.

product.name: Historiographical Dosimeter
product.subtitle: Personal Reality Flux Monitor
product.description:
Nada has detected a new pattern emerging in the stories of the Gek, Korvax, and Vy'keen.
The dosimeter measures exposure to historiographical flux around key artifact sites. Recordings of unusual historical shifts will enable Nada to trace the signal.
Assist Nada and Polo in their research by using this device to transmit historial data from alien artifact sites.

product.name: Title: 'Renegade'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the 'Beachhead' Expedition, and your success in tracking the renegade historical echo.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Title: 'Paragon'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the 'Beachhead' Expedition, and your success in tracking the renegade historical echo.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Beachhead Expedition Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal commemorates the collective effort of the Travellers in mapping the Histiographical Flux and tracking the renegade echo during the Beachhead Expedition.

product.name: Beachhead Expedition Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the 'Beachhead' Expedition, and your success in tracking the renegade historical echo.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Holographic Chart Projector
product.subtitle: System Simulation Device
product.description:
A decorative model of a star system, complete with holographic representations of various stellar objects.
A small, self-contained, perpetual motion device generates the small amount of power required to continue the projection.

product.name: Bio-Lantern
product.subtitle: Organic Lighting
product.description:
A secure biological containment vessel, complete with its own purified internal atmosphere.
Pre-installed bioluminescent insects provide a soft, flickering light, perfect for those seeking natural lighting for their base.

product.name: Title: 'Globemaster'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the 'Cartographers' Expedition, and your success in documenting and then escaping from the expedition planet.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Cartographers Expedition Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal commemorates your success in documenting and then escaping from the expedition planet.

product.name: Cartographers Expedition Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the 'Cartographers' Expedition, and your success in documenting and then escaping from the expedition planet.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Title: 'Worm Lord'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the Emergence expedition.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Emergence Expedition Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal commemorates completion of the Emergence expedition.

product.name: Emergence Expedition Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description: Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the Emergence expedition. Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Jetpack Bubble Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Specially conditioned oil is added to the jetpack's exhaust jets, creating a stream of pearlescent bubbles as it operates.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Ghastly Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Attaches an active bio-chamber to the Jetpack's exhaust nozzles. During flight, the thrusters warm and expel the slimy juice contained within. Note: Contains living worms. Ejected worms may infest local ecosystems.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Whispering Companion Egg
product.subtitle: Horrific Spawn
product.description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!
A shadow writhes beneath the egg's protective membrane.
Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be nightmarish and soul-consuming.

product.name: Sandworm Egg
product.subtitle: Titanic Spawn
product.description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!
Curled within the shell is a hungry wormlet, its coils rippling restlessly.
Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be cursed and insatiable.

product.name: Titanic Trophy
product.subtitle: Ornamental Skull
product.description:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.
This many-toothed skull once belonged to a large legless vertebrate, cousin to the titan sandworm. The powerful jaws can exert enough force to crush a Multi-Tool, and the bones of most creatures.

product.name: Feasting Casque
product.subtitle: Unlockable Helmet
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Redistribute your facial organs and alarm other explorers by assuming the appearance of a sandworm cultist. This bio-silicone helmet is sealed against all known planetary hazards, but may feel slightly clammy to the wearer.
Ritualistically transform the head of your Vy'keen appearance at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Reality Glitch Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
The jetpack exhaust is fitted with a high-concentrate pugneum dispenser. When the jets are activated, the resulting reaction carves miniature distortions in reality, and creates an interesting visual effect.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Solstice Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This golden poster evokes the of nostalgia of long summer days.

product.name: Abyssal Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. A reminder of what lurks in the depths below.

product.name: Territories Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This adrenaline-fueled poster depicts two noble herd leaders clashing over territory.

product.name: Exotic Armour
product.subtitle: Unlockable Companion Accessory
product.description:
An exclusive Companion Appearance Enhancement. Ideal for fierce-tempered companions, this stylish plate armour protects vital organs against laser and projectile fire. Ultra-soft breathable padding reduces the likelihood of companions wriggling out of the accessory.
Earn the trust of wild animals to adopt companions. Interact with companions to customise their appearance.

product.name: Exotic Wingpack
product.subtitle: Exosuit Visual Enhancement
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
An elegant wing-assisted jetpack, inspired by the design philosophy of exotic starships. This exclusive exosuit augmentation commemorates completion of the 'Exobiology' Expedition.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Title: 'Exobiologist'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the Exobiology expedition.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Exobiology Expedition Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal commemorates completion of the Exobiology expedition, and celebrates the peaceful co-existence of Travellers with the countless species of wildlife inhabiting the universe.

product.name: Exobiology Expedition Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the 'Exobiology' Expedition, and your explorations into the diverse wildlife inhabiting the universe.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Quad Egg
product.subtitle: Sentinel Spawn Capsule
product.description:
A metal 'egg' capsule, ready to hatch!
The shell crackles with an electronic energy.
Scans indicate the being within is programmed to be tireless and watchful.

product.name: Sputtering Starship Trail
product.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
A ramshackle ship exhaust nozzle, hand-assembled in an emergency by an outlaw. Has an occasional propensity to explode, but with no adverse effect on flight handling.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

product.name: Dread Captain Fahng Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. Few Vy'keen would be unfamiliar with Dread Captain Fahng and their bone-chilling exploits - though it is not known for certain whether they are a real historical figure, or simply a story made up to frighten disobedient cubs.

product.name: Outlaw Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. A rebellious tribute to pirates, fugitives, and resistance to Sentinel law.

product.name: Resbur XIII Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This anarchistic poster depicts a notorious pirate-occupied planet.

product.name: Piracy Flag
product.subtitle: Exclusive Flag
product.description:
The bright red skull emblazoned on this velvety flag serves as a warning to hostile parties.
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

product.name: Unity Flag
product.subtitle: Exclusive Flag
product.description:
A collaboratively designed standard, resulting from the cooperation between several intergalactic guilds.
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

product.name: Heraldry Flag
product.subtitle: Exclusive Flag
product.description:
This flag's delicate golden embroidery instantly adds elegance and refinement to any habitable base.
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

product.name: Orbital Flag
product.subtitle: Exclusive Flag
product.description:
An abstract representation of planetary orbits under a watchful eye, sewn from striking crimson and grey fabrics.
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

product.name: Viridian Flag
product.subtitle: Exclusive Flag
product.description:
A contrasting green and purple design, this flag was inspired by those searching for verdant galaxies.
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

product.name: Wayward Cube
product.subtitle: Floating Primitive
product.description:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.
This cubic lifeform drifted into an orbital station from another reality, where it was captured by a travelling merchant. Provides placid companionship when rehomed in a habitable base.

product.name: Title: 'Hunter of the Blight'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the Blighted expedition, the glorious retrieval of ill-gotten lucre, and the discovery of a pirate secret.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Blighted Expedition Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal commemorates completion of the Blighted expedition, the glorious retrieval of ill-gotten lucre, and the discovery of a pirate secret.

product.name: Blighted Expedition Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the 'Blighted' Expedition, the glorious retrieval of ill-gotten lucre, and the discovery of a pirate secret.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Outlaw Cape
product.subtitle: Unlockable Cape
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
A battle-worn cape, stolen from notorious pirate faction The Blight. Woven from chemically-dipped nano-fibres, the fabric is completely impervious to the heat produced by jetpack exhaust.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Leviathan Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This poster depicts a pod of biological frigates gliding serenely through the cosmos.

product.name: The Loop Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This poster represents the reiterative nature of time.

product.name: Timesplice Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This poster is a reminder of the non-linear nature of reality.

product.name: Temporal Starship Trail
product.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
A cosmic resonance chamber interacts with starship exhaust, modifying propulsion energy to leave a streak of temporal disturbances.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

product.name: Whalestalker Cloak
product.subtitle: Unlockable Cape
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
This sweeping cloak was once worn by an ill-fated Traveller - obsessed with their quest to capture a cosmic leviathan, and doomed to repeat the chase for all eternity.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Organic Frigate Calf
product.subtitle: Ornamental Base Companion
product.description:
A juvenile cosmic leviathan, suitable for rehoming in a habitable base.
This mysterious creature is enclosed in a chrono-preservation field to ensure it remains eternally young, playful, and a manageable size.

product.name: Title: 'Looper'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the Leviathan expedition, and the lifting of a generation-spanning curse.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Leviathan Expedition Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal commemorates completion of the Leviathan expedition, and the lifting of a generation-spanning curse.

product.name: Leviathan Expedition Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the 'Leviathan' Expedition, and the lifting of a generation-spanning curse.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Organic Frigate
product.subtitle: Cosmic Leviathan
product.description:
This peaceful space giant is a mutation of organism and starcraft, and can be tamed to swim through the stars alongside a fleet of frigates.
Recruiting this creature will add it to your frigate fleet. Manage your fleet from a Fleet Command Room aboard your freighter, and consult your Navigator to deploy frigates on lucrative expeditions.

product.name: Pilgrim Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster is dedicated to brave spacefarers who forge new paths across the galaxy.

product.name: Polestar Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster is dedicated to explorers and navigators who boldly seek out new horizons.

product.name: Heavy Shipping Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster is dedicated to the hard-working freighter crews who keep the universe fuelled and fed.

product.name: High-Gravity Freighter Trail
product.subtitle: Freighter Engine Flare Override
product.description:
An exclusive Freighter Engine Flare Modifier.
High-energy exhaust gases rapid condense as they exit the freighter's colossal engines, collapsing into micro-singularities.
Transform the appearance of your freighter at the Upgrade Control Terminal on the bridge.

product.name: Fleet Commander's Cape
product.subtitle: Unlockable Cape
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Master, commander, voyager of the stars. Don your cloak and prepare to take the helm.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Navigation Archive
product.subtitle: Secure Map Containment
product.description:
A secure containment vessel, designed to provide a near-indestructible chamber for the storage of vital navigation charts.
Resilient and designed to last thousands of years, this archive is entirely free of electronic components.

product.name: Flaming Barrel
product.subtitle: Inefficient Heat Source
product.description:
A low-tech heating device, ideal for generating light and heat without access to high-energy power sources.
User is advised to keep arms and legs outside of the barrel at all times.

product.name: Data Display Unit
product.subtitle: Dynamic Signpost
product.description:
A arrangement of dynamic glass panels, each filled with undoubtedly useful and valuable information.
This display unit also functions as a source of illumination.

product.name: Title: 'The Seeker'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the Polestar expedition, and the completion of a long cruise aboard a capital ship.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Polestar Expedition Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal commemorates completion of the Polestar expedition, and the completion of a long cruise aboard a capital ship.

product.name: Polestar Expedition Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the 'Polestar' Expedition, and the completion of a long cruise aboard a capital ship.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Helios Egg
product.subtitle: Captured Space Protozoa
product.description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!
Floating within the shell is a haunting glow, a beacon both beautiful and cursed.
Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be gelatinous and spectral.

product.name: Factions Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This poster echoes the ongoing tensions between the galaxies' dominant lifeforms.

product.name: Night Squad Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This poster depicts an inter-species friendship between three explorers of the universe.

product.name: Planetary Base Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This poster captures a towering skyline within the Utopia Foundation communal habitation project.

product.name: Holographic Friend
product.subtitle: Simulated Trader Lifeform
product.description: An exclusive buildable base ornament. This holographic Gek attendant provides eternal friendship to even the loneliest of habitable bases.

product.name: Fearsome Visor
product.subtitle: Unlockable Helmet
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Strike dread into the hearts of your foes with this oxide-strengthened helmet.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Utopia Speeder
product.subtitle: Exclusive Spacecraft
product.description:
A unique and exclusive starship, commemorating completion of the Utopia expedition, and contributions to the Utopia Foundation communal habitation project.
This versatile craft is plated with radiation-resistant armour, and engineered with an aerodynamic profile for agility during atmospheric flight.
Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Title: 'Utopia Dignitary'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the Utopia expedition, and contributions to the Utopia Foundation communal habitation project.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Utopia Expedition Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal commemorates completion of the Utopia expedition, and contributions to the Utopia Foundation communal habitation project.

product.name: Utopia Expedition Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the Utopia expedition, and contributions to the Utopia Foundation communal habitation project.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Robo-Warden Egg
product.subtitle: Robotic Spawn Capsule
product.description:
A metal 'egg' capsule, ready to hatch!
A regular electronic beeping can be heard from within the egg, soft and somehow reassuring.
Scans indicate the being within is programmed to be meticulous and dependable.

product.name: Atlas Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster glows with a crimson so intense, it lingers when you close your eyes.

product.subtitle: Decoration

product.name: Construct Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration

product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:

This is a detailed replica of the Living Fragments that litter discordant worlds, the prismatic grains that thrust from the earth in a struggle for freedom from their geological prison.

product.subtitle: Unlockable Helmet
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Despite its aerodynamic appearance and advanced solar design, reliance on helmet-exclusive propulsion is not advised. For maximum safety, ensure all body parts are propelled equally.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Title: 'The Construct'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the Singularity expedition, and the forging of the mysterious Construct.

product.subtitle: Decoration

Transform the appearance of your freighter at the Upgrade Control Terminal on the bridge.

product.name: Discordant Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
The jetpack exhaust is augmented with an atlantideum filter. When activated, its discordant effect is spilled across the landscape, a trail of dissonant reverberations that echo on an unknowable frequency.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Navigators Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster celebrates those who plot new routes into the unknown, always pushing at the boundaries of reality.

product.name: Anomalous Wonder Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster depicts one of the universe's great mysteries, the anomaly of existence itself.

product.name: Open Horizons Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster celebrates those in search of the next discovery, the next wonder, and the next unknown sky...

product.name: Title: 'The Intrepid'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the Voyagers expedition, and the discoveries made along the way.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Voyagers Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:

product.description:

product.name: Electric Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Humidifiers discharge a highly salinated mist from the rocket nozzles, conducting a dramatic streak of electricity during Jetpack operation.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Construct 'Egg'
product.subtitle: Robotic Spawn Capsule
product.description:
A metal 'egg' capsule, ready to deploy!
A low hum resonates from deep within the capsule, its dissonant frequency turning the air around it a faint purple.
Scans indicate the being within is programmed to be free-spirited and defiant.

product.name: Mechanical Paw
product.subtitle: Unlockable Companion Accessory
product.description:
An exclusive Companion Appearance Enhancement. This biomechanical remnant is a constant reminder of the many and diverse forms that existence can take.
Earn the trust of wild animals to adopt companions. Interact with companions to customise their appearance.

product.name: Construct Digits
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.
A partially assembled robotic hand, as seen on mechanical lifeforms across the galaxy. The unit is severly damaged and appears to contain no trace of Autophage entity inhabitation...

product.name: Construct 'Skull'
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.
This is a detailed replica of an Autophage facial cage. The unit is inoperable and contains no trace of Autophage entity inhabitation...

product.name: Ragged Tent
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.
A makeshift planetary shelter, assembled out of rudimentary and salvaged materials.

product.name: Construct Head: Atlantid
product.subtitle: Unlockable Head
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
The circuit cage and primary control sensors for a primitive automaton. Plans for a unit of this design were extracted from an autophage left at an abandoned junker's camp, before being infused with Atlantideum.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Construct Head: Crimson
product.subtitle: Unlockable Head
product.description:

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Construct Hands
product.subtitle: Autophage Appearance Modification
product.description:

A set of complex hydraulic tubes and various gripping surfaces that form a pair of usable arms for a primitive automaton. Plans for a unit of this design were extracted from an autophage left at an abandoned junker's camp.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Starborn Runner
product.subtitle: Exclusive Spacecraft
product.description:
A unique and exclusive starship, commemorating completion of the Omega expedition.
This unusual starship is optimised for effortless gliding during flight, while a localised vector field allows the craft to hover above solid planes.
Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Atlas Headshield
product.subtitle: Unlockable Helmet
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
A soft but immutable heartbeat resonates through your skull when you wear this helmet. A T L A S. The pulse is strangely soothing.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Atlas Sceptre
product.subtitle: Unique Korvax Technology?
product.description:
An exclusive Multi-Tool.
This unusual ceremonial staff was hand-forged by a Korvax Priest Entity in tribute to the Atlas.
Take this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Atlas Flightpack
product.subtitle: Exosuit Visual Enhancement
product.description:

A lightweight jetpack, welded from stellar alloys around a fiery crimson core.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Remembrance Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:

This poster holds the seeds of what was, what is, what could be.

product.name: Interface Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:

This poster depicts an infinite array of Atlas Interfaces, crimson eyes staring tirelessly into the dark.

product.name: Starborn Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
The Traveller approaches, delicately piloting their tiny ship through the stars. The Atlas, infinite, waits.

Recruiting this vessel will add it to your frigate fleet. Manage your fleet from a Fleet Command Room aboard your freighter, and consult your Navigator to deploy frigates on lucrative expeditions.

product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
The vile queen looms from this poster, a warning to all those who would disturb her brood...

product.name: Bug Hunt Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
An educational poster, useful for all those who seek to identify insects, for good or for ill...

product.name: Liquidator Left Arm
product.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
product.description:
An upgrade to the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid, the Liquidator is a cutting-edge heavy-duty combat unit, designed to operate in the harshest of environments.
This limb override also functions as its own dedicated combat system. It deploys high-velocity stun projectiles, perfect for keeping hostiles in place while advancing to close range.

product.name: Liquidator Right Arm
product.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
product.description:
An upgrade to the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid, the Liquidator is a cutting-edge heavy-duty combat unit, designed to operate in the harshest of environments.
This limb override also functions as its own dedicated combat system - a flamethrower for extreme damage at close range.
Use CYCLEWEAPON to cycle available weapon modes.

product.name: Liquidator Legs
product.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
product.description:
An upgrade to the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid, the Liquidator is a cutting-edge heavy-duty combat unit, designed to operate in the harshest of environments.
Installation will significantly improve the Minotaur's engine and mobility systems.

product.name: Liquidator Body
product.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
product.description:
An upgrade to the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid, the Liquidator is a cutting-edge heavy-duty combat unit, designed to operate in the harshest of environments.
Will function as a semi-autonomous artificial pilot plugin. Installation allows the Minotaur to traverse planets itself and engage in combat or mining activities to support its primary operator.
The AI pilot will always cede control to the primary operator when they enter the cockpit.

product.name: Title: 'Broodling'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification

product.name: Lost Angler's Rig
product.subtitle: Unique Angling Device
product.description:
A versatile piece of angling equipment, enabling the user to fish in a variety of water conditions. This rig was once owned by the legendary Lost Angler.
Access the fishing rig by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and cast your line into a body of water with ATTACK. With a fish hooked, press and hold ATTACK to haul in your catch.

product.name: Tentacled Figurine
product.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
product.description:

Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

product.subtitle: Exclusive Spacecraft
product.description:

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Boundary Horror Mandibles

product.description:

product.name: The Wraith
product.subtitle: Exclusive Spacecraft

product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, marking the Titan expedition's voyage through new stars and new worlds.
Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Titan Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal marks the Titan expedition's voyage through new stars and new worlds.

product.name: Titan Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the Titan expedition.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Titan Stripes
product.subtitle: Starship Customisation Option
product.description:
An exclusive starship customisation option, creating a vibrant and eye-catching appearance for Fighter and Hauler class starships.
Acquire starship components by breaking down existing ships at the Starship Outfitting unit aboard any space station. Visit the Starship Fabricator to design and assemble a new vessel.

product.name: Surveyor's Cape
product.subtitle: Unlockable Cape
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
A robust and well-made covering: waterproof, windproof and designed to keep the wearer protected against anything they may encounter while exploring unmapped worlds. Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Pillar of Titan
product.subtitle: Unique Korvax Technology?
product.description:
An exclusive Multi-Tool.
This sturdy staff is hewn from polished stone, and yet floats in the hand as if it were no weight at all. It is a perfect companion to those who seek to make long trips across the wilderness.
Take this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Fluid Dynamics Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
A poster for those that want to celebrate creatures not bound to solid ground.

product.name: Taxonomy Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
A lovely catalogue of different skulls, in case you need a reference.

product.name: Spirals Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
Show off the simplicity of nature with these attractive shells.

product.name: TITLE: 'Excavator'
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, marking the Relics expedition's voyage through new stars and new worlds.

product.name: Relics Decal
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal marks the Relics expedition's voyage of discovery and the recreation of the lost beasts of the past.

product.name: Relics Banner
product.subtitle: Bespoke Personal Identification
product.description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the Relics expedition.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Fossilised Egg
product.subtitle: Bone Cradle
product.description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!
A foetal creature of bone grows inside, its delicate body suspended in vitellus. Its fleshless limbs are comprised of soft cartilage, which will harden and densify as it grows.
Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be skeletal and elephantine.

product.name: Basilisk Crown
product.subtitle: Unique Korvax Technology?
product.description:
An exclusive Multi-Tool.
The skull of an ancient beast sits atop this fused pillar of bone and circuitry. Beware its gaze...
Take this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Living Stone Hardpack
product.subtitle: Unlockable Jetpack
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
An unusual alternative to the traditional jetpack, this flight device is sculpted from the remains of sentient rock. Magmatic gases provide the hardpack's thrust, while an anti-gravity field supports the weight of the stone, ensuring ergonomic safety for the user.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Living Stone Helmet
product.subtitle: Unlockable Helmet
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
A powerful magnetic field runs through this ancient stone, turning lumpen rock into something almost alive. The carver of this effigy is unknown.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Vigilant Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:

A Jetpack trail emitting the light of living stone; plucked from a slumbering guardian; focused and consolidated through a series of lenses.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Plasma Starship Trail
product.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
A visual enhancement for the starship, replacing traditional exhaust jets with a plasma thruster and generating a dramatic exhaust plume of ionised matter.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

product.name: Mecha-Mouse Egg
product.subtitle: Robotic Spawn Capsule
product.description:
A metal 'egg' capsule, ready to hatch!
A muffled squeaking can be heard from the synthetic creature inside the capsule.
Scans indicate the being within is programmed to be intelligent and loving, through prone to gnawing on electronics.

product.name: Multi-Tool Upgrade Pack
product.subtitle: Multifunction Survival Device Upgrade
product.description:

product.name: RGB Firework Pack
product.subtitle: Pyrotechnics Multi-Pack
product.description:
A three-variety pack of luxury fireworks. Rich in cadmium, emeril and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.
