product.subtitle: Unlockable Leg Customisation
product.description:
Carefully woven nano-fibres make these leggings both flexible and resistant to small-arms fire.
Washing requires specialist equipment.

product.name: Armoured Boots
product.subtitle: Unlockable Boots
product.description:
Reinforced foot protection system with integrated tread-balancing gyroscopes.
Hundreds of years of high-tech research, as applied to footwear.

product.name: Iteration: Ariadne Visage
product.subtitle: Anomalous Face Transformation
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
This part silicone, part biological helmet can detect and replicate the facial muscle movements of the wearer, creating the appearance of a natural head. It is fully compatible with exosuit technology and provides all protection of a traditional helmet.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Horrific Flesh-Helmet
product.subtitle: Anomalous Face Transformation
product.description:
Naturally transform your appearance via the application of a flesh-hungry parasite. This living being partially fuses with the brainstem of its host, sealing their symbiosis.
Cautiously transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Exosuit Backpack
product.subtitle: Exosuit Visual Enhancement
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
A tough, modular backpack unit. Its styling calls to mind a previous era of exploration.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Apollo Figurine
product.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
product.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of the Traveller Apollo.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

product.name: Artemis Figurine
product.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
product.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of the Traveller Artemis.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

product.name: Atlas Figurine
product.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
product.description:
A synthetic polymer adornment for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of an Atlas Interface.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

product.name: Nada Figurine
product.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
product.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of Priest Entity Nada.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

product.name: -null- Figurine
product.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
product.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of the Traveller -null-.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

product.name: Polo Figurine
product.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
product.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of Specialist Polo.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

product.name: Rainbow Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Precisely calibrated multi-chromatic injectors alter the Jetpack's output, turning the exhaust trail into a vibrant display of colour.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Antimatter Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Baryon suppressors alter the Jetpack's output, giving a distinct black tint to its signature trail.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Red Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Cadmium injection nozzles add a bold red flair to the Jetpack's output.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Green Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Emeril injection nozzles add a rich green flair to the Jetpack's output.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Blue Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Indium injection nozzles add a dazzling blue flair to the Jetpack's output.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Chromatic Starship Trail
product.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
Precisely calibrated multi-chromatic injectors alter the Pulse Engine's output, turning the exhaust trail into a vibrant display of colour.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

product.name: Stealth Starship Trail
product.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
Baryon suppressors alter the Pulse Engine's output, giving a distinct black tint to its signature trail.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

product.name: Cadmium Starship Trail
product.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
Cadmium injection nozzles add a bold red flair to the Pulse Engine's output.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

product.name: Emeril Starship Trail
product.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
Emeril injection nozzles add a rich green flair to the Pulse Engine's output.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

product.name: Golden Starship Trail
product.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
Gold injection nozzles add a dazzling gold flair to the Pulse Engine's output.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

product.name: Robotic Companion
product.subtitle: Personal Drone Valet
product.description:
A perfectly-programmed and error free drone.
This miniature robot will be a lively presence in your base, bringing joy, laughter and a constant low-level humming to your home.

product.name: Expanding Cube Gadget
product.subtitle: Unlockable Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive decorative curiosity.
This precisely crafted gadget utilises a localised gravitational field, delighting and fascinating base visitors.

product.name: Holographic Globe Gadget
product.subtitle: Unlockable Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive decorative curiosity for bases.
This gadget emits a spherical hologram, representative of one of the quintillions of celestial bodies populating the galaxies.

product.name: Wriggling Companion
product.subtitle: Betentacled Steward
product.description:
The captured essence of an abyssal horror, contained for scientific and decorative use.
The bounding forcefield is of the very highest quality. The companion cannot escape. The companion will not escape. Escape.

product.name: Fruit Tree
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A large decorative fruit tree.
Fruit form, toxicity and existence will vary according to local climatic and pollinator conditions.

product.name: Spindle Tree
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A thin, non-fruiting tree. Root system is integrated with highly-adapted fungal symbiotes.
Supplied with its own mushrooms for ease of establishment. Fungus is non-toxic and non-spreading.

product.name: Evergreen Tree
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A hardy evergreen tree, able to survive in a wide-range of climates.
Waxy leaves with a silvery underside provide excellent light harvesting abilities, as well as year-round interest and colour.

product.name: Carnivorous Bush
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A medium-sized decorative plant. Each of its leaves is covered in a thin film of sticky latex. Insects that land on these leaves are slowly absorbed by digestive hormones mixed in with the glue.
Avoid accidental skin contact.

product.name: Dwarf Palm
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A squat, easily-managed form of the larger palm species.
Place outdoors to attract wildlife and to purify the air.

product.name: Curious Corn
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
Sprouting decorative corn. Comes in a variety of colours. May attract decorative wildlife.
Unable to reproduce naturally. Must be hand-pollinated.

product.name: Small Aquarium
product.subtitle: Aquatic Observation Module
product.description:
A small observatory unit for studying aquatic behaviours.
Completely self-contained, with its own renewable energy source, pump array, and self-cleaning filtration systems.

product.name: Curly Coral
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A delicate marine invertebrate, cultivated for potted growth. Its distinctive looping structure gives it an attractive whimsical appearance.

product.name: Aquatic Crystal
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: An eye-catching cluster of crystallised oceanic minerals. These crystals grow in a shard-like structure, and feature an unusual marbled colouration.

product.name: Candelabra Bloom
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A striking plant featuring luminescent, orb-shaped flowers. This domestic variety has adapted to absorb and process oxygen from any source, whether growing on land or underwater.

product.name: Armoured Anemone
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A carnivorous marine organism. An armoured shell encloses the core polyp, exposing only the stinging tentacles. Involuntary nerve spasms cause the creature to writhe perpetually: always seeking, always hungering.

product.name: Strip Coral
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A giant calcium formation, naturally configured into a strip of non-orientable space. Adds a mysterious deep-sea quality to any habitable base.

product.name: Aquatic Colony
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A rock formation pulled from the floor of a densely-populated ocean. The attached marine life is lacquered in a nutrient-rich mucus, to keep it fed and moist in terrestrial conditions.

product.name: Barnacle
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A tenacious arthropod, naturally found encrusting stationary or slow-moving underwater objects.
This variety can be encouraged to affix itself to a chosen position, adding an aged marine appearance to bases.

product.name: Blue Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
A luxury firework, rich in magnesium and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Red Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
A luxury firework, rich in magnesium and cadmium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Green Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
A luxury firework, rich in magnesium and emeril. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Triple Burst Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
A luxury firework, featuring a triple-burst symphony of colour. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Dual Chrome Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
A luxury firework, exploding into sparkling wedges of indium and cadmium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Wheel of Hirk Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
A luxury firework. When activated, this pyrotechnic marvel turns and whorls in a mesmerising spiral. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Red Titan Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
This exotic firework, tinted with cadmium salts, is inspired by the undulating form of the titanic sandworm. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Golden Titan Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
This exotic firework, tinted with sodium salts, is inspired by the undulating form of the titanic sandworm. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Green Titan Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
This exotic firework, tinted with emeril salts, is inspired by the undulating form of the titanic sandworm. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Purple Ribbon Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
This exotic firework, sparkling with Atlantideum and antimony elements, bursts into a cluster of wildly spiralling ribbons. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Blue Ribbon Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
This exotic firework, sparkling with indium and antimony elements, bursts into a cluster of wildly spiralling ribbons. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Teal Ribbon Firework
product.subtitle: Consumable Pyrotechnics Device
product.description:
This exotic firework, sparkling with zinc and antimony elements, bursts into a cluster of wildly spiralling ribbons. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.
Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

product.name: Pocket Reality Generator
product.subtitle: Unlockable Decoration
product.description:
An exclusive decorative curiosity for bases.
A model of reality itself, as viewed from the perspective of an impossible observer. Infinite levels of detail wait to be discovered by the viewer with a powerful enough lens.

product.name: Terrarium
product.subtitle: Specialised Creature Enclosure
product.description:
A small observatory unit for studying animal behaviours.
Completely self-contained, complete with inbuilt nutrient processor, air purifier and faecal disposal system.

product.name: Sail Palm
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A large-leafed, heat resistant tree.
Its broad fronds are laced with minerals, forming a protective barrier against the harsh sunlight of its native conditions.

product.name: Globe Tree
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A thin tree with a large, fleshy root system, well adapted to hot climates.
Root bulb may be tapped for a source of drinkable liquid, but this is not advised outside of the most dire circumstances.

product.name: Rock Garden
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A garden module, complete with decorative mineral formation and built-in capillary matting for optimum humidity control.

product.name: Writhing Bush
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A native of radioactive worlds, this curiously meaty succulent seems to sway gently even when the air is still...
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Umbrella Tree
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This decorative tree has evolved to cope with high levels of background radiation. Its central glowing core attracts wildlife and is in no way a sense organ. It does not watch you.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Entwining Tree
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This beautiful statement tree thrives in the heat of intense gamma radiation. To ensure survival in non-native environments, a chunk of high-energy material has been embedded in the trunk.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Blistering Mushroom
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This swollen protuberance grows rapidly from a fine network of underground spores. Greatly improves nearby soil quality.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Watchful Protrusion
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
While this plant can be cultivated as a crop, consumption is not advised.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Tentacle Spire
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This delightful architectural floral combines two highly popular aesthetics: wriggling tentacles and giant fungi.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Bewitching Cactus
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
Elegant feathery filaments run around this desert plant, increasing the surface area for moisture absorption. They also look very fetching.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Celebratory Cactus
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
Delightful succulent baubles, these lovely plants top their bulbous bodies with a show of beautiful flowers.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Succulent Tree
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
The bark on this tree is misleading. Neither rough nor hard, its flesh is instead soft and moist to the touch. Wrinkles in the surface store extra water for times of hardship.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Hardy Shrub
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This tough conifer pumps its sap with anti-freezing enzymes, allowing it to survive unimaginably low temperatures.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Frozen Planter
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A snow-filled stone trough. This is the perfect home for the small, tough plants that grow on ice-bound worlds.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Ancient Conifer
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This tree lives on an almost geological time scale. Low heat and light levels in their native habitat restrict growth to mere millimeters each season. A sample this size is a botanical marvel.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Marine Rock
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A pleasing mineral formation, crystalised from oceanic salts. May also contain aquatic fossils and/or lifeforms.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Mineral Arch
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A remarkable piece of geological geometry. A stable load-bearing arch, infused with curiously angular solid geodes.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Gem-Encrusted Rock
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
Once a discarded byproduct of deep-level crystal mining, the aesthetic value of the rocks is now better appreciated.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Flarecap Toadstool
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This species of fungus is notable for its dense capillary network and bioluminescent qualities. A circulating chain of chemical reactions produces the toadstool's nocturnal glow.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Wizened Stump
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This ancient stump was harvested from a clonal tree colony, estimated to have lived for over a hundred millennia. Its bark releases a pleasant mossy fragrance.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Mud Hut
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This simple mud hut was modelled after a mysterious structure discovered in the mists of planet Saxm A13. Similar structures have been found throughout the universe, with no proven hypothesis regarding their origin.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Chitinous Cage
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A proteinous formation of unknown origin, replicated aboard the Space Anomaly. Its skeletal structure often retains pockets of air, leading to slightly warmer or cooler temperatures in the centre of the cage.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Protea Wheel
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This unusual lifeform, dominated by a wheel of photophore glands, is difficult to classify neatly into flora or fauna. The thick columns of thorns help protect the flavoursome glands from predators.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Vigilant Taro
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
The eye-like protrusions on this bizarre organism are capable of both processing light and performing simple calculations, although it is unclear what they are watching for...
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Void Husk
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This eggshell still whispers a faint song, as though connected to a distant chorus...
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Plate Stem
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
The broad, plate-like leaf topping this tree is highly efficient for photosynthesis, and wild specimens can grow to extraordinary heights. This domestic variety is cultivated to be suitable to furnish habitations.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Compound Bulb
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This vegetative structure is high in antioxidants, though a thick layer of scales makes it impractical for farming.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Igneous Crystal
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A quiet roar sounds from within this natural crystal formation, lava and gas dancing in a perpetual cycle of heating and solidifying. Mesmerising to the eye, but despite the ultrahot core, only slightly warm to the touch.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Igneous Drop
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This hybrid of egg and rock is known to form around the larvae of certain species, keeping the vulnerable creature warm and protected as it develops over the course of several decades. Membranous splits in the rock's surface expose the ever-shifting molten heart.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Archaic Habitation Heater
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
Although primitive in design, this habitation heater is nonetheless a popular home furnishing. Its hypnotic flames and gentle crackling lend a comforting ambience to any room.
Provides interior decoration opportunities for bases.

product.name: Saucer Fungus
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: This fungal growth, identifiable by its wide, smooth cap and luminescent pores, is native to a variety of cave biomes. Saucer Fungi enjoy a symbiotic relationship with many species of burrowing creatures.

product.name: Cave Creeper
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A hardy variety of lampenflora. This creeping vine occurs naturally in damp, subterranean environments, but will thrive as a free-standing shrub in any biome type.

product.name: Troglotulip
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: This attractive glowing flower is remarkable for its scent, reminiscent of freshly tilled soil. Due to the plant's mineral-rich diet, the stamens often contain traces of cobalt.

product.name: Veined Flat Caps
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: Clusters of these large mushrooms can be found growing in underground caves. The surface 'veins' form part of an unusual gill structure, releasing spores from both above and below the fungus's cap.

product.name: Fingery Deposit
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: This stalagmite was formed by the dripping of cobalt-rich moisture over several millennia. It is eternally cold to the touch, as though the rock recalls the temperature of its home cave.

product.name: Antimatter Observation Orb
product.subtitle: Space Anomaly Replica Part
product.description: This spiked chamber contains a globule of antimatter, creating an unusual display piece for discerning base builders.

product.name: Synthesis Core
product.subtitle: Space Anomaly Replica Part
product.description:
A replica of the mysterious orb utilised by Polo's Quicksilver Synthesis Companion.
The physical properties of the orb are forever shifting in strangely rhythmic patterns: temperature, radioactivity and density all fluctuating to an unheard song.

product.name: Bubble Vat
product.subtitle: Space Anomaly Replica Part
product.description: A miniaturised replica of the bubbling 'liquid' vat which forms part of the Space Anomaly's anatomy. This mesmerising ornament brings an echo of Polo and Nada's anomalous home to planetary bases.

product.name: Bubble Duct
product.subtitle: Decorative Aqueduct
product.description:
This clear glass aqueduct encloses a perpetually churning supply of 'liquid'.
Intelligently welds into different shapes to create mesmerising displays in your base.

product.name: Bubble Duct
product.subtitle: Decorative Aqueduct
product.description:
This clear glass aqueduct encloses a perpetually churning supply of 'liquid'.
Weld together with different duct shapes to create mesmerising displays in your base.

product.name: L-Shaped Bubble Duct
product.subtitle: Decorative Aqueduct
product.description:
This clear glass aqueduct encloses a perpetually churning supply of 'liquid'. This L-shaped configuration allows for curves in duct connections.
Weld together with different duct shapes to create mesmerising displays in your base.

product.name: T-Shaped Bubble Duct
product.subtitle: Decorative Aqueduct
product.description:
This clear glass aqueduct encloses a perpetually churning supply of 'liquid'. This T-shaped configuration allows for creating branches in duct connections.
Weld together with different duct shapes to create mesmerising displays in your base.

product.name: X-Shaped Bubble Duct
product.subtitle: Decorative Aqueduct
product.description:
This clear glass aqueduct encloses a perpetually churning supply of 'liquid'. This X-shaped configuration allows for connecting four ducts in a cruciform arrangement.
Weld together with different duct shapes to create mesmerising displays in your base.

product.name: Full Sail
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: This full sail replicates the design of the ancient maritime trade vessels of the Gek, and makes for a striking nautical-themed home decoration.

product.name: Offset Sails
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: These offset sails replicate the design of the ancient maritime trade vessels of the Gek, and make for a striking nautical-themed home decoration.

product.name: Asymmetrical Sails
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: These asymmetrical sails replicate the design of the ancient maritime trade vessels of the Gek, and make for a striking nautical-themed home decoration.

product.name: Draped Canvas
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: This draped canvas half-sail replicates the design of the ancient maritime trade vessels of the Gek, and makes for a striking nautical-themed home decoration.

product.name: Classic Chair
product.subtitle: Furniture
product.description: A sturdy, well-constructed seat, standardised for installation in Space Stations across the galaxies. Its angular design is surprisingly ergonomic.

product.name: Illuminated Pot
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: This clay plant pot features a climate neutralising field, nutrient recycling system, and integrated drip tray. Ideal for showcasing decorative plants or other decorations.

product.name: Tall Spikegrass
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A tough ornamental grass, suitable for growing in all biomes, soil types, and weather conditions. This variety is characterised by very long, thin blades, covered in very fine hairs.

product.name: Short Spikegrass
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A tough ornamental grass, suitable for growing in all biomes, soil types, and weather conditions. This variety, like its taller cousin, is characterised by long hirsute blades - but grows more densely, with slightly heftier blades.

product.name: Flatblade Grass
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A tough ornamental grass, suitable for growing in all biomes, soil types, and weather conditions. The wide, flat blades secrete a fragrant, unpleasant-tasting sap to deter predators.

product.name: Looping Grass
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A tough ornamental grass, suitable for growing in all biomes, soil types, and weather conditions. This variety features attractively curled blades, which furl and unfurl to allow the plant to maintain a constant internal temperature.

product.name: Ribbon Grass
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A tough ornamental grass, suitable for growing in all biomes, soil types, and weather conditions. Closely related to certain varieties of seaweed, ribbon grass can be identified by its long rippling blades and fine hexagonal surface texture.

product.name: Cloven Paw Grass
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A tough ornamental grass, suitable for growing in all biomes, soil types, and weather conditions. Cloven paw bears more structural similarity to a shrub than a true grass, and features large glossy leaves for rapid photosynthesis.

product.name: Antler Grass
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A tough ornamental grass, suitable for growing in all biomes, soil types, and weather conditions. The branching blades of this variety are formed of woody, twig-like armour insulating thick veins of moisture-storing resin.

product.name: Nighttongue Flowers
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A hardy floral patch, genetically modified to thrive in all biomes, soil types, and weather conditions. Barbed petals protect the flowers from would-be predators, piercing flesh with a deadly toxin. Haz-Mat Gauntlets recommended while handling.

product.name: Urchin Flowers
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A hardy floral patch, genetically modified to thrive in all biomes, soil types, and weather conditions. These unusually-shaped flowers are packed with pollen, and release a dizzyingly sweet perfume.

product.name: Eternal Eye Flowers
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A hardy floral patch, genetically modified to thrive in all biomes, soil types, and weather conditions. These ligulate blossoms remain open day and night, absorbing light from both local and distant stars.

product.name: Covered Silos
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: A set of tarpaulin-draped silo barrels, containing cargo of questionable provenance.

product.name: Covered Crate
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: A large crate, sealed and prepared for transportation. The tarpaulin wrapping conceals the precise nature of this cargo, obscuring whether all the export stamps are where they ought to be...

product.name: Industrial Crane
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: Heavy machinery, for lifting and relocating heavy cargo. Despite the crane's size, the rotation-resistant hoist rope and AI-corrected swivel allow for extremely precise movements.

product.name: "Euclid Moonrise" Sign
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An attention-grabbing welcome sign, illuminated by an array of gas-discharge tubes.
Design salvaged from the "Euclid Moonrise", a Vy'keen joint with an insalubrious reputation.

product.name: "Ship and Pilot" Sign
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An attention-grabbing welcome sign, illuminated by an array of gas-discharge tubes.
Design salvaged from the lively Gek saloon known as the "Ship and Pilot".

product.name: "The Black Hole in the Wall" Sign
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
An attention-grabbing welcome sign, illuminated by an array of gas-discharge tubes.
Design salvaged from an underground Korvax cantina named "The Black Hole in the Wall".

Specialist Polo is unwilling to predict the results of the broadcast.

product.name: Detoxified Slime
product.subtitle: Placeable Sludge
product.description:
Gelatinous and slowly pulsing, this puddle of living slime smells sweeter than would be imagined.
Though there is no evidence to suggest it would be unsafe to do so, avoid treading on the slime where possible.

product.name: Orange Pustule
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
The flesh of this sinister squash is always warm, and slightly luminous. Despite these strange qualities, it is quite edible, and releases a comforting aroma wherever it grows.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Rounded Laser
product.subtitle: Unlockable Companion Accessory
product.description:
An exclusive Companion Appearance Enhancement. This articulated mining laser is insulated with a lightweight gel, ensuring ultimate comfort for companions assisting with resource harvesting.
Earn the trust of wild animals to adopt companions. Interact with companions to customise their appearance.

product.name: Movement Tracker
product.subtitle: Unlockable Companion Accessory
product.description:
An exclusive Companion Appearance Enhancement. This compact device generates detailed analytics reports of creature traversal habits, to provide explorers with insight into the secret lives of their animal companions.
Earn the trust of wild animals to adopt companions. Interact with companions to customise their appearance.

product.name: Energy Coil
product.subtitle: Unlockable Companion Accessory
product.description:
An exclusive Companion Appearance Enhancement. This dual-purpose laser responds to the biological vitals of its wearer, providing an adaptive level of warmth and light, as well as soft pulses to soothe anxiety.
Earn the trust of wild animals to adopt companions. Interact with companions to customise their appearance.

product.name: ByteBeat Chip: 'Nemesis101'
product.subtitle: Audio Containment Crystal
product.description:
A data storage lattice containing a single ByteBeat music track.
Track data will be added to the 'Other Tracks' section of the ByteBeat Library. Access the Library from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.description:

product.subtitle: Decoration

product.name: ByteBeat Poster

product.name: Voyage Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration

product.name: Atlas Seed Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This poster depicts an Atlas-like silhouette bursting forth from a planetary crust.

product.name: Utopia Poster

product.name: Scrambled Signal Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This poster represents fragments of many long-distance communication signals between the dominant factions of the universe.

product.name: Ship Parts Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This poster was donated by honest ship SalesGek Bakkar. Visit their Starship component store today! Best prices for friends!

product.name: Bake Sale Poster
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art. This poster advertises an assortment of baked goods, including a crusty bread roll and fresh stack of haunted wafers.

product.name: Emeril Freighter Trail
product.subtitle: Freighter Engine Flare Override
product.description:
An exclusive Freighter Engine Flare Modifier.
The extreme heat of the freighter's engines excites this filter of Emeril salts, tinting the exhaust with a vivid green hue.
Transform the appearance of your freighter at the Upgrade Control Terminal on the bridge.

product.name: Golden Freighter Trail
product.subtitle: Freighter Engine Flare Override
product.description:
An exclusive Freighter Engine Flare Modifier.
The extreme heat of the freighter's engines excites this filter of sodium salts, tinting the exhaust with a vivid golden hue.
Transform the appearance of your freighter at the Upgrade Control Terminal on the bridge.

product.name: Antimatter Freighter Trail
product.subtitle: Freighter Engine Flare Override
product.description:
An exclusive Freighter Engine Flare Modifier.
A grid of compact particle accelerators activate with heat from the freighter engines, streaking the exhaust with a dark trail of antimatter.
Transform the appearance of your freighter at the Upgrade Control Terminal on the bridge.

product.name: Hadal Freighter Trail
product.subtitle: Freighter Engine Flare Override
product.description:
An exclusive Freighter Engine Flare Modifier.
Organically altering the hue of freighter exhaust, this engine modification utilises the bioluminescence of abyssal sea creatures to generate its striking turquoise colouration.
Transform the appearance of your freighter at the Upgrade Control Terminal on the bridge.

product.name: Tentacled Cape
product.subtitle: Unlockable Cape
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Flow across the galaxy with this cape's lattice of fluttering tentacles, woven from regenerated cellulose fibres.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Cosmic Megafauna Cape
product.subtitle: Unlockable Cape
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
In the furthest reaches of space swim cosmic megafauna, aligning their paths with Travellers, dreaming of possible realities.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Titan Worm Cape
product.subtitle: Unlockable Cape
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
"The worm lord towers above the dusty earth; its flesh becomes the sky."
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Geometric Cape
product.subtitle: Unlockable Cape
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
A vintage garment woven from a star silk blend, bearing a classic geometric design.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Spawning Cowl
product.subtitle: Unlockable Hood
product.description:
This grand hood is worn by the upper ranks of Gek at events and conventions, distinguishing the esteemed Trade Lord from the lowly Hireling.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit with this exclusive Appearance Override at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Scorching Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Pressurised jets breathe additional oxygen into the Jetpack flames, brightening and lengthening the exhaust trail.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Festive Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
A multi-coloured scattering of bio-plastic flakes adds a celebratory flair to the Jetpack's output. Expelled material is fully compostable.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Pyrotechnic Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Pellets of chromatic metal ignite during flight, splitting into glittering stars of RGB.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Plasma Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Replaces the standard Jetpack combustion chamber with a plasma engine. During flight, the exhaust nozzles release dazzling clouds of ionised matter.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Fusion Jetpack Trail
product.subtitle: Jetpack Exhaust Override
product.description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Harnesses natural stellar processes to make the Jetpack output blaze. A light-diffusing compound protects the user and onlookers from retinal damage.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

product.name: Budding Thimblestem
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A tall ornamental plant, characterised by a proliferation of vividly-coloured flowers.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Tassel Weed
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A small, attractive plant, native to humid climates. The dewy "tassels" radiate a gentle light, attracting nocturnal pollinators.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Mature Tassel Lily
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A small, attractive plant, native to humid climates. This petalled variety is in the mature stage of blooming. The dewy "tassels" radiate a gentle light, attracting nocturnal pollinators.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Spoonleaf
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
This elegant flowering plant consists of a single spathe coiled around a perfumed core.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Tassel Lily
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A small, attractive plant, native to humid climates. This petalled variety is in the early stage of blooming. The dewy "tassels" radiate a gentle light, attracting nocturnal pollinators.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Plumage Palm
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A tall desert-native tree. The fronds resemble the plumage of a bird, and crown in a vertical formation.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Nodding Plumage Palm
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A tall desert-native tree. The fronds resemble the plumage of a bird, and crown in a drooping formation.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Forked Plumage Palm
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A tall desert-native tree. The fronds resemble the plumage of a bird, and crown in a vertical formation. This specimen has branched into two separate crowns.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Sprig Bush
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A compact, many-leafed herb. Lends a pleasant subtle fragrance to gardens.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Floating Tassel Lily
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
Levitating variety of the tassel lily. This oversized specimen absorbs its nutrients from atmospheric moisture. The dewy "tassels" radiate a gentle light, attracting nocturnal pollinators.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Closed Seed Cone
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A large organic structure, housing the seeds of coniferous megaflora.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Open Seed Cone
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A large organic structure, housing the seeds of coniferous megaflora. This specimen has dried out, its scales flexed back to release the seeds inside.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Petrified Branches
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
The timber of this ancient tree has mineralised and frozen, forming a superhard, ice-bound sculpture.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Coldcup Plant
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A fleshy, spreading plant with hair-covered foliage, tending to accumulate a covering of snow. The cupped flowers unfold in response to drops in temperature, allowing pollen to be distributed by driving snow and wind.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Blizzard's Arch Plant
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A dimorphic plant with fleshy, hair-covered foliage, tending to accumulate a covering of snow, and more delicate secondary leaves to attract pollinating wildlife.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Coldcup Nest Plant
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A fleshy, compact plant with hair-covered foliage, tending to accumulate a covering of snow. The cupped flowers unfold in response to drops in temperature, allowing pollen to be distributed by driving snow and wind.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Flowering Chillwood
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A hardy, slender-branched tree, native to subzero environs. This specimen is in full bloom. The thickened venation in the foliage protects the plant against extreme cold.
Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Chillwood
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description:
A hardy, slender-branched tree, native to subzero environs. The thickened venation in the foliage protects the plant against extreme cold.

product.name: Rubber Plant Rock
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: This nutrient-rich rock was mined from a dense jungle, and hosts a small colony of of rubber plants. Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Twisted Jungle Tree
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: A multi-stemmed rainforest tree. Its sap has a gummy consistency, healing any damage to the tree in a matter of minutes. Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Mangrove Roots
product.subtitle: Organic Decoration
product.description: An attractive knot of roots, cultivated to maintain its current shape and minimise rampant spread. Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

product.name: Singing Sea-Snail
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A voice like honey from a mouth of mucus."

product.name: Golden Jellyfish
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Its tentacles that glitter like wisps of golden hair, but sting with the fire of thousand suns."

product.name: Dragonfish
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Territorial, ancient, furious to be caught. The king of the sea."

product.name: The Lunker
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A true titan of the depths. Nothing compares for sheer mass."

product.name: Emeril Sunstar
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Its perfect crystalline form glistens with a emerald light that changes the soul of all those whose eyes fall upon it."

product.name: Vampire Squid
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A true error of the deep; its hungry bite corrupts your blood, filling your body with a spurting corrosive bile."

product.name: Bleached Bonefish
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Robbed of flesh and stripped of colour by acid seas, the bonefish swims on regardless."

product.name: Translucent Gulper
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Seemingly weak and fragile at the surface, these giant jaws have swallowed alive many an unwary soul who ventured into their abyssal home..."

product.name: Many-Eyed Jellyfish
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A thousand eyes erupt from its soft flesh: a never-ending cycle of rising, blinking, sinking, and re-emergence."

product.name: Aberrant Duskfin
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Its wings beat slowly as it sails though the poisoned seas, a drifter with no place of rest, no end to their journey."

product.name: Gamma Squid
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A pale blue glow surrounds it as it drifts through the water - a warning to all those who would come too close..."

product.name: Helix Sawfish
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Polymorphic, twisting, always in motion; its body a constant whirr of shifting forms and ripping teeth."

product.name: Starshell Crab
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Its glittering shell is practically unbreakable, a material of pure perfection."

product.name: Mirrorscale Skipper
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Impossible to see with mortal eyes as it flashes through the water under boiling, cloudless skies."

product.name: Jelly of the Veil
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A dark cloud follows this creature, and dreams of doom await all those who touch it."

product.name: Ancient Irontail
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Heart of stone and fins of iron, this creature lives on where all else falters."

product.name: Crystal Jelly
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A living snowflake: frozen solid yet still alive, its tentacles a fractal recursion."

product.name: Ghostfin
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A name only spoken in whispers, its pale body a illusion that flickers beneath the moonlit waves."

product.name: Iceblood Gulper
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A heart that beats but once a hour, a heart that sees faster life spawn and die, spawn and die, spawn and die..."

product.name: Nautilia
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "None would believe the scale of this beast: its colossal shell, its enormous slimy foot. None, except those who have seen it..."

product.name: Glass Angel
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A creature of dreams, only visible where the light refracts through its soft, perfect jelly."

product.name: Mist Serpent
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "When hunting, can dissolve into a thin dark cloud, impossible to track, impossible to see coming..."

product.name: Reef Guardian
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A powerful, muscular body and teeth like razors, these gentle giants protect smaller creatures from predators."

product.name: Blind Titancore
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "The old man of the sea; scarred, blinded, still swimming on..."

product.name: Fragile Icthyoscale
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A delicate creature, a fragment of the past that lives on in the water."

product.name: Titanworm Larva
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "The many-mouths arise from the darkness of the ocean; the many-mouths hunger for their home in the sand..."

product.name: Ossified Deinosuchus
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "A relic of another age, a fusion of life and stone that refuses to die."

product.name: Megalodon
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "The apex of marine predation, a perfect killing machine. Beware."

product.name: Sentient Crab
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Deep feeling swims in those watery eyestalks, the thoughtful intelligence of a true ancient."

product.name: Brain Eel
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "It slides beneath the waves; it slides between the ears; it slides within the folds, and swims forever in your dreams."

product.name: The Hunter Below
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Streamlined, deadly, perfect: the terror of the deep."

product.name: Leviathan Spawn
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "So young and fragile, despite its years beneath the waves. And yet thousands more years must pass before it joins the great herd in the stars..."

product.name: Mandelbrot Worm
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "The geometry of its impossible body folds within itself, a writhing thread of flesh and spacetime."

product.name: Mother-of-Quicksilver
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Brilliantly ablaze, its surface a perfect liquid sun..."

product.name: Hyper-cockle
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Both alive and not alive; at once a creature, a mineral, and a moment from another time..."

product.name: The Maw of Titan
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "So few things survive in waters such as these... so that which thrives should strike fear into the heart of any thinking being."

product.name: Abyssal Horror Egg
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Listen to these words: Do not allow this egg to hatch. Cast it back into the sea."

product.name: Atlantidian Crab
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Shell and claw of perfect crystal, eyestalks aglow with purple rage; a being displaced from another reality and cast here as crab."

product.name: Child of Helios
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "Its song resonates across time and space, calling to its home in the endless black above. One day, it will rise and return to its home among the stars."

product.name: Many-Mouthed Lunker
product.subtitle: Legendary Fish
product.description: "On the surface or below the waves, the vessel hungers, the vessel feeds..."

product.name: Kelp Strand
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A piece of flotsam, wrenched from its years of drifting in the water when it became entangled in a fishing lure.
Of little use to anyone.

product.name: Rusted Technology
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A technology upgrade that has been permanently damaged by prolonged exposure to water.
Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.

product.name: Message in a Bottle
product.subtitle: Collected Flotsam
product.description:
A sealed bottle, found floating in the water. There appears to be a message inside.
Use FE_ALT1 to unseal the bottle and read the message within.

product.name: Child of Aquarius
product.subtitle: Precious Spawn
product.description:
An impossibly delicate jellyfish. Its tentacles are as fine as strands of hair, its entire being glassy, dancing on the edge of what is possible.
A gift from the sea, almost too precious to keep...

product.name: Creature Pellets
product.subtitle: Compressed Nutrients
product.description:
Basic creature bait. Can be placed directly or accessed via the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).
This bait will attract creatures and cause them to yield Faecium. Once a creature has been fed, they may be tamed or farmed for their produce.
Dropping bait may calm angry creatures.

product.name: Synthetic Worms
product.subtitle: Carnivore Bait
product.description:
A specialist bait for carnivores. Use the Analysis Visor to discover the bait preferences of specific creatures.
Created in a Nutrient Processor from Mordite and assorted creature flesh.
Feeding using the correct bait will allow creatures to be ridden or harvested. It will also calm predators. Chose bait type from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

product.name: Ground Meat
product.subtitle: Carnivore Bait
product.description:

product.name: Softened Marrow
product.subtitle: Edible Product
product.description:
A highly refined food product, created in the Nutrient Processor. It has both the identifying shapes and aromas of an actual food item, in stark contrast with conventional nutrition paste or pellets.
Food such as this can be highly valuable.

product.name: Bone Broth
product.subtitle: Edible Product
product.description:
A highly refined food product, created in the Nutrient Processor. It has both the identifying shapes and aromas of an actual food item, in stark contrast with conventional nutrition paste or pellets.
Food such as this can be highly valuable.

product.name: Carbon Crystal
product.subtitle: Concentrated Carbon Deposit
product.description:
Hyper-compressed carbon, this substance's dense nanostructure makes it highly valuable as both an energy source and a technology component.
Synthesised from Condensed Carbon.

product.name: Rare Metal Element
product.subtitle: Concentrated Metal Deposit
product.description:
A highly-prized metal product, this rare element is used in the manufacture of several advanced technologies.
Metal is highly reactive and quickly bonds to exposed skin. User is advised to handle with extreme caution.
Synthesised from Magnetised Ferrite.

product.name: TetraCobalt
product.subtitle: Concentrated Cobalt Deposit
product.description:
A novel molecular form of Cobalt, requiring very high energy levels to create. Natural occurrence is extremely rare.
Synthesised from Ionised Cobalt.

product.name: Chloride Lattice
product.subtitle: Concentrated Chlorine Deposit
product.description:
A tightly-bonded form of Chlorine. Rigidly-packed molecules offer unrivalled conductivity. Not known to form spontaneously: creation requires highly-focused energy inputs.
Synthesised from Chlorine.

product.name: Destablised Sodium
product.subtitle: Concentrated Sodium Deposit
product.description:
Sodium is typically highly stable, but certain configurations retain the reactivity of its component ions. User is advised to wear Hazardous Material Gauntlets before handling.
Synthesised from Sodium.

product.name: Superoxide Crystal
product.subtitle: Concentrated Oxygen Deposit
product.description:
A para-magnetic form of Oxygen, this rare substance has much to offer in the production of advanced technologies. Requires conversion prior to input into Life Support systems. Direct inhalation is NOT recommended.
Synthesised from Oxygen.

product.name: Oxygen Filter
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
A specialist technology component.
This small device can rapidly change the gaseous environment within a device, handling conditions from total vacuum to pure oxygen atmospheres.

product.name: Salt Refractor
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
A specialist technology component, vital to the complex internals of modern laser systems.
This light-scattering device takes advantage of the unique optical properties of stabilised and polished salt, to both slow and refract passing photons.

product.name: Cobalt Mirror
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
A specialist optical component.
Employing a polished cobalt surface, this mirror is able to selectively filter different wavelengths of light, changing its reflective pattern based on nearby magnetic fields.

product.name: Sodium Diode
product.subtitle: Crafted Technology Component
product.description:
An advanced circuit component.
The refined sodium electrode within its vacuum tube gives this diode specialist surge-protection capabilities.

product.name: Oxygen Capsule
product.subtitle: Portable Life Support Power
product.description:
Stablised and secure life support filtration gas.
Easily assembled from Oxygen and Ferrite Dust. Offers an efficient method for long-term life support power.

product.name: Advanced Ion Battery
product.subtitle: Portable Energy Storage
product.description:
Powerful energy storage unit. Used in a wide variety of defensive and hazard protection systems.
Constructed from Ionised Cobalt and Pure Ferrite, and occasionally found in cylindrical metal containers.

product.name: Omega Fuselage
product.subtitle: Fighter Starship Component
product.description:
A subcomponent for a Fighter-class starship. This module determines the style and position of the ship's fuselage and cockpit.
Acquire starship components by breaking down existing ships at the Starship Outfitting unit aboard any space station. Visit the Starship Fabricator to design and assemble a new vessel.

product.name: Fleet Command Room
product.subtitle: Expedition Management Terminal
product.description:
Core Fleet Management Station. This advanced holographic communications station is vital for managing fleet expeditions from the comfort of your capital ship.
User is advised that multiple stations are required to manage more than one expedition at a time.

product.name: Orbital Exocraft Materialiser
product.subtitle: Exocraft Rapid Deployment
product.description:
Construction allows the user to summon any owned Exocraft while in the same system as their freighter.
Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Command Menu to ease of use.

product.name: Freighter Corridor
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
This pressurised corridor intelligently adjoins to existing freighter rooms, connecting habitable spaces inside large starships.
This flexible corridor piece will automatically expand and contract to form curves or junctions when placed.

product.name: Straight
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
This pressurised corridor intelligently adjoins to existing freighter rooms, connecting habitable spaces inside large starships.
This flexible corridor piece will automatically expand and contract to form curves or junctions when placed.

product.name: L-Junction
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
This pressurised corridor intelligently adjoins to existing freighter rooms, connecting habitable spaces inside large starships.
This flexible corridor piece will automatically expand and contract to form curves or junctions when placed.

product.name: T-Junction
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
This pressurised corridor intelligently adjoins to existing freighter rooms, connecting habitable spaces inside large starships.
This flexible corridor piece will automatically expand and contract to form curves or junctions when placed.

product.name: Freighter Glass Corridor
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
This pressurised corridor intelligently adjoins to existing freighter rooms, connecting habitable spaces inside large starships. The low-expansion, radiation-proof glass ceiling allows a view into deep space.
This flexible piece will automatically expand and contract to form curves or junctions when placed.

product.name: Straight
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
This pressurised corridor intelligently adjoins to existing freighter rooms, connecting habitable spaces inside large starships.
This flexible corridor piece will automatically expand and contract to form curves or junctions when placed.

product.name: L-Junction
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:

product.name: T-Junction
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
This pressurised corridor intelligently adjoins to existing freighter rooms, connecting habitable spaces inside large starships.
This flexible corridor piece will automatically expand and contract to form curves or junctions when placed.

product.name: Ladder Module
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
An inbuilt freighter ladder for traversing vertically between freighter decks.
Attaches directly to corridors.

product.name: Exterior Platform
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
An unsheltered observation deck. Allows the user to step outside the freighter hull, and gaze directly into the vastness of space.
A Bulkhead Door must be installed to allow access to exterior spaces.

product.name: Exterior Catwalk
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
This exterior walkway intelligently adjoins to existing freighter rooms, creating decking outside the hull of large starships.
A Bulkhead Door must be installed to allow access to exterior spaces.

product.name: Bulkhead Door
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
A thick, robust door.
Hermetically sealed for installation in the freighter hull, or between internal corridors and rooms.

product.name: Reinforced Window
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description:
A pane of low thermal expansion glass.
Can be fitted into the freighter hull to open up a view into space.

product.name: Internal Freighter Wall
product.subtitle: Core Freighter Module
product.description: An interior wall to subdivide large freighter spaces. Seamlessly configures itself to fit the aesthetics of the surrounding room.

product.name: Scanner Room
product.subtitle: Planetary Probe
product.description:
Advanced integrated freighter equipment. Upon use, this planetary scanner probes all celestial bodies in the local solar system. This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.
Scanned moons and planets are Discovered, and sensors collect high-level data such as weather conditions and prominent resources.

product.name: Galactic Trade Room
product.subtitle: Advanced Freighter Module
product.description:
Integrated freighter equipment providing instant local access to the galactic trade market for resources and commodities.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Fleet Command Room
product.subtitle: Expedition Management Terminal
product.description:
Core Fleet Management Station. This advanced holographic communications station is vital for managing fleet expeditions from the comfort of your capital ship. This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.
User is advised that multiple stations are required to manage more than one expedition at a time.

product.name: Teleport Chamber
product.subtitle: Long-Distance Matter Transfer Device
product.description:
Vital integrated freighter equipment. This personal teleport device allows the user to move quickly between their freighter, planetary bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network. User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Appearance Modifier Room
product.subtitle: Customise Personal Visuals
product.description:
Integrated freighter equipment allowing the user to adjust their personal appearance settings. This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.
The module applies advanced holographic techniques to recalibrate the light around the user, allowing them to adopt whatever appearance they desire. Visual data must be properly formatted before use.

product.name: Science Specialist's Room
product.subtitle: Worker Terminal
product.description:
Integrated freighter research equipment tailored to the needs of scientists, and equipped for research and development of scientific blueprints.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Construction Specialist's Room
product.subtitle: Worker Terminal
product.description:
Integrated freighter research equipment tailored to the needs of construction overseers, and equipped with architectural and engineering design software.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Storage Shuttle Room
product.subtitle: Advanced Freighter Module
product.description:
Advanced integrated freighter equipment. Construction allows the user to summon the Storage Shuttle while in the same system as their freighter.
Place excess materials in the shuttle Inventory, then launch to transfer contents to the freighter Inventory.
Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Command Menu for ease of use.

product.name: Technology Room (Expansion)
product.subtitle: Advanced Freighter Module
product.description: A spacious chamber with a technical aesthetic, for expanding habitable spaces inside large spaceships.

product.name: Cultivation Chamber
product.subtitle: Agricultural Module
product.description:
A temperature controlled bio-room. A bed of nutrient-rich soil provides ideal conditions for cultivating agricultural crops.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Double Cultivation Chamber
product.subtitle: Agricultural Module
product.description:
A temperature controlled bio-room. Two beds of nutrient-rich soil provide ideal conditions for cultivating agricultural crops.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Nutrition Room
product.subtitle: Advanced Freighter Module
product.description:
An integrated Nutrient Processor module, able to refine gathered ingredients into edible food products. This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.
User is advised that consumption of generated products is entirely at their own risk.

product.name: Agricultural Specialist's Room
product.subtitle: Worker Terminal
product.description:
Integrated freighter research equipment tailored to the needs of farmers, and equipped for the analysis and cultivation of farmable crops.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Biological Room (Expansion)
product.subtitle: Advanced Freighter Module
product.description: This spacious greenhouse chamber naturally filters and oxygenates the air supply, and offers a little sanctuary of green in freighter habitation.

product.name: Refiner Room
product.subtitle: Advanced Freighter Module
product.description:
Vital integrated freighter equipment. The Freighter Refiner allows three different substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Stellar Extractor Room
product.subtitle: Advanced Freighter Module
product.description:
Advanced integrated freighter equipment. Gathers resources directly from the interstellar medium, via a complex system of suction intakes and condensing tubes. The gathered substance varies with the local star classification.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Orbital Exocraft Materialiser
product.subtitle: Rapid Deployment Freighter Module
product.description:
Advanced integrated freighter equipment. Construction allows the user to summon any owned Exocraft while in the same system as their freighter. This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.
Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Command Menu for ease of use.

product.name: Exocraft Specialist's Room
product.subtitle: Worker Terminal
product.description:
Integrated freighter research equipment tailored to the needs of exocraft technicians, and equipped with bespoke vehicular design software.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Weapons Terminal Room
product.subtitle: Worker Terminal
product.description:
Integrated freighter research equipment tailored to the needs of armourers, and equipped for the development of munitions and explosives as well as selected civilian tech.
This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.

product.name: Storage Room
product.subtitle: Custom Freighter Module
product.description:
Hybrid high-capacity storage unit / shelving module for installation in interstellar freighters. This module is placed as an entire room and comes with its functional units pre-installed.
Inventory capacity interfaces directly with planetary Storage Containers, and the module may be renamed for ease of identification.

An access panel for the Mission Radar, which allows Travellers to search the local system for mission opportunities.
Listings posted on the mission radar are challenging, and may require a corvette's full crew.
This module is installed along the entire wall of a Corvette Hab.

product.name: Panelled Window
product.subtitle: Corvette Window Module
product.description:
This hydraulically sealed window enables a view of deep space from the safety of the starship interior.
This module is installed into the wall of a Corvette Hab.

product.name: Seamless Window
product.subtitle: Corvette Window Module
product.description:
This hydraulically sealed window enables a view of deep space from the safety of the starship interior.
This module is installed into the wall of a Corvette Hab.

product.name: Rounded Window
product.subtitle: Corvette Window Module
product.description:
This hydraulically sealed window enables a view of deep space from the safety of the starship interior.
This module is installed into the wall of a Corvette Hab.

product.name: Living Wall
product.subtitle: Corvette Interior Furnishing
product.description:
A specialist hydroponics unit, allowing cultivation of planetary crops while travelling through deep space.
This module is installed along the entire wall of a Corvette Hab.

product.name: Internal Door
product.subtitle: Corvette Interior Furnishing
product.description:
A heavy-duty doorway, allowing access between habitation modules. These doors will be automatically sealed in the event of a hull breach.
This module is installed into the wall of a Corvette Hab.

product.subtitle: Corvette External Plating

A piece of hull cowling for a Corvette-class starship, designed to streamline and protect core ship components.
Assemble a corvette at the dedicated Corvette Workshop aboard any Space Station.
