product.name: Foundation
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: The base unit for all construction projects, providing a solid foundation for any structure. Can be anchored to all types of terrain.

product.name: Straight Corridor
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A standard, straight corridor module for connecting rooms.

product.name: L-Shaped Corridor
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A sturdy, corridor module for connecting rooms, with an L-shaped bend.

product.name: T-Shaped Corridor
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A corridor module with a branching, t-shaped form, for joining multiple rooms.

product.name: X-Shaped Corridor
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: An x-shaped corridor unit for connecting four rooms in a cruciform arrangement.

product.name: Cylindrical Room
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: The core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

product.name: Foundation Strut Quad
product.subtitle: Construction item
product.description: A prefabricated set of four legs for elevated construction.

product.name: Foundation Strut
product.subtitle: Construction item
product.description: A reinforced non-ferrous metal support leg for elevated construction.

product.name: Tower Module
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A tall, stackable tower module, with rigid, reinforced sides and additional weatherproofing to counter exposure to the elements.

product.name: Cuboid Room
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A small, cuboid construction module that can be stacked or linked to form larger structures.

product.name: Cuboid Room Foundation Strut
product.subtitle: Construction item
product.description: A sturdy leg for supporting cuboid rooms.

product.name: Cuboid Room Foundation Strut Quad
product.subtitle: Construction item
product.description: A prefabricated set of four legs for supporting cuboid rooms.

product.name: Cuboid Room Flooring
product.subtitle: Construction item
product.description: Hard-wearing composite floor panels cut for cuboid rooms.

product.name: Glass Roofed Corridor
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: Corridor with reinforced glass roofing.

product.name: Access Ramp
product.subtitle: Construction item
product.description: A reinforced, highly-ferrous ramp to provide access to buildings.

product.name: Bio-Dome
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: An attractive domed room which is perfect for cultivating a wide range of botanical matter.

product.name: Curved Cuboid Roof
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A curved, glass-fronted roof module that can be stacked or linked to form larger structures.

product.name: Curved Cuboid Wall
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A curved, cuboid wall module that can be stacked or linked to form larger structures.

product.name: Glass Cuboid Room
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A cuboid room module which is created almost entirely out of glass. Excellent for observing areas of natural beauty.

product.name: Cuboid Room Frame
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: Lightweight cuboid support structures which can be stacked or linked to form large industrial structures.

product.name: Cuboid Inner Door
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: An inner door module used to divide cuboid rooms.

product.name: Cuboid Inner Wall
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: An inner wall module used to divide cuboid rooms.

product.name: Cuboid Roof Cap
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A cuboid roof cap used to decorate and reinforce the rooftops of cuboid structures.

product.name: Interior Stairs
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A set of stairs to improve access inside cuboid structures.

product.name: Door
product.subtitle: Construction item
product.description: A compression-sealed, standard door suitable for all rooms and corridors.

product.name: Holo-Door
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: An elegant holographic door which allows quick access to any structure while regulating the temperature and toxicity of the interior.

product.name: Viewing Sphere
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A self-contained spherical viewing platform which affords the user stunning views of the surrounding environment.

product.name: Cylindrical Room Frame
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A lightweight, industrial alternative to the standard Cylindrical Room.

product.name: Curved Corridor
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A sturdy, large corridor module for connecting rooms, with a curved bend.

product.name: Square Room
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A square alternative to the core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

product.name: Square Room
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A square alternative to the core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

product.name: Base Computer
product.subtitle: Site Evaluation Device
product.description:
Portable land registration service.
When placed, contacts Universal Cartographic Archive to establish ownership of land. Successful registration allows the construction of base modules across any site of the user's choosing.

product.name: Landing Pad
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A stable, reinforced landing pad for starships.

product.name: Galactic Trade Terminal
product.subtitle: Trading terminal
product.description: A trading terminal that provides instant local access to the market for resources and commodities.

product.name: Health Station
product.subtitle: Health recharge module
product.description: A wall mounted module that can be used to recharge health.

product.name: Hazard Protection Unit
product.subtitle: Hazard Protection Charging System
product.description:
A wall mounted module that can be used to recharge the user's Hazard Protection systems.
The Hazard Protection Unit must be kept charged with a source of fuel.

product.name: Save Point
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A buildable save point for managing your progress.

product.name: Save Beacon
product.subtitle: Portable waypoint marker
product.description:
Once activated, beacons provide a permanent navigational waypoint, facilitating repeat visits to specific locations.
Allows user to record their progress at any time.

product.name: Signal Booster
product.subtitle: Environmental scanner
product.description:
A versatile scanner that detects nearby buildings. Can decrypt Navigation Data to pinpoint specific locations.
The Signal Booster can be dismantled and redeployed for easy transportation.

product.name: Antimatter Reactor
product.subtitle: Baryogenesis Unit
product.description:
An autonomous baryogenesis reactor, this device can be left to harvest reality paradoxes and convert them into usable antimatter. User must monitor fuel levels to ensure continued operation.
The resulting antimatter is safely contained, ready for use in all standard hyperspace power units.

product.name: Base Teleport Module
product.subtitle: Long-Distance Matter Transfer Device
product.description:
A personal teleport device, allowing the user to move quickly between their constructed bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network.
User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.

product.name: Base Teleport Module
product.subtitle: Long-Distance Matter Transfer Device
product.description:
A personal teleport device, allowing the user to move quickly between their constructed bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network.
User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.

product.name: Base Salvage Capsule
product.subtitle: Autonomous Storage Device
product.description:
A construction recovery device.
This optional piece of base technology stores and preserves matter left over after the destruction of a previous base.

product.name: Construction Research Unit
product.subtitle: Technology Recovery Device
product.description:
Portable blueprint research device.
This field-deployable research module allows the user to convert old or damaged technology modules into advanced construction blueprints.

product.name: Portable Refiner
product.subtitle: Automated Refinery Unit
product.description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.
The Portable Refiner can be dismantled and redeployed for easy transportation. Note: the Portable Refiner requires fuel to operate.

product.name: Medium Refiner
product.subtitle: Automated Refinery Unit
product.description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.
The Medium Refiner allows two different substances to be combined into one new material, or materials to be processed at better ratios.
The Medium Refiner must be installed in a Habitable Base, but does not require additional power sources.

product.name: Large Refiner
product.subtitle: Automated Refinery Unit
product.description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.
The Large Refiner allows three different substances to be combined into one new material, or materials to be processed at better ratios.
The Large Refiner must be installed in a Habitable Base, but does not require additional power sources.

product.name: Appearance Modifier
product.subtitle: Customise Personal Visuals
product.description:
A buildable module that allows the users to adjust their personal appearance settings.
The module applies advanced holographic techniques to recalibrate the light around the user, allowing them to adopt whatever appearance they desire. Visual data must be properly formated before use.

product.name: Nutrient Processor
product.subtitle: Portable Sustenance Unit
product.description:
A portable nutrient extractor, able to process and refine gathered ingredients into edible food products.
User is advised that consumption of generated products is entirely at their own risk.

product.name: Automated Feeder
product.subtitle: Agricultural Robot
product.description:
A robotic farming unit, designed to automatically supply nearby creatures with food.
When powered, will attract nearby animal life. Keep bait tanks full in order to supply lifeforms with desired food.

product.name: Livestock Unit
product.subtitle: Automatic Harvesting Robot
product.description:
A robotic farming unit, designed to automatically harvest substances from creatures. Requires power.
Creatures that are ready to be harvested for milk, eggs or other specialist produce will approach the Livestock Unit and deposit their yields. The creatures are unharmed by the process.
Will harvest produce from creatures fed by hand or via an Automated Feeder.

product.name: Muster Point
product.subtitle: Ship-summoning beacon
product.description: A buildable device that can summon your starship to it from any location.

product.name: Message Module
product.subtitle: Communications terminal
product.description: A small and accessible information container for leaving messages or viewing left messages and short strings of information.

product.name: Communications Station
product.subtitle: Communications terminal
product.description: A terminal for the composition and transmission of messages to other travellers.

product.name: Nomad Geobay
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: An underground secure parking facility for the Nomad light Exocraft.

product.name: Roamer Geobay
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: An underground secure parking facility for the Roamer medium Exocraft.

product.name: Colossus Geobay
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: An underground secure parking facility for the Colossus large Exocraft.

product.name: Pilgrim Geobay
product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: An underground secure parking facility for the Pilgrim light Exocraft.

product.name: Nautilon Chamber
product.subtitle: Submarine Docking Bay
product.description: An advanced, fully-airlocked docking station for the Nautilon submarine.

product.name: Nautilon Platform
product.subtitle: Surface-Deployable Submarine Bay
product.description:
An advanced, fully-watertight docking station for the Nautilon submarine.
This specially adapted platform is designed to be deployed on the surface of the water.

product.name: Exocraft Summoning Station
product.subtitle: Vehicle Translocation Device
product.description:
Construction allows the user to summon any owned Exocraft from anywhere else in that system.
Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Command Menu for ease of use. Can be compressed and carried within the Exosuit with DECONSTRUCT for later redeployment.

product.name: Minotaur Geobay
product.subtitle: Heavy Loader Storage Bay
product.description:
A secure parking, summoning and customisation facility for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.
Deploy the Minotaur from the Quick Menu. With the aid of an Orbital Exocraft Materialiser mounted inside a freighter, the Minotaur can be instantly deployed to any location within the same system as the mothership.

product.name: Science Terminal
product.subtitle: Specialist terminal
product.description: A research station tailored to the needs of Scientists, and equipped for research and development of scientific blueprints.

product.name: Weapons Terminal
product.subtitle: Specialist terminal
product.description: A research station tailored to the needs of Armourers, and equipped for the development of munitions and explosives as well as selected civilian tech.

product.name: Agricultural Terminal
product.subtitle: Specialist terminal
product.description: A research station tailored to the needs of Farmers, and equipped for the analysis and cultivation of farmable crops.

product.name: Exocraft Terminal
product.subtitle: Specialist terminal
product.description: A research station tailored to the needs of Technicians, and equipped with bespoke vehicular design software.

product.name: Construction Terminal
product.subtitle: Specialist terminal
product.description: A research station tailored to the needs of Construction Overseers, and equipped with architectural and engineering design software.

product.name: Hydroponic Tray
product.subtitle: Farming tech
product.description:
A self contained growth system for the indoor cultivation of agricultural crops.
Build requirement: Must be placed indoors.

product.name: Large Hydroponic Tray
product.subtitle: Farming tech
product.description:
A self contained growth system for the indoor cultivation of agricultural crops. Can support up to four plants.
Build requirement: Must be placed indoors.

product.name: Fungal Cluster
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
A spherical fungus with internal gills, found only in toxic biomes. Fungal Clusters can be transplanted for cultivation, yielding a bountiful harvest.
Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Toxic climate before planting outdoors.
Approximate growing time: 4 hours

product.name: Frostwort
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
A large crystal flower with radiant blue blooms, found only in snowy biomes. Frostwort can be farmed and makes a reliable crop, and its adaptation to harsh conditions results in highly frequent harvests.
Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Frozen climate before planting outdoors.
Approximate growing time: 1 hour

product.name: Gamma Weed
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
A luminous, leafy flowering plant that thrives in radioactive biomes and can be cultivated to yield a bountiful harvest.
Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Radioactive climate before planting outdoors.
Approximate growing time: 4 hours

product.name: Echinocactus
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
Native to barren biomes and capable of withstanding long periods of drought, Echinocactus is an edible succulent that responds well to cultivation, yielding a large but occasional harvest.
Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Barren climate before planting outdoors.
Approximate growing time: 16 hours

product.name: Star Bramble
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
A medium-sized, farmable plant that yields an occasional harvest of valuable Star Bulbs.
Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Lush climate before planting outdoors.
Approximate growing time: 4 hours

product.name: Solar Vine
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
This 'living rock' is adapted to live in the extreme heat of scorched biomes. However, it can be farmed in most environments and, once established, yields a moderate harvest.
Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Hot climate before planting outdoors.
Approximate growing time: 16 hours

product.name: Mordite Root
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
An inedible tuber that produces a small yield of Mordite crystals.
A peaceful alternative to the process of harvesting Mordite from the corpses of creatures. Mordite Root must be grown in a Hydroponics Tray.
Approximate growing time: 8 hours

product.name: Gutrot Flower
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
A foul-smelling, farmable flower that replicates the chemical structure of faecal matter. When planted inside, yields a harvest of Faecium.
A good alternative to collecting Faecium by hand, which requires feeding creatures and then harvesting their droppings. Gutrot Flowers must be grown in a Hydroponics Tray.
Approximate growing time: 4 hours

product.name: Gravitino Host
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
A strange, potentially parasitic plant that yields an occasional harvest of the highly tradable commodity, Gravitino Balls.
Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Cannot be planted outdoors.
Approximate growing time: 2 hours

product.name: Venom Urchin
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
A small, innocuous looking plant whose leaves periodically secrete a small amount of potent Sac Venom, a valuable trading commodity.
Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Cannot be planted outdoors.
Approximate growing time: 3 hours 20 mins

product.name: Albumen Pearl Orb
product.subtitle: Orb Plant
product.description:
A medium-sized, farmable Crystal Orb that yields an occasional harvest of valuable Albumen Pearls.
Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Cannot be planted outdoors.
Approximate growing time: 80 mins

product.name: NipNip
product.subtitle: Plantable Seed
product.description:
This medicinal herb is known for its pungent buds, which are harvested to produce Gek Nip. NipNip thrives in dank environments, and often grows as a weed.
Suitable for hydroponic planting indoors. Needs a tropical or humid climate before planting outdoors.

product.name: Oxygen Harvester
product.subtitle: Atmosphere Processing Device
product.description:
An autonomous atmosphere extractor, this device can be left to collect and purify oxygen from the air. User must monitor fuel levels to ensure continued operation.
The resulting gas is compressed and processed, ready for use in all standard life support systems.

product.name: Autonomous Mining Unit
product.subtitle: Portable mining device
product.description: An automated harvester for the mining of resources. Once activated, the AMU extracts minerals without the need for supervision, providing a regular yield until the site is exhausted.

product.name: Atmosphere Harvester
product.subtitle: Autonomous Gas Compressor
product.description: An automated siphon unit for the collection of valuable gases. Once activated, the harvester condenses and compresses substances from the air over time. Compressed gas is then stored safely until collected.

product.name: Automated Trap
product.subtitle: Self-Sustaining Auto Creel
product.description:
An autonomous fishing device, designed for long-term deployment in a wide-range of water conditions.
Once activated, the system will lure and trap any nearby aquatic creatures and store them for later retrieval.

product.subtitle: Construction module
product.description: A stable, reinforced landing pad for starships.

product.name: Kite-Patterned Rug

product.name: Kiln-Fired Pot
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: A gold-rimmed pot for storing anything from potpourri to GekNip to proto-sausage pie. A ceramic blend of ferrite and clay, this ornament lends a rustic touch to base decor.

product.name: Upholstered Chair
product.subtitle: Decoration

product.name: Golden Table
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: This elegant hexagonal table features an inbuilt thermal grille, for maintaining the temperature of cooked products, or for warming or cooling aching fingers.

product.name: Wall Light
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: A low-energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

product.name: Golden Half Counter
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
This beautiful golden half counter is coated in a thin layer of living glass, ensuring thermal stability and a scratch-free finish. An illuminated base assists visibility in all lighting conditions.
Place alongside Golden Counter and Golden Counter Corner modules to create bespoke counter layouts.

product.name: Golden Counter
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description:
This beautiful golden counter is coated in a thin layer of living glass, ensuring thermal stability and a scratch-free finish. An illuminated base assists visibility in all lighting conditions.

product.name: Vintage Teapot
product.subtitle: Decoration
product.description: A rustic-styled vessel for brewing and serving hot beverages, crafted in the traditional style of the Gek First Spawn. This decorative tableware lends a touch of comfort and style to bases.

product.name: Table Lamp
product.subtitle: Decoration

product.name: Vintage Tumbler

product.name: Vintage Cooking Pan
product.subtitle: Decoration

product.name: Ornate Stool
product.subtitle: Decoration

product.name: Mineral Extractor
product.subtitle: Substance Distribution Module
product.description:
An automated mineral harvester. Determine a site with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Mineral extraction rates and produced minerals will vary from site to site.
Requires power to function. Connect to Silos with Pipelines to allow collection from more convenient sites.

product.name: Gas Extractor
product.subtitle: Substance Distribution Module
product.description:
An automated gas harvester. Determine a site with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Gas extraction rates and produced gases will vary from site to site.
Requires power to function. Connect to Silos with Pipelines to allow collection from more convenient sites.

product.name: Supply Depot
product.subtitle: Substance Distribution Module
product.description:
Automated storage unit. Connect to a Supply Grid using Pipelines.
Automatically stores the output of various Mineral and Gas Extractors, allowing for increased capacity and more efficient siting. Can be located a long distances from the extraction site.

product.name: Solar Panel
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
An efficient power generator, this solar array will turn sunlight into the electrical energy required to power many base structures.
Generates no power at night. Partner with Batteries to store energy for the hours of darkness.

product.name: Electromagnetic Generator
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
When suitably placed in an area of high field strength, efficient electromagnetic dynamos are used to generate near limitless power.
Locate appropriate sites with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Power output will vary from site to site.

product.name: Biofuel Reactor
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
A small power generator. Burns carbon-based fuel placed in its furnace tank and converts it into usable power.
Connect power generators to base structures and technologies with electrical wiring. Many parts require power to function.

product.name: Electrical Wiring
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
High-capacity electrical wiring. Use wiring to connect Power Generators to your base. Most technology, as well as structures with embedded lighting systems, require a power source to operate.
Wiring can be connected to various switches to facilitate selective power flow.

product.name: Teleport Cable
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description: Advanced fibre-optic cabling, designed to link one or more Short-Range Teleporters.

product.name: ByteBeat Cable
product.subtitle: ByteBeat Extension
product.description:
Advanced cabling, designed to link one or more Bytebeat Generators or to connect a Bytebeat Switch to the network.
The signal will synchronize connected lights and device to the generated waveform.

product.name: Wall Switch
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when pulled.
Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

product.name: Floor Switch
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when stood upon or otherwise activated.
Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

product.name: Battery
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
Highly-efficient energy storage units. Connect to a power grid, and onboard power management circuits will automatically draw down spare capacity to charge its cells.
When the grid attempts to draw more power than is currently supplied, the battery will automatically deploy power to make up the shortfall.

product.name: Button
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when used.
Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

product.name: Proximity Switch
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when an entity is detected nearby.
Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

product.name: Supply Pipe
product.subtitle: Substance Distribution Module
product.description:
Flexible, high-strength piping. Able to withstand a highly-pressurised internal environment.
Used for connecting various Mineral and Gas Extractors to Silos

product.name: Power Inverter
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when used.
Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

product.name: Auto Switch
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
A power management device, this switch will toggle the flow of power when signaled by an incoming signal.
Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

product.name: Short-Range Teleporter
product.subtitle: Instantaneous Transport Network
product.description:
A low-powered teleporter, construction for instantaneous travel across short distances.
When wired to both a power source and another short-range teleporter, allows near-instant travel between nearby locations.

product.name: Short-Range Teleporter
product.subtitle: Instantaneous Transport Network
product.description:
A low-powered teleporter, construction for instantaneous travel across short distances.
When wired to both a power source and another short-range teleporter, allows near-instant travel between nearby locations.

product.name: Bytebeat Switch
product.subtitle: ByteBeat Extension
product.description: A musical switching device, designed to interpret waveform signals generated by a Bytebeat Generator and output electrical impulses to connected lights and other devices.

product.name: Electrical Cloaking Unit
product.subtitle: Power Distribution Module
product.description:
Device to enable a wireless aesthetic in habitable bases.
Constructing the Electrical Cloaking Unit within a powered base will reduce the visual prominence of all local Electrical Wiring. Hidden wires will continue to supply electricity, provided they are sufficiently powered.

procedural-product.name: Delicate Flora
procedural-product.subtitle: Delicate Flora
procedural-product.description:
A genetically engineered plant, ready for propagation. Sample appears to have %AGE% mutated genes.
Root Structure: %ROOTS% Nutrient Source: %FOOD% Notes: %NOTES%

procedural-product.name: Aquatic Treasure
procedural-product.subtitle: Aquatic Treasure
procedural-product.description:
A well-preserved marine treasure, found deep under the ocean. It was protected from the elements by a thick sea-chest, and is at least %AGE%00 years old.
Highly valuable to collectors of ancient artifacts.

procedural-product.name: Terrifying Sample
procedural-product.subtitle: Terrifying Sample
procedural-product.description:
An appalling relic, the haunted remains of some abyssal horror. It has lived at least %AGE%0 lifetimes, and will live many more again.
Will stalk the bearer across the galaxy and the next, unless it is sold before the curse can take effect.

procedural-product.name: Terrifying Sample
procedural-product.subtitle: Terrifying Sample
procedural-product.description:
An appalling relic, the haunted remains of some abyssal horror. It has lived at least %AGE%0 lifetimes, and will live many more again.
Will stalk the bearer across the galaxy and the next, unless it is sold before the curse can take effect.

procedural-product.name: Ancient Skeleton
procedural-product.subtitle: Ancient Skeleton
procedural-product.description:
Approximately %AGE%00 years old, and made from pure gold.
These bones are unlike those of any terrestial creature. The remains of a true deep-space leviathan.

procedural-product.name: Salvaged Hyperdrive Upgrade
procedural-product.subtitle: C-Class Deployable Salvage
procedural-product.description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.
Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve its Hyperdrive.

procedural-product.name: Salvaged Fleet Beacon
procedural-product.subtitle: C-Class Deployable Salvage
procedural-product.description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.
Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the speed of your fleet.

procedural-product.name: Salvaged Fleet Fuel Unit
procedural-product.subtitle: C-Class Deployable Salvage
procedural-product.description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.
Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the fuel efficiency of your fleet.

procedural-product.name: Salvaged Fleet Trade Unit
procedural-product.subtitle: C-Class Deployable Salvage
procedural-product.description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.
Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the trading abilities of your fleet.

procedural-product.name: Salvaged Fleet Combat Unit
procedural-product.subtitle: C-Class Deployable Salvage
procedural-product.description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.
Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the combat performance of your fleet.

procedural-product.name: Salvaged Fleet Mining Unit
procedural-product.subtitle: C-Class Deployable Salvage
procedural-product.description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.
Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the mining capabilities of your fleet.

procedural-product.name: Salvaged Fleet Exploration Unit
procedural-product.subtitle: C-Class Deployable Salvage
procedural-product.description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.
Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the exploration abilities of your fleet.

technology.name: Hazard Protection
technology.subtitle: Exosuit Environmental Shielding
technology.description:
The Exosuit's Hazard Protection system continually monitors and stabilises the user's environment.
General reactive protection may be augmented with Environmental Shields, offering increased protection against specific conditions.
The device is charged with sodium-based substances. User is advised that a failure to charge the Hazard Protection system may allow their environment to become incompatible with life.

technology.name: Shield Lattice
technology.subtitle: Hazard Protection Upgrade
technology.description: Increases the base capacity of the Hazard Protection system, allowing the user to spend longer in hazardous environments without recharging their Exosuit.

technology.name: Life Support
technology.subtitle: Suit Survival Power Pack
technology.description:
The core of the Exosuit, the Life Support System continually filters and pumps breathable Oxygen.
In addition to its role in the continued existence of the Exosuit user, the Life Support Unit uses surplus oxygen to generate power for secondary systems, such as the Jetpack, Speed Augmentation and Torch.

technology.name: Oxygen Recycler
technology.subtitle: Life Support Upgrade
technology.description: Increases the base capacity of the Life Support system, allowing the user to go longer between charges.

technology.name: Jetpack
technology.subtitle: Aerial Propulsion Booster
technology.description:
Provides the Exosuit with advanced movement capabilities, including temporary flight.
Control thrust with JUMP. The flightpack uses energy from the Exosuit Life Support system to pressurise and vent bursts of gas, propelling the user into the air.
Jetpack can be temporarily overloaded by gathering Deuterium-rich plants, causing a dramatic increase in available thrust.

technology.name: Neural Stimulator
technology.subtitle: Exosuit Movement Upgrade
technology.description: Increases the capacity of the Exosuit's Jetpack Tanks and Adrenal Pump Reserves, allowing the user to both fly and sprint longer.

technology.name: Rocket Boots
technology.subtitle: Exosuit Upgrade
technology.description:
Equips the Exosuit jetpack with advanced jump capabilities, allowing the user to take huge leaps with ease.
Activate jump systems by rapidly pressing JUMP.

technology.name: Airburst Engine
technology.subtitle: Jetpack Augmentation
technology.description:
A powerful upgrade for the Exosuit Jetpack, allowing limited jetpack recharging while airborne.
Highly efficient compressors fitted around the jetpack exhaust take advantage of the windflow generated by persistent falling, recycling some of that energy into jetpack fuel.

technology.name: Coolant Network
technology.subtitle: Hazard Protection Unit
technology.description:
User is guarded from extreme heat damage on scorched worlds.
Provides relief from intense atmospheric and solar heat through a threaded dermal distribution network of liquid frenium.
Device is charged by mineral extracts found in hot environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

technology.name: Thermic Layer
technology.subtitle: Hazard Protection Unit
technology.description:
User is guarded from extreme cold damage on frozen worlds.
Heat capillaries threaded through a user's suit that evenly distributes liquid calidium to maintain a comfortable body temperature.
Device is charged by mineral extracts found in frozen environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

technology.name: Toxic Suppressor
technology.subtitle: Hazard Protection Unit
technology.description:
User is protected from toxic damage.
Reactive compounds within the Suppressor remove toxic liquids that fall on the user, thereby reducing peril and choking hazards.
Device is charged by mineral extracts found in toxic environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

technology.name: Radiation Deflector
technology.subtitle: Hazard Protection Unit
technology.description:
User is shielded from radiation damage.
Greatly reduces user peril during the exploration of irradiated worlds. Micro-vibrations increase electromagnetic wave reflection, thereby reducing absorption.
Device is charged by mineral extracts found in radioactive environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

technology.name: Aeration Membrane
technology.subtitle: Aquatic Respiration Aid
technology.description:
User is able to swim underwater for extended periods.
Absorbs gases dissolved in water through a membrane contactor that, if user is of a conventionally structured species, is placed over the mouth or facial breathing hole.
Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

technology.name: Pressure Membrane
technology.subtitle: Reinforced Barometric Stabiliser
technology.description:
Extreme pressure environments - such as deep water - cause elevated stress on the Exosuit's oxygen circulation and general life support systems.
Installation of this reinforced pressurisation shell increases efficiency and protection while operating in high-pressure environments.

technology.name: Exocraft Summoning Unit
technology.subtitle: Vehicle Translocation Device
technology.description:
A high-powered matter teleportation device, this personal translocator allows any connected Exocraft to be instantly transported to your location, from anywhere in the galaxy.
Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Menu for ease of use.

technology.name: Personal Refiner
technology.subtitle: Self-Mounted Advanced Refiner
technology.description:
A compact extension to the Exosuit, installing a small Portable Refiner, accessible directly from the user's Exosuit interface.
Unit requires fuel and is limited to refining one substance at a time.

technology.name: Personal Refiner Mk 2
technology.subtitle: Self-Mounted Advanced Refiner
technology.description:
A compact extension to the Exosuit, installing an advanced yet portable Medium Refiner, accessible directly from the user's Exosuit interface.
Unit requires fuel and is able to refine more complex recipes than the standard personal refiner unit.

technology.name: Haz-Mat Gauntlet
technology.subtitle: Exosuit Augmentation
technology.description:
Upgrades the metallic shielding of the Exosuit's gloves.
An advanced blend of reinforced metal and catalytic shielding allows the user to safely handle hazardous substances, as well as perform the necessary feats of strength required to harvest certain farmable flora.

technology.name: Remembrance
technology.subtitle: A relic of another place
technology.description: Everything you ever knew is within.

technology.name: Star Seed
technology.subtitle: Cosmic Brand
technology.description:
The smallest of sparks, housed within a containment field of unknown origins.
The seed glows with life, desperate to escape and fulfill its potential.

technology.name: Mark of the Denier
technology.subtitle: Cosmic Brand
technology.description:
A tiny mote of stardust, no more than a speck. On closer examination, its surface is all crystalline shards and distorted crimson geometry.
It flickers with pent-up energy, demanding to be free.
Empower the mark as you discover systems, planets and objects across the universe.

technology.name: Obsolete Technology
technology.subtitle: Old, unusable technology
technology.description:
A piece of technology, corrupted by interference from the Atlas.
Can be recycled for usable components.

technology.name: Efficient Water Jets
technology.subtitle: Jetpack Upgrade Unit
technology.description:
Improves the fuel efficiency of the jetpack's marine jets, reducing the drain on Exosuit life support systems.
Aqueous compressor units are installed into the jetpack's turbines, bypassing the large energy requirements of underwater ignition.

technology.name: Oxygen Rerouter
technology.subtitle: Emergency Life Support System
technology.description:
Upgrades the Aeration Membrane of the Exosuit to harvest oxygen from the Life Support system in the event of a breathing emergency, allowing the user to resurface and seek conventional fuel supplies.
Note: Long-term conversion of life support energy to breathable gas is not recommended, and may result in life no longer being supported.

technology.name: Simple Translator
technology.subtitle: Automatic Language Parser
technology.description:
An automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.
Low memory capacity on this entry-level model limits translation capacity.

technology.name: Superior Translator
technology.subtitle: Automatic Language Parser
technology.description:
An automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.
Parallel language processors enable a greater proportion of recorded speech to be translated.

technology.name: Advanced Translator
technology.subtitle: Automatic Language Parser
technology.description:
An automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.
A large memory array and overclocked language processors allow the real-time translation of significant chunks of speech.

technology.name: Artemis' Translator
technology.subtitle: Automatic Language Parser
technology.description:
An automatic translation device. Device must be calibrated by pre-loading with existing translation data. Device must have network connection to Artemis to function.
Without access to host translation service, on-board circuit allows limited real-time translation of a small number of words.

technology.name: Visceral Synthesiser
technology.subtitle: Ethereal Incubator
technology.description:
A piece of otherworldy technology. Its inviting membranes are soft, gel-like, pulsing with a gentle crimson radiance.
Its warm embrace allows the user to extricate any Vile Spawn from the embryotic sacs of Hungering Tendrils.

technology.name: Archive Bypass Implant
technology.subtitle: Subcutaneous Access Circuit
technology.description:
A biotechnical firewall, developed as a safeguard against textual cognitohazards. It is coated in something slippery, and has started to bubble along the surface.
Embedded beneath the skin, this grants administrative access to ancient forbidden texts bound at a Planetary Archive. Warning: Do not unbind the forbidden texts. Exposure to forbidden texts carries extreme risk.

technology.name: Trade Rocket
technology.subtitle: Mercantile Missile Summoning Device
technology.description:
A personal rocketry device with a direct link to the Galactic Trade Network. This unit allows the user to load a small spacecraft with goods. Upon launch, the goods will be transported to the nearest trade terminus and automatically sold.
Summon the Trade Rocket using the QUICK_MENU.

technology.name: Exo-Skiff
technology.subtitle: Deployable Fishing Platform
technology.description:
A deployable static platform, allowing the user to comfortably survey the seas in any weather. As well as providing a steady and easily accessible fishing spot, the Exo-Skiff also features abundant Cold Storage, granting additional space to store your catch.
Summon the Exo-Skiff to any suitable body of water using the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

technology.name: Nutrient Ingestor
technology.subtitle: Automatic Feeding Unit
technology.description:
The nutrient ingestor improves exosuit performance via the automatic portioning and processing of various cooked items.
Select Begin Ingestion to commence automatic consumption of supplied ingredients.

technology.name: Anomaly Suppressor
technology.subtitle: Automated Breach Integrity Device
technology.description:
As the boundaries of reality begin to weaken, the risk of catastrophic breach anomalies increases.
This device monitors and maintains the local boundary strength, guarding against reality continuity errors. Supply the device with glass to maintain functionality.

technology.name: Pulse Engine
technology.subtitle: Starship Flight Booster
technology.description:
Spaceflight propulsion, boosts and on-demand Pulse Jumps through local system.
User is advised that Tritium is required to charge Pulse Engine. Tritium is abundant in near-space asteroid fields. Locate Tritium with the starship scanner (SCAN).
Hold PULSEJUMP to engage Pulse Jump. Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

technology.name: Instability Drive
technology.subtitle: Pulse Engine Augmentation
technology.description:
A highly-advanced upgrade for the Pulse Engine, vastly increasing fuel efficiency.
Tritium supplies are redirected into a cycle of miniature black holes. Resulting micro-gravity fluctuations are harnessed to boost starship propulsion beyond conventional combustion-based approaches.

technology.name: Sub-Light Amplifier
technology.subtitle: Pulse Engine Augmentation
technology.description:
A highly-advanced upgrade for the Pulse Engine, vastly increasing interplanetary speed.
Naturally occuring frameshift effects within the Pulse Engine are amplified by tritium-based resonators, increasing its maximum sub-light speed.

technology.name: Flight Assist Override
technology.subtitle: Advanced Starship Pilot Module
technology.description:
This grey-market electronics module disables critical safety and pilot-assistance modules usually baked into the starship's fly-by-wire control system. Despite its dubious legal status and its implication in a series of high-speed asteroid impacts, this module remains popular with smugglers, mercenaries, and others who think of themselves as advanced pilots.
Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the starship to drift during spaceflight.

technology.name: Photonix Core
technology.subtitle: Pulse Engine Companion Unit
technology.description: Provides increased manoeuvrability and longer boosts during spaceflight.

technology.name: Launch Thruster
technology.subtitle: Vertical Take-off System
technology.description:
Vital launch and landing gear system.
User is advised that specialised, Deuterium-derived fuel is required to recharge thruster. Launch procedures require sufficient fuel levels before activation.
Hold THRUST to take off from planet. Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

technology.name: Efficient Thrusters
technology.subtitle: Starship Launch System Upgrade
technology.description: Upgrades the starship launch systems, decreasing the fuel cost of takeoff.

technology.name: Launch Auto-Charger
technology.subtitle: Starship Launch System Upgrade
technology.description:
Photovoltaic panels fitted to the starship Launch Thrusters allow for a slow trickle charge while the ship is not in operation.
Harvested light is used to fuse di-hydrogen from the atmosphere and over time will refuel the Launch Thrusters automatically.

technology.name: Aqua-Jets
technology.subtitle: Aquatic Landing System
technology.description:
An advanced upgrade for the starship's landing system, enabling the ship to land and take off from aquatic surfaces.
A mixture of bespoke jets and re-directed exhaust fans allow the ship to hover just above the water's surface.

technology.name: Teleport Receiver
technology.subtitle: Ship-Mounted Teleportation Device
technology.description:
A device that modulates standard starship communication signals to enable the transport of matter as well as data.
Starships fitted with such a device can send and receive products and substances to a user's exosuit over a long distance.

technology.name: Hyperdrive
technology.subtitle: Lightspeed Warp Drive
technology.description:
FTL propulsion drive that allows starship to attain warp speed and jump between neighbouring systems.
User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems through Galactic Map.

technology.name: Cadmium Drive
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Upgrade: Red Systems
technology.description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's core bounding magnets, preventing rapid disassembly when attempting to reach rare-class red stellar bodies.
User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

technology.name: Emeril Drive
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Upgrade: Green Systems
technology.description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's shield integrity, preventing reality glitches when attempting to reach rare-class green stellar bodies.
User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

technology.name: Indium Drive
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Upgrade: Blue Systems
technology.description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's computational matrix, preventing temporal anomalies when attempting to reach rare-class blue stellar bodies.
User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

technology.name: Atlantid Drive
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Upgrade: Purple Systems
technology.description:
Sideloads a resonant memory packet into your warp computer, allowing the ship to pass through the dissonant space surrounding purple stellar bodies.
User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

technology.name: Emergency Warp Unit
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Augmentation
technology.description:
A significant upgrade to the Hyperdrive that allows an instantaneous warp even while conventional systems are blocked by starship combat. Access to the emergency warp system is via the Quick Menu.
WARNING: Fast scramble systems mean the user is unable to plot a destination. Uncalculated lightspeed events will damage the unit and require frequent repairs.

technology.name: Cargo Scan Deflector
technology.subtitle: Anti-Probe Countermeasures
technology.description:
A specially tuned resonance jammer, designed to interfere with the remote cargo scans deployed by system authorities in the search for smuggled goods.
Deploy from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU) while a scan is in progress to deflect the probe. Note: jamming is not 100% effective.

technology.name: Deflector Shield
technology.subtitle: Spacecraft Hull Protection
technology.description:
Energy shield that protects spacecraft from laser fire, in-flight projectiles and accidental space debris interaction.
User is advised that catalytic elements are required to recharge device.
Operates automatically once constructed within user's starship inventory.

technology.name: Ablative Armour
technology.subtitle: Starship Shield Upgrade
technology.description:
Adds a layer of superheated shielding to the starship's defense array, vaporising incoming fire.
Significantly increases starship shield performance.

technology.name: Rocket Launcher
technology.subtitle: Long Range Starship Weapon
technology.description:
A long range starship weapon, capable of delivering a highly explosive torpedo across massive distances.
Note: explosive damage is highly effective against unshielded targets, but ineffective against shielded targets.
Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

technology.name: Large Rocket Tubes
technology.subtitle: Starship Rockets Upgrade
technology.description: Expands the loading chamber of the starship Rocket Launcher, improving exhaust performance and allowing for significantly faster heat recovery.

technology.name: Photon Cannon
technology.subtitle: Starship Projectile Weapon
technology.description:
A destructive starship projectile launcher, the weapons system of choice for the interstellar trader and pirate alike.
Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

technology.name: Nonlinear Optics
technology.subtitle: Photon Cannon Upgrade
technology.description:
Replaces the conventional Photon Cannon optics with an experimental glass array, boosting combat performance.
Significantly improves heat sink capacity.

technology.name: Economy Scanner
technology.subtitle: Long-range Sensor Technology
technology.description:
An upgrade to the starship's galactic-scale sensors. This device allows the user to access detailed economic data about a system without having to visit. See collected data automatically on the Galaxy Map.
Active the scanner's internal Trade Computer with FE_ALT1 to search for highly-profitable trading surge events.

technology.name: Conflict Scanner
technology.subtitle: Long-range Sensor Technology
technology.description: An upgrade to the starship's galactic-scale sensors. This device allows the user to access conflict data in the galaxy map, without having to put themselves in harm's way.

technology.name: Phase Beam
technology.subtitle: Starship Energy Weapon
technology.description:
A high-energy beam weapon for ship-to-ship combat.
Though vulnerable to overheating, these highly accurate laser weapons can recharge the users's shields by leeching energy from target shield systems.
Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

technology.name: Fourier De-Limiter
technology.subtitle: Phase Beam Upgrade
technology.description:
Rewires the Phase Beam with nanite-based circuitry, bypassing conventional reality limits on laser power.
Significantly improves heat performance.

technology.name: Positron Ejector
technology.subtitle: Close Range Starship Weapon
technology.description:
A powerful starship weapon, capable of delivering extreme destruction at close range.
Note: these particles show decreased effectiveness against shielded targets.
Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

technology.name: Fragment Supercharger
technology.subtitle: Starship Positron Ejector Upgrade
technology.description:
Overhauls the firing mechanism of the Positron Ejector, resulting in faster, more accurate particles.
Improves range and accuracy.

technology.name: Infra-Knife Accelerator
technology.subtitle: Rapid Fire Starship Weapon
technology.description:
A rapid fire starship weapon that launches superheated globes of liquid metal at hostile targets. These projectiles are extremely effective against unshielded starship hulls.
Note: the Accelerator's internal components are vulnerable to rapid overheating. Sustained burst fire is not recommended.
Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

technology.name: Q-Resonator
technology.subtitle: Starship Infra-Knife Upgrade
technology.description: Upgrades the Infra-Knife Accelerator, compressing internal waveforms to allow an extra shot to be weaved in to the conventional fire patterns.

technology.name: Cyclotron Ballista
technology.subtitle: Anti-Electronics Starship Weapon
technology.description:
A powerful ship-to-ship weapon, flinging plasmatic balls of ionising radiation towards the selected target. These projectiles can disable starship engines, leaving the target vulnerable to attack from other weapons.
These charged particles are extremely effective against starship shields, and considerably weaker against the metal armour of a ship's hull.
Use CYCLEWEAPON to change weapon mode. Press SHIPFIRE to fire.

technology.name: Dyson Pump
technology.subtitle: Starship Cyclotron Upgrade
technology.description:
Replaces the heat sink of the Cyclotron Ballista by encompassing the entire unit with a heat-absorbing megastructure. Heat output is recycled to boost combat efficiency.
Significantly improves heat performance.

technology.name: Freighter Hyperdrive
technology.subtitle: Lightspeed Warp Drive
technology.description: FTL propulsion drive that allows starship to attain warp speed and jump between neighbouring systems.

technology.name: Warp Core Resonator
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Companion Unit
technology.description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.
Quantum resonation improves the robustness of the drive during FTL travel, granting the ability to leap to stars previously out of reach.

technology.name: Plasmatic Warp Injector
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Companion Unit
technology.description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.
Hyperdrive benefits from advanced fusion that brings starship to higher warp speed and intensity. User's craft will become able to leap deeper into space, and into more distant planetary systems.

technology.name: Reality De-Threader
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Companion Unit
technology.description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.
Uncapped, yet stabilised, fusion systems are threaded into user's hyperdrive. Allows starship to jump ever longer distances in deep space.

technology.name: Amplified Warp Shielding
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Upgrade: Red Systems
technology.description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's core bounding magnets, preventing rapid disassembly when attempting to reach rare-class red stellar bodies.
User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

technology.name: Chromatic Warp Shielding
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Upgrade: Green Systems
technology.description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's shield integrity, preventing reality glitches when attempting to reach rare-class green stellar bodies.
User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

technology.name: Temporal Warp Computer
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Upgrade: Blue Systems
technology.description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's computational matrix, preventing temporal anomalies when attempting to reach rare-class blue stellar bodies.
User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

technology.name: Resonance Matrix
technology.subtitle: Hyperdrive Upgrade: Purple Systems
technology.description:
Sideloads a resonant memory packet into your warp computer, allowing the ship to pass through the dissonant space surrounding purple stellar bodies.
User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

technology.name: Matter Beam
technology.subtitle: Freighter-Mounted Teleportation Device
technology.description:
A device that modulates standard freighter communication signals to enable the interplanetary transport of matter as well as data.
Freighters fitted with such a device can send and receive products and substances to a user's Exosuit over a long distance.

technology.name: Interstellar Scanner
technology.subtitle: Long Range Sensor Technology
technology.description:
An upgrade to the freighter's galactic-scale sensors.
This device allows the user to access detailed economic and conflict data for a system, even without having previously visited.

technology.name: Singularity Engine
technology.subtitle: Wormhole Propulsion Drive
technology.description:
An unstable and highly-experimental piece of freighter hyperdrive technology. This extreme gravity device generates a wormhole deep within the freighter's reactor core, inverting the entire vessel and transporting it across the universe.
Speak to the freighter's commander to engage the drive. Warning: destination is not controllable.

technology.name: Atmospheric Control Unit
technology.subtitle: Freighter Life Support Module
technology.description:
A critical freighter subsystem, vital for maintaining a habitable and safe environment for all on-board organic lifeforms.
Capable of generated a limited breathable atmosphere even when damaged or unpowered, but only for a short period of time.

technology.name: Hull Fracture
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Rusted Circuits
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Shattered Bulwark
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Radiation Leak
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Containment Failure
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Damaged Gears
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Hydraulics Damage
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Exploded Panel
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Corroded Tanks
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Burnt-Out Compressor
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Scorched Plating
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Melted Fuel Cell
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Hull Fracture
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Rusted Circuits
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Hydraulics Damage
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Corroded Tanks
technology.subtitle: Damaged Starship Component
technology.description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

technology.name: Pulsing Heart
technology.subtitle: Fused Organic Technology
technology.description:
A fibrous metallic superstructure binds this warm and vital organ with the core of the ship. Without it, the ship would be nothing, a lifeless husk.
Hold PULSEJUMP to ask the heart to initiate a Pulse Jump. Hold BOOST to request a speed boost.

technology.name: Neural Assembly
technology.subtitle: Fused Organic Technology
technology.description:
An array of distributed neurons, fused to a board of metallic strands. Complex patterns of electrical impulses weave their way across the surface, knotting each ship system together.
Hold THRUST to inquire if the ship would like to take off.

technology.name: Singularity Cortex
technology.subtitle: Fused Organic Technology
technology.description:
A complex bio-metallic stem plugged directly into an antimatter heart. Registers high activity during interstellar jumps. It appears to delight in the complex calculations required for FTL travel.
Access long-distance navigation systems through Galactic Map. Keep the ship happy by regularly jumping between systems.

technology.name: Scream Suppressor
technology.subtitle: Fused Organic Technology
technology.description:
This small extension to the ship's automated defense network appears to be its own autonomous organism. A small mouth in the centre of its flesh hungers for Pugneum.
During combat, it seems to hijack the neurological array and prevent fear or pain from traumatising the rest of the ship's body.

technology.name: Spewing Vents
technology.subtitle: Fused Organic Technology
technology.description:
A mess of sacs and sphincters, these vents generate and expel globules of plasma. When fused to the weapon systems of the ship, these are super-heated and then expelled at high-pressure.
Press SHIPFIRE to ask if the ship would direct its vents towards the current target.

technology.name: Grafted Eyes
technology.subtitle: Fused Organic Technology
technology.description: A complex arrangement of membranes and lens, fused atop a high-energy laser array. Incineration awaits those that meet their stare. Press SHIPFIRE request the eyes gaze upon nearby targets.

technology.name: Neural Shielding
technology.subtitle: Hostile Probe Deflector
technology.description:
A beautiful living weave of nanotubes, laced through the vessel's neural assembly. This structure can be energised as the ship deems fit, creating a field that blocks hostile cargo probes.
Use the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU) while a scan is in progress to ask that the ship might block the scan.

technology.name: Chloroplast Membrane
technology.subtitle: Sentient Vessel Node
technology.description:
An infusion of cyanobacteria fills the membrane, which rests just beneath the ship's translucent dermal layer.
The membrane will recharge the Neural Assembly automatically when exposed to sunlight.

technology.name: Wormhole Brain
technology.subtitle: Sentient Vessel Node
technology.description:
The wormhole brain permits the ship vision of systems far beyond its own experience. It consists of strands of neural matter, wrapped around a micro-singularity and tethered directly to the ship's visual cortex.
Detailed economic and conflict data will become available on the Galaxy Map, should the ship permit it.

technology.name: Saline Carapace
technology.subtitle: Sentient Vessel Node
technology.description:
A salty membrane encases the ship, dramatically increasing its natural buoyancy.
The carapace will allow the vessel to float, making water landings possible.

technology.name: Grasping Tendrils
technology.subtitle: Sentient Vessel Node
technology.description:
Filaments of sinew and neuron warp and weave across the ship, their complex geometry darting between the visible world and some unfathomable dimension beyond.
These tendrils reach across time and space, searching out a long-distance link between the vessel and their target's Exosuit inventory.

technology.name: Apollo Figurine
technology.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
technology.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of the Traveller Apollo.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

technology.name: Artemis Figurine
technology.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
technology.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of the Traveller Artemis.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

technology.name: Atlas Figurine
technology.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
technology.description:
A synthetic polymer adornment for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of an Atlas Interface.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

technology.name: Nada Figurine
technology.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
technology.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of Priest Entity Nada.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

technology.name: -null- Figurine
technology.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
technology.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of the Traveller -null-.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

technology.name: Polo Figurine
technology.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
technology.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of Specialist Polo.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

technology.name: Tentacled Figurine
technology.subtitle: Starship Interior Adornment
technology.description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of a sea creature.
Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

technology.name: Chromatic Starship Trail
technology.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
technology.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
Precisely calibrated multi-chromatic injectors alter the Pulse Engine's output, turning the exhaust trail into a vibrant display of colour.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

technology.name: Stealth Starship Trail
technology.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
technology.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
Baryon suppressors alter the Pulse Engine's output, giving a distinct black tint to its signature trail.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

technology.name: Cadmium Starship Trail
technology.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
technology.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
Cadmium injection nozzles add a bold red flair to the Pulse Engine's output.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

technology.name: Emeril Starship Trail
technology.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
technology.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
Emeril injection nozzles add a rich green flair to the Pulse Engine's output.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

technology.name: Golden Starship Trail
technology.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
technology.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
Gold injection nozzles add a dazzling gold flair to the Pulse Engine's output.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

technology.name: Sputtering Starship Trail
technology.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
technology.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
A ramshackle ship exhaust nozzle, hand-assembled in an emergency by an outlaw. Has an occasional propensity to explode, but with no adverse effect on flight handling.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

technology.name: Temporal Starship Trail
technology.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
technology.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
A cosmic resonance chamber interacts with starship exhaust, modifying propulsion energy to leave a streak of temporal disturbances.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

technology.name: Plasma Starship Trail
technology.subtitle: Starship Exhaust Override
technology.description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.
A visual enhancement for the starship, replacing traditional exhaust jets with a plasma thruster and generating a dramatic exhaust plume of ionised matter.
Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

technology.name: Advanced Launch System
technology.subtitle: Bespoke Landing Gear
technology.description:
A custom-made launch control system for high-performance starships. Sensitive gyroscopes and specialised control circuits plot custom take-off routines for increased launch speed and efficiency.
Specialised, deuterium-derived fuel is required to recharge thruster. Launch procedures require sufficient fuel levels before activation.
Hold THRUST to take off from planet. Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

technology.name: Waveform Engine
technology.subtitle: Highly Customised Starship Engine
technology.description:
A highly-tuned version of the conventional starship Pulse Engine. Wavefront occupancy has been pushed to the limit, creating a pulse experience that is both efficient and highly responsive.
User is advised that Tritium is required to charge the drive. Tritium is abundant in near-space asteroid fields. Scan (SHIPSCAN) to search for tritium-rich asteroids.
Hold PULSEJUMP to engage Pulse Jump. Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

technology.name: Frameshift Catapult
technology.subtitle: Illegally Modified Warp Drive
technology.description:
This experimental drive augments conventional hyperdrive technology by distorting local geometry at the point of warp initialisation, boosting range and efficiency far beyond standard drives.
User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems through the Galactic Map.

technology.name: Pressurisation Capsule
technology.subtitle: Starship Life Support Unit
technology.description:
A critical starship safety feature, vital for extra-orbital flight.
The pressuration capsule is a dedicated unit that both ensures a breathable atmosphere and prevents the catastrophic explosion of unconventional cockpit designs.

technology.name: Vesper Sail
technology.subtitle: Advanced Engine Technology
technology.description:
A high-performance solar sail, deployed automatically during flight. This advanced propulsion device generates an electric field within the sails themselves, allowing the starship to build momentum from the solar wind.
Offers substantial gains in fuel efficiency and boost performance over conventional engine systems, as well as enabling photovoltaic recharge of the starship's launch systems.

technology.name: Starship Scanner
technology.subtitle: Starship Scanner
technology.description: Starship Scanner

technology.name: Anti-Gravity Well
technology.subtitle: Aeron Sub-Orbital Engine
technology.description:
Gently detaches the starship from gravitational fields, lifting it toward the stars.
The well hungers for pugneum or radiant shards, and must be sufficiently fueled before launch.
Hold THRUST to take off from planet. Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

technology.name: Luminance Engine
technology.subtitle: Repurposed Sub-Light Drive
technology.description:
Aligns the ship's electromagnetic emissions with A T L A S waves, providing basic propulsion and Pulse Jump capability.
The sub-light drive hungers for tritium or radiant shards.
Hold PULSEJUMP to engage Pulse Jump. Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

technology.name: Crimson Core
technology.subtitle: Interstellar Atlas Propulsion
technology.description:
A raw optic organ, red and unblinking. Suspended above the ship's engines, it gazes down tunnels in spacetime, allowing FTL travel between star systems.
Direct the core's attention to remote destinations via the Galactic Map.

technology.name: Aeron Shield
technology.subtitle: Radiant Defensive Barrier
technology.description:
A defensive crimson cocoon, obfuscating the ship's physical form and providing protection from collision and laser fire.
The core self-heals over time, but may be quickly replenished with catalytic elements or radiant shards.

technology.name: Sentinel Cannon
technology.subtitle: Sentinel Ship Gun
technology.description:
Sentinel-grade weapons system, engineered for the singular purpose of annihilating rogue ships in violation of system regulations.
Press SHIPFIRE to administer lethal force.

technology.name: Pilot Interface
technology.subtitle: Glass / Boundary Terminal
technology.description:
This device allows a pilot's brain to interface with the mind of the Sentinel Interceptor, granting the pilot access to ship control systems and external sensors.
The enmeshing of the pilot's mind with that of the vessel is necessary to prevent rejection/consumption of the pilot by the ship's vestigial cockpit.

technology.name: Analysis Visor
technology.subtitle: Binocular Tagging Device
technology.description:
Specialist Discovery and Survey unit.
Augments standard Scanner capabilities by projecting detailed environmental data directly over the user's visor. Allows the identification of distant points of interest.
The Visor will generate valuable data when used to study flora, fauna and minerals.
Hold AIM to operate. Press ZOOM to zoom.
