technology.name: Scanner
technology.subtitle: Topographic Survey
technology.description:
A Personal Surface Radar augmentation for the Multi-Tool.
The Scanner releases a high-energy pulse that reveals any critical survival resources in the immediate area. Data is transmitted via the Exosuit directly into the user's visual nervous system.
Press SCAN to activate a local scan.

technology.name: Waveform Recycler
technology.subtitle: Multi-Tool Upgrade
technology.description:
A powerful lateral processor inserted into the Multi-Tool Scanning System allows the device to recharge at a significantly improved rate.
Increases potential scan frequency.

technology.name: Survey Device
technology.subtitle: Analysis Visor Upgrade
technology.description:
A self-contained circuitry upgrade for the Analysis Visor, adding real-time terrain analysis to the scanning array.
Toggle between Visor modes with SURVEYFILTERL/SURVEYFILTERR. Use Surveying Mode to detect hidden terrain resources.

technology.name: Scan Harmoniser
technology.subtitle: Multi-Tool Upgrade
technology.description:
An attachment for the Multi-Tool Scanner that allows the device to detect and decode the cloaking signal of nearby Autophage units.
Use SCAN to activate the Scanner. As its detector waveform passes over the local area, it will automatically reveal any nearby Autophage entities.

technology.name: Polyphonic Core
technology.subtitle: Autophage Resonance Key
technology.description:
An attachment for the Multi-Tool Scanner that allows the device to detect and decode the cloaking signal of nearby Autophage units.
Use SCAN to activate the Scanner. As its detector waveform passes over the local area, it will automatically reveal any nearby Autophage entities.
In addition, this device can be used to locate Autophage gatherings. Use Locate Autophage Camp (FE_SELECT) to pinpoint a planetary gathering of Autophage.

technology.name: Resonance Amplifier
technology.subtitle: Echo Seed Detection Device
technology.description:
An attachment for the Multi-Tool Scanner, designed by Specialist Polo for the detection of atlantideum-infused sentience echoes.
On dissonant worlds, use the Analysis Visor (AIM) to locate sentience echoes. On arrival at an echo site, use SCAN to fully reveal nearby anomalies.

technology.name: Terrain Manipulator
technology.subtitle: Landscape Shaping Tool
technology.description:
Advanced terraforming device. This module overloads existing multi-tool systems, allowing the user to reshape regions as they wish.
Charged with metallic elements.

technology.name: Personal Forcefield
technology.subtitle: Defensive Shield Technology
technology.description:
On activation, this module draws power from Exosuit Life Support systems to overload the Multi-Tool, distorting the electromagnetic field around the user and creating a powerful personal shield.
While this field offers substantial protection against incoming laser fire, the user is advised that the Multi-Tool cannot be used for other functions while powering the shield.

technology.name: Cloaking Device
technology.subtitle: Active Camouflage Unit
technology.description:
On activation, this module draws power from Exosuit Life Support systems to manipulate the gravitational field around the user, refracting the light and creating an active camouflage effect.
This temporary effect can be used to escape unwanted hostile attention. WARNING: active camouflage will be aborted upon dramatic Exosuit manoeuvres such as jetpack activation, or by activating Multi-Tool weapons systems.

technology.name: Combat Scope
technology.subtitle: Weapon Precision Enhancement
technology.description: A recoil-stabilising weapon scope for precise combat.

technology.name: Mining Beam
technology.subtitle: Mineral Extraction Laser
technology.description:
Multi-Tool Mining Beam powered by Carbon-based Elements. Fire the beam with ATTACK.
Installs focusing optics within the Multi-Tool, allowing it to emit a high-energy beam. The beam is calibrated to excite molecules within common organic or geological objects, allowing it to operate as a highly effective mining device.
WARNING: Destruction of flora, fauna or minerals may attract Sentinel attention.

technology.name: Advanced Mining Laser
technology.subtitle: Mining Beam Companion Unit
technology.description:
Replaces standard Mining Beam optics with high-grade Living Glass, allowing the beam to be effective against large and/or rare resource deposits.
The lens adapts automatically to minute fluctuations in the beam waveform, minimising scatter and increasing device mining potential.

technology.name: Optical Drill
technology.subtitle: Material Gain Amplifier
technology.description:
Wafer-thin lens arrays are arranged in a highly calibrated matrix, focusing the Mining Beam on an atomic level.
This extra precision allows for highly efficient mining. Elements are extracted more efficiently, increasing the yield from items harvested with the Multi-Tool.

technology.name: Fishing Rig
technology.subtitle: Deployable Angling Device
technology.description:
A versatile piece of angling equipment, enabling the user to fish in a variety of water conditions.
Access the fishing rig by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and cast your line into a body of water with ATTACK. With a fish hooked, press and hold ATTACK to haul in your catch.

technology.name: Lost Angler's Rig
technology.subtitle: Unique Angling Device
technology.description:
A versatile piece of angling equipment, enabling the user to fish in a variety of water conditions. This rig was once owned by the legendary Lost Angler.
Access the fishing rig by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and cast your line into a body of water with ATTACK. With a fish hooked, press and hold ATTACK to haul in your catch.

technology.name: Boltcaster
technology.subtitle: Energy Projectile Weapon
technology.description:
Generalist weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.
The Boltcaster reconfigures the Multi-Tool to supercharge Metallic Elements, firing them as high-velocity projectiles capable of causing extreme damage.

technology.name: Barrel Ioniser
technology.subtitle: Boltcaster Upgrade
technology.description:
Inserts a powerful field ionisation device into the barrel of the Boltcaster, increasing projectile stability through the air.
Improves device accuracy and allows the user to fire for longer periods without degrading combat performance.

technology.name: Boltcaster Ricochet Module
technology.subtitle: Boltcaster Upgrade
technology.description:
Creates an antimatter field around the shots of the Boltcaster, causing them to be repelled by non-damaged surfaces.
Enables ricochet, causing projectiles to bounce if they hit a target they do not damage.

technology.name: Boltcaster SM
technology.subtitle: Boltcaster Companion Unit
technology.description:
Boltcaster shots deliver added physical damage upon impact.
Grants additional kinetic energy to the user's ionised plasma distribution systems.
Operates automatically once constructed within user's Multi-Tool inventory.

technology.name: Plasma Resonator
technology.subtitle: Mining Beam Upgrade
technology.description:
A significant upgrade for the Mining Beam.
Upgrades the Mining Laser's primary crystal chamber, boosting core beam energy while decreasing unwanted heat spill.

technology.name: Plasma Launcher
technology.subtitle: Explosive Grenades
technology.description:
High-impact projectile weapon. Launched plasma shells bounce off surfaces until their internal timer triggers a large explosion.
Charged with Unstable Plasma. Careless use can result in damage to user.
Press ALTATTACK to activate.

technology.name: Geology Cannon
technology.subtitle: Terrain Destruction Device
technology.description:
Large-bore projectile launcher. Propels plasma shells designed for rapid ground excavation.
Charged with Unstable Plasma. Warning: Explosive hole creation may also damage nearby organic matter.
Press ALTATTACK to activate.

technology.name: Paralysis Mortar
technology.subtitle: Stun Grenades
technology.description:
Non-violent projectile weapon. Launched projectiles will incapacitate nearby targets with a burst of electrical energy. Effective against both biological and electronic entities.
Charged with Unstable Plasma.
Press ALTATTACK to activate.

technology.name: Blaze Javelin
technology.subtitle: Energy Beam Weapon
technology.description:
Aggressive weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.
The Blaze Javelin delivers instantaneous damage on targets.
Plasma charge process creates an ionised gas arc to propel projectiles at great speed. User will perceive destructive results simultaneous to the pull of the trigger.

technology.name: Mass Accelerator
technology.subtitle: Blaze Javelin Upgrade
technology.description:
Extends the firing chamber of the Blaze Javelin, allowing the internal particle accelerators to reach both greater mass and speed.
Significantly improves weapon damage.

technology.name: Waveform Oscillator
technology.subtitle: Blaze Javelin Upgrade
technology.description:
Overloads the energy beam generated by the Blaze Javelin, causing it to deliver a power electrical charge at its point of impact.
Will briefly stun any organic and inorganic entities that intersect the Blaze Javelin's beam.

technology.name: Scatter Blaster
technology.subtitle: Scatter Shot Projectile Weapon
technology.description:
Specialist close combat weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.
The Scatter Blaster reconfigures the Multi-Tool to heat and shatter Metallic Elements, firing them in a wide cone of destruction. Range is limited, but the shrapnel is highly effective at close range.

technology.name: Shell Greaser
technology.subtitle: Scatter Blaster Upgrade
technology.description: Advanced self-lubricating components decrease friction within the Scatter Blaster, offering significant improvements to reload times.

technology.name: Pulse Spitter
technology.subtitle: Rapid Fire Projectile Weapon
technology.description:
Specialist rapid fire weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.
The Pulse Spitter redirects Multi-Tool optics to ionise inserted Metallic Elements. These projectiles are launched in a rapid-fire spread, bombarding potential targets with a wave of high-energy plasma.

technology.name: Amplified Cartridges
technology.subtitle: Pulse Spitter Upgrade
technology.description:
Specialist harmonic resonators allow the Pulse Spitter to split inserted ammunition, effective manufacturing more shots from fewer materials.
Increases weapon clip size.

technology.name: Pulse Spitter Ricochet Module
technology.subtitle: Pulse Spitter Upgrade
technology.description:
Creates an antimatter field around the shots of the Pulse Spitter, causing them to be repelled by non-damaged surfaces.
Enables ricochet, causing projectiles to bounce if they hit a target they do not damage.

technology.name: Impact Igniter
technology.subtitle: Pulse Spitter Upgrade
technology.description:
A powerful combat upgrade for the Pulse Spitter. This module installs series of delicately calibrated fuel-injection nozzles within the firing chamber, which are used to initiate a controlled burn within its plasma projectiles.
Causes targets hit by the Pulse Spitter to burn for a short while, causing additional damage.

technology.name: Incinerator
technology.subtitle: Short-Range Fire Delivery Unit
technology.description:
Specialist high temperature weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.
The Incinerator focuses internal lasers onto the naturally-occuring exhaust gases generated by the Multi-Tool. Ignition results in a highly destructive, if short range, inferno.

technology.name: Neutron Cannon
technology.subtitle: Explosive Energy Weapon
technology.description:
A high-energy weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. The Neutron Cannon energises atmospheric particles before propelling them towards hostile targets, delivering significant area damage
Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON. Charge the weapon with ATTACK, then release to unleash a volley of ionised particles.
While the cannon can deliver instantaneous single shots, longer charges will result in significant increases to the speed and volume of released particles.

technology.name: P-Field Compressor
technology.subtitle: Neutron Cannon Upgrade
technology.description:
A powerful upgrade to the Neutron Cannon. Additional resonance compressors allow significantly more energy to be routed through the cannon's central core, dramatically increasing operating power.
Installation will allow a fully-charged Neutron Cannon to launch additional projectiles at higher speeds.

technology.name: Voltaic Amplifier
technology.subtitle: Damage Overload Module
technology.description:
A generalised upgrade for all Multi-Tool weapon systems, causing its projectiles to resonate dramatically upon impact with any appropriate electromagnetic field.
Will significantly increase the damage dealt to any organic and inorganic entities that are currently stunned.

technology.name: Short Circuit
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Blown Transistor
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Damaged Wiring
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Rusted Power Core
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Corrupt Module
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Loom Damage
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Corroded Actuator
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Burnt-Out Terminal
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Melted Servos
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Shattered Lens
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Leaking Membrane
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Failed Resistor
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Sentience Resistor
technology.subtitle: Incomplete Sentinel Salvage
technology.description:
This Multi-Tool is a piece of hybrid technology, a fusion of crude scrap and a deep, powerful energy - part salvage, part Sentinel, part something undefinable...
This process of recycled fusion was incomplete when this tool was acquired. Use REPAIR to continue repair operations and free this slot for general use.

technology.name: Discordant Prism
technology.subtitle: Incomplete Sentinel Salvage
technology.description:
This Multi-Tool is a piece of hybrid technology, a fusion of crude scrap and a deep, powerful energy - part salvage, part Sentinel, part something undefinable...
This process of recycled fusion was incomplete when this tool was acquired. Use REPAIR to continue repair operations and free this slot for general use.

technology.name: Corrupted Lens
technology.subtitle: Incomplete Sentinel Salvage
technology.description:
This Multi-Tool is a piece of hybrid technology, a fusion of crude scrap and a deep, powerful energy - part salvage, part Sentinel, part something undefinable...
This process of recycled fusion was incomplete when this tool was acquired. Use REPAIR to continue repair operations and free this slot for general use.

technology.name: Drained Power Core
technology.subtitle: Incomplete Sentinel Salvage
technology.description:
This Multi-Tool is a piece of hybrid technology, a fusion of crude scrap and a deep, powerful energy - part salvage, part Sentinel, part something undefinable...
This process of recycled fusion was incomplete when this tool was acquired. Use REPAIR to continue repair operations and free this slot for general use.

technology.name: Corrupt Module
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Loom Damage
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Burnt-Out Terminal
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Failed Resistor
technology.subtitle: Damaged Multi-Tool Component
technology.description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.
Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.
Repairing will free slot up for general use.

technology.name: Solar Ray
technology.subtitle: Alchemical Laser
technology.description:
A highly specialised addition to the Multi-Tool's mining capabilities, transforming terrain deposits into liquid sun.
A powerful laser array amplifies local solar radiation, allowing for the rapid reconfiguration of nearby mineral ores.

technology.name: Animus Beam
technology.subtitle: Soul Extractor
technology.description:
A unique overload to the Multi-Tool's standard mining laser. Beam frequency is modulated precisely in a feedback loop with the delta-waves generated by the impact target.
Recordings of the target's experiences are thus etched into tiny fragments of metal and rendered as Fragmented Qualia. Readability of collected fragments is not guaranteed.

technology.name: Hijacked Laser
technology.subtitle: Repurposed High-Energy Beam
technology.description:
This Multi-Tool is made with material and methods known to no conventional manufacturer, its core a unfathomable array of impossible optics and glassy foam. Nonetheless, there is a layer of recogniseable technology. It shows signs of having been tampered with by an unknown craftsman, who has repurposed its scanner array into a high-powered mining laser.
Powered by Carbon-based Elements. Fire the beam with ATTACK.

technology.name: Runic Lens
technology.subtitle: Geometric Anomaly
technology.description:
The geometric heart of this ancient weapon is the Runic Lens. Its impossible geometry not only concentrates light into a high-powered Mining Laser, but can also warp the local electromagnetic field so as to render the user invisible.
Powered by Carbon-based Elements. Fire the beam with ATTACK. Select its secondary cloaking function with CYCLEALTWEAPON and hold ALTATTACK to activate.

technology.name: Fusion Engine
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Power System
technology.description:
A compact fusion core common to all Exocraft.
Requires fuel to function.

technology.name: Drift Suspension
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Handling Modification
technology.description:
Overhauls Exocraft handling values through a combination of software tweaks, pressure adjustments and the insertion of microgravity wells into key suspension components.
Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the Exocraft to drift.

technology.name: Grip Boost Suspension
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Handling Modification
technology.description:
Overhauls Exocraft handling values through a combination of software tweaks, pressure adjustments and the insertion of microgravity wells into key suspension components.
Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the Exocraft to turn sharply.

technology.name: Hi-Slide Suspension
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Handling Modification
technology.description:
Overhauls Exocraft handling values through a combination of software tweaks, pressure adjustments and the insertion of microgravity wells into key suspension components.
Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the Exocraft to slide.

technology.name: Thermal Buffer
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Hazard Protection Unit
technology.description:
Sublimation cooling vents and high-thermal mass buffers are installed in all structural panels, keeping the Exocraft pilot at non-lethal temperatures even in the most overwhelming of firestorms.
Entirely prevents all damage or energy drain while inside an Exocraft in scorched environments.

technology.name: Megawatt Heater
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Hazard Protection Unit
technology.description:
Installs a powerful heater into the Exocraft, keeping the cabin a habitable temperature even in the most freezing of conditions.
Entirely prevents all damage or energy drain while inside an Exocraft in freezing environments.

technology.name: Air Filtration Unit
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Hazard Protection Unit
technology.description:
Double-vacuumed air filtration systems allow no trace of the planetary atmosphere into the Exocraft cabin without being thoroughly scrubbed.
Entirely prevents all damage or energy drain while inside an Exocraft in toxic environments.

technology.name: Neutron Shielding
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Hazard Protection Unit
technology.description:
Highly-efficient control materials are inserted into the frame of the Exocraft, neutralising dangerous incoming energy waves.
Entirely prevents all damage or energy drain while inside an Exocraft in radioactive environments.

technology.name: Icarus Fuel System
technology.subtitle: Solar Recharge Unit
technology.description:
The Icarus system takes advantage of existing metal panelling, upgrading them into photovoltaic surfaces. This reactive coating generates energy during daylight hours, offsetting fuel consumption.
Enables automatic engine recharging during the day.

technology.name: Exocraft Radar
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Scan Equipment
technology.description:
A large and complex field-based subspace radar.
Due to their large power consumption and inherent subatomic instability, they are found only installed on Exocraft.
Press QUICK_MENU to activate the Signal Booster.

technology.name: Radar Amplifier
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Signal Detection Upgrade
technology.description: Allows for additional building types to be acquired by the Exocraft Radar.

technology.name: Radar Power Resonator
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Signal Detection Upgrade
technology.description: Allows for additional building types to be acquired by the Exocraft Radar.

technology.name: Exocraft Boosters
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Engine Upgrade
technology.description: An efficient plasma injector coupled to the engine that allows short bursts of speed.

technology.name: Exocraft Mining Laser
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Mining Attachment
technology.description: A mining laser too cumbersome for handheld operation, they are found only installed on Exocraft.

technology.name: Advanced Exocraft Laser
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Mining Upgrade
technology.description: Increases power of the Exocraft Mining Laser.

technology.name: Mounted Cannon
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Weapon Attachment
technology.description: Due to the energy requirements of this powerful weapon, they can only be fired from an Exocraft mount.

technology.name: Mounted Flamethrower
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Ignition Weapon
technology.description:
A mounted flamethrower specifically designed for the Exocraft. Causes extreme damage at close range.
Use CYCLEWEAPON to cycle available weapon modes.

technology.name: Humboldt Drive
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Power System
technology.description:
A thermally-efficient, inversion-proof reactor engine capable of powering the Nautilon even at extreme depths.
Powered by Hydrothermal Fuel Cells.

technology.name: Nautilon Cannon
technology.subtitle: Submarine Weapon
technology.description:
A mounted cannon specifically designed for the Nautilon Submarine.
A high-energy weapon system, it superheats a small body of water before launching it rapidly towards the intended target.
Designed primarily for damage against biological entities and inefficient when deployed as a mining device.

technology.name: Tethys Beam
technology.subtitle: Submarine Mining Laser
technology.description:
A mounted laser system specifically designed for the Nautilon Submarine.
Fires a concentrated plasma beam towards the intended target, which is then ignited. Such a trigger mechanism allows the use of high-energy optical mining systems in a liquid medium.

technology.name: Dredging Laser
technology.subtitle: Nautilon Terrain Manipulator
technology.description:
Adds Terrain Manipulation capability to the laser systems of the Nautilon Submarine.
Cooled by specially designed water intakes, it is specifically calibrated to carve through the complex geology of the sea floor.

technology.name: High-Power Sonar
technology.subtitle: Submarine Analysis Device
technology.description:
A high-detail sonar device, capable of upgrading the scanner technology aboard a Nautilon-class submarine to Analysis Visor levels, pinning to the HUD all information typically revealed by the Analysis Visor.
Press SCAN to activate the High-Power Sonar.

technology.name: Osmotic Generator
technology.subtitle: Humboldt Drive Upgrade
technology.description:
Installed into the drive system aboard the Nautilon Submarine.
Captures energy by exploiting the saline gradient in deep water environments, allowing a slow recharge of the Humboldt Drive in the event of fuel emergencies.

technology.name: Daedalus Engine
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Power Unit
technology.description:
A compact reactor unit, this engine is the heart of the Minotaur. It is mounted on a gyroscope to prevent fuel incidents during rapid movement.
Powered by conventional carbon-base fuels.

technology.name: Self-Greasing Servos
technology.subtitle: Motor Efficiency Upgrade
technology.description:
An automatically-regulated lubricant dispenser fitted to the leg joints of the Minotaur reduce friction and encourage fuel-efficient motion.
Significantly reduces fuel burn in the Minotaur's Daedalus Engine.

technology.name: Minotaur Radar Array
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Scan Attachment
technology.description:
A high-detail radar device, capable of upgrading the scanner technology aboard the Minotaur to Analysis Visor levels.
Press SCAN to activate a radar sweep, revealing additional points of interest that cannot be located via a Multi-Tool scanner.
Use the Quick Menu to tune the radar to specific buildings.

technology.name: Ariadne's Flame
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Thruster System
technology.description:
A series of agile, high-powered jet thrusters mounted to the rear of the rear of the Minotaur. Precise use allows the Minotaur to quickly and powerfully traverse all manner of terrain.
Press and hold JUMP to activate. Limited in-flight control is possible.

technology.name: Minotaur Laser
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Mining Utility
technology.description:
A mounted laser system specifically designed for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.
Enables conventional mining operations. Ineffective in combat scenarios.

technology.name: Precision Minotaur Laser
technology.subtitle: Advanced Minotaur Mining Laser
technology.description:
An upgrade for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid's laser array system.
Amplifies the power deployed by the mining beam, increasing mining speed and enabling the processing of difficult to mine raw materials.

technology.name: Minotaur Cannon
technology.subtitle: Heavy Mounted Weapon
technology.description:
A mounted cannon specifically designed for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.
Designed primarily for damage against biological entities and inefficient when deployed as a mining device.

technology.name: Minotaur Bore
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Digging Laser
technology.description:
Adds Terrain Manipulation capability to the laser array of the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.
A special mount allows the rapid deployment of a high-energy terrain excavator, without risking clogging the Minotaur's delicate joints and servos with dirt.

technology.name: Environment Control Unit
technology.subtitle: Exocraft Hazard Protection Unit
technology.description:
This powerful environmental neutralising system is plugged directly into the pilot as they enter the cockpit. The system is powered via the Minotaur's main engine and requires no additional input. Some minor pain may be noticed around the insertion site.
Renders the Minotaur pilot impervious to all environmental hazards.

technology.name: Minotaur AI Pilot
technology.subtitle: Autonomous Control Unit
technology.description:
A semi-autonomous artificial pilot plugin for the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid. Installation allows the Minotaur to traverse planets itself and engage in combat or mining activities to support its primary operator.
The AI pilot will always cede control to the primary operator when they enter the cockpit.
Piloting routines are highly localised. It is incapable of developing emotional bonds nor exercising independent control of the Minotaur.

technology.name: Hardframe Left Arm
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
technology.description:
A collection of salvaged components from a Sentinel Hardframe, reconditioned to fit the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid.
When installed alongside a Minotaur Laser, it transforms the mining laser into a powerful combat upgrade with the ability to deal heavy damaged to stunned entities.

technology.name: Hardframe Right Arm
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
technology.description:
A collection of salvaged components from a Sentinel Hardframe, reconditioned to fit the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid.
This limb override also functions as its own dedicated combat system. It deploys high-velocity stun projectiles and serves as an excellent support weapon to the Minotaur's primary cannon.
Use CYCLEWEAPON to cycle available weapon modes.

technology.name: Hardframe Legs
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
technology.description:
A collection of salvaged components from a Sentinel Hardframe, reconditioned to fit the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid.
Installation will significantly improve the Minotaur's engine and mobility systems.

technology.name: Hardframe Body
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Core Replacement
technology.description:
A collection of salvaged components from a Sentinel Hardframe, reconditioned to fit the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid.
Will function as a semi-autonomous artificial pilot plugin. Installation allows the Minotaur to traverse planets itself and engage in combat or mining activities to support its primary operator.
The AI pilot will always cede control to the primary operator when they enter the cockpit.

technology.name: Liquidator Left Arm
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
technology.description:
An upgrade to the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid, the Liquidator is a cutting-edge heavy-duty combat unit, designed to operate in the harshest of environments.
This limb override also functions as its own dedicated combat system. It deploys high-velocity stun projectiles, perfect for keeping hostiles in place while advancing to close range.

technology.name: Liquidator Right Arm
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
technology.description:
An upgrade to the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid, the Liquidator is a cutting-edge heavy-duty combat unit, designed to operate in the harshest of environments.
This limb override also functions as its own dedicated combat system - a flamethrower for extreme damage at close range.
Use CYCLEWEAPON to cycle available weapon modes.

technology.name: Liquidator Legs
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
technology.description:
An upgrade to the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid, the Liquidator is a cutting-edge heavy-duty combat unit, designed to operate in the harshest of environments.
Installation will significantly improve the Minotaur's engine and mobility systems.

technology.name: Liquidator Body
technology.subtitle: Minotaur Limb Replacement
technology.description:
An upgrade to the Minotaur Heavy Exocraft Hybrid, the Liquidator is a cutting-edge heavy-duty combat unit, designed to operate in the harshest of environments.
Will function as a semi-autonomous artificial pilot plugin. Installation allows the Minotaur to traverse planets itself and engage in combat or mining activities to support its primary operator.
The AI pilot will always cede control to the primary operator when they enter the cockpit.

technology.name: Soil De-Wormer
technology.subtitle: Autonomous Agriculture Unit
technology.description: A control unit for a brigade of tiny robots. These are directed to burrow through the soil and eliminate yield-depleting pests. Control unit maintenance is crucial to prevent accidental robot swarms.

technology.name: Auto Sprinkler
technology.subtitle: Autonomous Agriculture Unit
technology.description: An automatic sprinkler system that tunes itself to the needs of the plants, deploying water as a fine mist, a heavy downpour, or anything in-between.

technology.name: Light Balancer
technology.subtitle: Autonomous Agriculture Unit
technology.description: A bank of LEDs controlled by a photosensitive processing unit, designed to carefully deliver exactly the mix of red, green or blue light that the plant requires.

technology.name: Auto-Propagator
technology.subtitle: Autonomous Agriculture Unit
technology.description: This advanced bank of lasers prunes and propagates plants as required, the cauterising light offering unequaled precision.

technology.name: Nutrient Distributor
technology.subtitle: Autonomous Agriculture Unit
technology.description: A hybrid fabricator/distributor that tests the soil for missing nutrients, so that it can create and spray the perfect fertiliser.

technology.name: Fuel Inverter
technology.subtitle: Chargeable Power Unit
technology.description: A piece of rechargeable power technology. The fuel inverter ensures an even flow of power to autonomous machines.

technology.name: Membrane Battery
technology.subtitle: Chargeable Power Unit
technology.description: The membrane battery is an almost maintenance-free piece of rechargeable power technology. Nestled among in the machine's circuits, it supplies power safely and directly.

technology.name: Power Condenser
technology.subtitle: Chargeable Power Unit
technology.description: A piece of rechargeable power technology. The power condenser harvests any heat energy wasted during the machine's operation, and uses it to generate extra power.

technology.name: Generator Coupling
technology.subtitle: Chargeable Power Unit
technology.description: The generator coupling is an important piece of the machine's rechargeable power systems. Without it, the generator would fruitlessly spin, pumping power out into the void.

technology.name: Kinetic Dynamo
technology.subtitle: Chargeable Power Unit
technology.description: The kinetic dynamo takes a small initial charge and uses it to run power-harvesting systems that tap into the orbit of the planet. This frees autonomous machinery from frequent fuel inspections, allowing them to endure extremely long maintenance cycles.

technology.name: Locking mechanism
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A simple locking device, designed to keep out unauthorised pilferers. Damage has locked it permanently.

technology.name: Magnetic Lock
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: An advanced locking device. A polarity incident has caused it to seal shut permanently.

technology.name: Superconductive Lock
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A highly advanced locking device. Damage to the circuits supplying the magnet has caused it to lock permanently.

technology.name: Input terminal
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A terminal designed to allow manual control of the device. Damage prevents it actually receiving any input.

technology.name: Bio-input sensor
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: An advanced control unit, designed to allow device/flesh interaction. Damage prevents it functioning correctly. Interfacing while it is in this state is not advised.

technology.name: Boiler Unit
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A small boiler, generating heat to allow the device to function in difficult climates. A malfunction has resulted in a damaging boiler overflow.

technology.name: Tiny motor
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A very small motor, designed to power very small parts. It has corroded, and is full of very small rust.

technology.name: Cooling system
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A pump and heat exchange system designed to keep the device from overheating. It has itself overheated, and is no longer functional.

technology.name: Output screen
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A display terminal designed to communicate the device's status to the user. As the terminal is broken, the user cannot be made aware that the terminal is broken.

technology.name: Tamper Prevention Device
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A unit designed to destroy vital systems in the event that the device is tampered with by an unauthorised party. Unfortunately, it has itself malfunctioned and will continue to damage other systems until repaired.

technology.name: Security Alarm
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A small light/klaxon hybrid, designed to warn of unauthorised access to the device. Damage to the alarm has caused it to overload and short other nearby circuits.

technology.name: Spring Casing
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: The casing for a high-compression spring. The casing has ruptured, causing the spring to shoot out and damage the rest of the device.

technology.name: Thermoregulator
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A control unit designed to keep temperatures even across the device. The sensor unit is damaged, causing it to vent or generate heat at inappropriate times.

technology.name: Fuel Pump
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A high-capacity pump, ensuring that fuel reaches every part of the device in all gravitational conditions. The filter is clogged with a strange substance, causing it to lose power.

technology.name: Servo Arm
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A small mechanical joint, used to correct small mechanical errors across the device. A malfunction is causing it to take functional components and push them into the wrong place, creating even more damage.

technology.name: Solenoid
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A relay switch, intended to aid the powering up of the device. The connectors have become corroded, and the solenoid is no longer functioning.

technology.name: Pressure Chamber
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A small pressurised chamber, designed to create the compressed gas necessary for the device to function. Cracks have appeared in the chamber, causing it to leak.

technology.name: Master Circuit
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: The control circuit for all the other components in the device. Damage to this circuitry is fatal.

technology.name: Power Distributor
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: The central power unit for the device. Damage to the unit means it is currently distributing all the power to one particular circuit, causing a dangerous short.

technology.name: Load Balancer
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A small unit designed to regulate the flow of power across the device. A malfunction is causing it to short, damaging other components.

technology.name: Network Interface
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A universal network interface, allowing the device to connect to a remote control centre. Damage to this interface is causing it to interpret background radiation as network signals, corrupting data in other circuits.

technology.name: Safety Panel
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: The safety panel seals off potentially dangerous components in the event of a malfunction. An over sensitive trigger has caused it to activate, preventing the device from operating.

technology.name: Alternator
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: The alternator generates and regulates power for the device. A strange corrosion seeps through it, preventing it from working.

technology.name: Photovoltaic Panel
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A small but efficient panel, designed to harvest light and convert it to power. However, the panel is now cracked and dusty, and can no longer be relied on.

technology.name: Transmission Box
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: The gearing mechanism for the device. The lubricant that keeps it operational appears to have been replaced with an otherworldly green goo, and the gears are now stuck.

technology.name: Glyph One
technology.subtitle: Ancient Technology
technology.description:
A solemn power radiates from this ancient carving. Though the imagery is simple and the rendering rough, the meaning of the glyph has mathematical precision.
This is glyph 1 of 16.

technology.subtitle: Ancient Technology
technology.description:

technology.name: Portal Repository
technology.subtitle: Mind Ark Notch
technology.description:
A groove cut into the smooth grey stone of the Portal.
A light within pulses gently, expectant.

technology.name: Extractor Unit
technology.subtitle: Stellar Extractor Core
technology.description:
Gathers resources directly from the interstellar medium, via a complex system of suction intakes and condensing tubes. The gathered substance varies with the local star classification.
Powered directly from the freighter's main electrical loop. Functionality is entirely autonomous.

technology.name: Bait Box
technology.subtitle: Automatic Bait Dispenser
technology.description:
Insert bait or lures to attract specific fish, or to improve catch chances. Note: any foodstuff may be used as bait.
Current Bait: %BAIT% Catch Rarity Improvement: %RARE_BOOST%% Catch Size Improvement %SIZE_BOOST%% Other notes: %NOTES%

technology.name: Auto-Trap
technology.subtitle: Self-Sustaining Auto Creel
technology.description:
An autonomous fishing device, designed for long-term deployment in a wide-range of water conditions. Return later to collect trapped fish.
Trap cycle: IN PROGRESS

technology.name: Ingestor Empty
technology.subtitle: Automatic Feeding Unit
technology.description:
The nutrient ingestor improves exosuit performance via the automatic portioning and processing of various cooked items.
Current Nutrition Source: %NAME% Duration: %TIME% Effect: %EFFECT%

technology.name: Refinery Output
technology.subtitle: Storage Hopper
technology.description: A hopper for storing the materials generated by the refinery

technology.name: Finished Dish
technology.subtitle: Storage Hopper
technology.description: A hopper for storing the materials generated by the refinery

technology.name: Furnace Tank
technology.subtitle: Fuel Incineration Device
technology.description:
High-temperature burn unit, designed to consume a wide range of biological material. Insert materials to initiate burn.
When active, drives an internal turbine to generate power.

technology.name: Ancient Lock
technology.subtitle: Heavy Locking Mechanism
technology.description: A mysterious lock with several keyholes, this relic protects what must surely be a valuable treasure.

technology.name: Pearl Offering
technology.subtitle: Offering to the Sea
technology.description: The chest requires a Living Pearl, harvested from the giant mother-molluscs that grow on the ocean floor.

technology.name: Trident Key
technology.subtitle: Offering to the Sea
technology.description: The chest requires a Trident Key, given to those who study the mysterious sites in the deep ocean.

technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description: A very small motor, designed to power very small parts. It has corroded, and is full of very small rust.

technology.name: Faulty Hologram
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description:
This Exosuit Upgrade Module is critically damaged. Repair systems to restore upgrade functionality.
If repaired, User will not be charged for any Exosuit Upgrades.

technology.name: Damaged Electrode
technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description:
This Exosuit Upgrade Module is critically damaged. Repair systems to restore upgrade functionality.
If repaired, User will not be charged for any Exosuit Upgrades.

technology.subtitle: Damaged Component
technology.description:

If repaired, User will not be charged for any Exosuit Upgrades.

technology.description:

The glyph burns with a resonant energy in the presence of Atlantideum

technology.name: Phalanged Node
technology.subtitle: Damaged Autophage Component
technology.description:
This autophage is far from working order, but its subcomponents shows the signs of a previous repair attempt. With a few additional tweaks, the work might be completed...
Repair this component with REPAIR, or use PIN to locate the needed materials.

procedural-technology.name: C-Class Mining Beam Upgrade
procedural-technology.subtitle: C-Class Mining Beam Upgrade
procedural-technology.description:
A moderate upgrade for the Mining Beam. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.
The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.
Potential upgrades include: power output, heat toleration and fuel efficiency.

procedural-technology.name: B-Class Mining Beam Upgrade
procedural-technology.subtitle: B-Class Mining Beam Upgrade
procedural-technology.description:
A significant upgrade for the Mining Beam. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.
The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.
Potential upgrades include: power output, heat toleration and fuel efficiency.

procedural-technology.description:

procedural-technology.name: C-Class Analysis Visor Upgrade
procedural-technology.subtitle: C-Class Analysis Visor Upgrade

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.
Potential upgrades include: scan radius and/or significantly increasing the value of discovery data.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.
Potentially increases explosion damage or crater radius.

procedural-technology.name: Forbidden Exosuit Module
procedural-technology.subtitle: Forbidden Exosuit Module
procedural-technology.description:

This strange fragment of debris has been extracted from Sentinel technology. Its exact effect upon suit performance is impossible to predict before the nantite foam has fully spread within the Exosuit's systems.

procedural-technology.name: Salvaged Upgrade Components
procedural-technology.subtitle: Salvaged Upgrade Components
procedural-technology.description:
A salvaged upgrade for the Exosuit. Use FE_ALT1 to begin upgrade installation process.
Constructed by the Autophage, this technology package is the result of a high degree of engineering improvisation. As a one-of-a-kind piece of repurposed technology, its exact effect upon suit performance is hard to determine prior to installation within the Exosuit's systems.
